[\[43a.5\]]stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang /_/phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang /_/lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha 
[\[43a.6\]]min rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_/dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste 'di dag skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma yang dag bshad du gsol/_/'dir gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni stong pa chen po yi ge lnga dang thig le stong pa yi ge drug dang /_rigs 
[\[43a.7\]]drug la sogs pa'i don bsdus par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te de'i phyir 'di bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/'dir dang por gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa stong pa zhes pa la sogs pas rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byas na 'chad 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]par 'gyur ba byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis rtogs sla bar 'gyur ro/_/des na dang por 'grel bshad las mdor bsdus pas brjod par bya'o/_/'dir stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i ming rnams kyis ma mthong ba dang mthong ba'i dngos po nyi tshe ba'i dbang po'i spyod 
[\[43b.2\]]yul ma yin pa dang /_nyi tshe ba'i dbang po'i spyod yul rnams rab tu ston to/_/med pa dang yod pa dang dngos po ma yin pa dang dngos po yin pa thams cad la yang ming sngon du 'gro bas tha snyad byed de nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa dang bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no/_/
[\[43b.3\]]'dir nam mkha'i me tog gis ming gis bstan pa'i dngos po med pa ni dngos po ma yin no/_/de bzhin du bum pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i dngos po ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te rang gi ming gis brjod pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du rgyud dang rgyud gzhan rnams 
[\[43b.4\]]su bstan bcos kyi ming dang yul gyi ming dang sngags kyi yi ge'i ming dang yi ge re re'i ming rnams kyis dngos po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas nges par bstan cing sdud par byed pa po rnams kyis kyang bris pa de dag thams cad rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis drang ba'i don 
[\[43b.5\]]dang nges pa'i don gyis rtogs par bya'o/_/'dir gcig dang dngos po med pa la yang ming sna tshogs ste de'i phyir dngos po gcig la yang ming sna tshogs kyis bstan pa la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ming gi rnam par rtog pa mi bya ste bla ma dam pas nye bar bstan pa 
[\[43b.6\]]gser bzhin yongs su brtags pa ni don la rton pa la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'dir stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa/_zhes pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po 'dis stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i ming rnams kyis khams drug gi skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[43b.7\]]gang zag 'di bsdus pa 'di lta ste/_ye shes kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang ye shes kyi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_yid dang rna ba dang sgra dang chos kyi dbyings dang mchog gi dbang po dang b+ha ga dang dri chu 'dzag pa dang khu ba 'pho ba ste/_'di 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid dang ro mnyam pa nyid dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid la stong pa zhes brjod do/_/thams cad dngos po med pa ni ma yin te rnal 'byor pas rang rig pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyis gzhom du med 
[\[44a.2\]]par gsungs te gzhom du med pa 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ni lho dang byang dang shar dang nub kyi dbus su gri gug gi rnam par ri mo tsam brjod du med pa ste stong pa chen po'i yi ge dang po'o/_/de'i 'og tu ye shes kyang zhes pa ste 'dir kyang yig ni sdud pa'i don du bstan te 
[\[44a.3\]]sdud pa'i don go bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/ye shes zhes pa'i ming 'dis stong pa gsum pa zhes pa rtogs par bya ba 'di lta ste/_tshor ba'i phung po dang me'i khams dang mig dang ro dang lag pa dang 'gro ba ste/_'di rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid dang ro mnyam pa nyid dang 
[\[44a.4\]]gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid ni ye shes te stong pa chen po yi ge gsum pa'o/_/'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ni dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i mtshan ma'i lho ru thig le gnyis te brjod du med pa'o/_/thig le zhes pa'i ming 'dis stong pa bzhi pa rtogs par bya ste snga ma'i kyang 
[\[44a.5\]]yig gi phyir ro/_/'di lta ste/_'du shes kyi phung po dang chu'i khams dang /_lce dang gzugs dang rkang pa dang len pa ste/_'di rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid dang ro mnyam pa nyid gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid ni thig le ste/_stong pa chen po yi ge bzhi pa'o/_
[\[44a.6\]]'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ni dbus kyi mtshan ma'i byang du thig le gcig ste brjod du med pa'o/_/mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa/_zhes pa ni mchog dang mchog dang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa ste gcig zlas dbye ba'i phyir ro/_/sngar gyi kyang yig 
[\[44a.7\]]las gsum po 'di stong pa'i ming can du 'gyur ro/_/mchog dang po'i ming gis stong pa gnyis pa zhes brjod pa 'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi phung po dang rlung gi khams dang /_sna dang reg bya dang ngag gi dbang po dang bshang ba 'dzag pa ste/_'di rnams sgrib pa dang 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bral ba nyid dang ro mnyam pa nyid dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid ni mchog ste stong pa chen po yi ge gnyis pa'o/_/'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ni dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i shar du dbyig pa'i rnam pa ri mo tsam brjod du med pa'o/_/mchog gnyis pa'i ming gis stong ba 
[\[44b.2\]]lnga ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi phung po dang sa'i khams dang lus kyi dbang po dang dri dang bshang lam dang brjod pa ste/_'di rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid dang ro mnyam pa nyid dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid ni mchog ste stong pa yi ge lnga pa'o/_/'di'i ming 
[\[44b.3\]]gi mtshan ma ni dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i nub tu thod pa'i rnam pa brjod du med pa'o/_/de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa lnga ni stong pa chen po yi ge lnga pa waM yig rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po rdo rjer brjod do/_/'dir dbyangs kyi ming can 
[\[44b.4\]]brjod du med pa'i yi ge lnga ni 'di lta ste/_dbus su a yig stong pa gri gug gi rnam pa'o/_/lhor ri yig stong pa thig le gnyis so/_/byang du u yig stong pa thig le gcig go/_/shar du i yig stong pa dbyug pa'i rnam pa'o/_/nub tu li yig 
[\[44b.5\]]stong pa thod pa'i rnam pa ste/_de bzhin du yon tan dang 'phel ba dang ya Nar bsgyur ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba rnams shes par bya'o/_/de ltar wa yig ni stong pa chen po yi ge lnga pa dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa pra 
[\[44b.6\]]phab pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs pa rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya ba'o/_/'dir ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i dbyangs rnams ni 'di lta ste/_ye shes kyi phung po a~M/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po a/_ye shes kyi khams aH/_nam 
[\[44b.7\]]mkha'i khams A/_yid kyi dbang po a~M/_rna ba'i dbang po a/_sgra aH/_chos kyi dbyings A/_b+ha ga ha/_dri chu 'dzag pa haH/_mchog gi dbang po ha~M/_khu ba 'pho ba hA/_'di dag ni dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba ste gri gug gi rnam pa'i ming 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gi mtshan mas rtogs par bya'o/_/'du byed kyi phung po i/_rlung gi khams I/_sna'i dbang po e/_reg bya ai/_ngag gi dbang po ya/_bshang ba 'dzag pa yA/_'di dag sgrib pa dang bral ba shar du dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan mas rtogs 
[\[45a.2\]]par bya'o/_/tshor ba'i phung po r-i/_me'i khams r-I/_mig gi dbang po ar/_ro Ar/_lag pa'i dbang po ra/_'gro ba rA/_'di dag sgrib pa dang bral ba lhor thig le gnyis kyi mtshan mas rtogs par bya'o/_/'du shes kyi phung po u/_chu'i khams U/_lce'i dbang po o/_
[\[45a.3\]]yul gzugs au/_rkang pa'i dbang po wa/_len pa wA/_'di dag sgrib pa dang bral ba dbus kyi mtshan ma'i byang du thig le'i mtshan mas rtogs par bya'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po l-i/_sa'i khams l-I/_lus kyi dbang po a la/_yul dri A la/_bshad las kyi dbang po la/_brjod pa lA/_'di dag 
[\[45a.4\]]sgrib pa dang bral ba nub tu thod pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan mas rtogs par bya'o/_/'di dag ni sum cu rtsa drug gi dbye bas tha dad pa dbyangs dang yon tan dang 'phel ba dang ya Nar bsgyur ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o/_/gang du phung po rnams sum cu rtsa drug gi dbye bas tha dad par gyur pa der phung po'i gnas su ro drug gzung 
[\[45a.5\]]bar bya ste/_skyur ba dang bska ba dang khab dang tsha ba dang mngar ba dang lan tshwa rnams so/_/aM a i r-i u l-i zhes pa ro drug ste lhag ma ni brjod pa'i tshogs so/_/stong pa chen po yi ge lnga sum cu rtsa drug gi bdag nyid de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyis rdo rjer brjod de de 'dzin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/_/
[\[45a.6\]]thig le stong pa yi ge drug ni e yig chos 'byung rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di lta ste rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang nam mkha'i khams dang rna ba dang chos kyi dbyings dang b+ha ga dang khu ba 'pho ba ste 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i 
[\[45a.7\]]stong pa nyid do/_/dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i steng du 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ka sde'i bdag nyid ka yig gsal byed brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa dang po'o/_/'du byed kyi phung po dang rlung gi khams dang sna dang reg bya dang ngag dang bshang ba 'dzag pa ste 'di rnams sgrib 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/shar gyi mtshan ma'i shar du 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma tsa sde'i bdag nyid tsa yig gsal byed brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa gnyis pa'o/_/tshor ba'i phung po dang me'i khams dang mig dang ro dang lag pa dang 'gro ba ste 
[\[45b.2\]]'di rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/lho'i mtshan ma'i lhor 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma Ta sde'i bdag nyid Ta yig gsal byed brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa gsum pa'o/_/'du shes kyi phung po dang chu'i khams dang lce dang gzugs dang 
[\[45b.3\]]rkang pa'i dbang po dang len pa ste 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/byang gi mtshan ma'i byang du 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma pa sde'i bdag nyid pa yig gsal byed brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa bzhi pa'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po dang sa'i khams 
[\[45b.4\]]dang lus kyi dbang po dang dri dang bshang lam dang brjod pa ste 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/nub kyi mtshan ma'i nub tu 'di'i ming gi mtshan ma ta sde'i bdag nyid ta yig gsal byed brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa lnga pa'o/_/ye shes 
[\[45b.5\]]kyi phung po dang ye shes kyi khams dang yid dang sgra dang mchog gi dbang po dang dri chu 'dzag pa ste 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/dbus ma gzhom du med pa'i mtshan ma'i 'og tu 'di'i ming gi mtshan mas sde'i bdag nyid sa yig gsal byed 
[\[45b.6\]]brjod du med pa ste thig le stong pa drug pa'o/_/de ltar na thig le stong pa yi ge drug ni chos 'byung rdo rje 'dzin pa e yig ste stong pa nyid dmigs pa dang bcas pa pra phab pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/'dir phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnams ni/_ka kha ga g+ha nga /_
[\[45b.7\]]tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ta tha da d+ha na/_sa \u0f89\u0fa4 Sha sha \u0f88\u0f90/_ha ya ra wa la k+Sha/_zhes pa ste/_dbyangs dang gsal byed 'di dag gi yang thung ngu dang ring po'i dbye bas phung po dang /_khams la sogs pa'i dbye ba shes par bya'o/_/lus kyi 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]dbye bas phung po dang dbang po ni dbyangs dang gsal byed thung ngu'i chos rnams yin la khams dang yul ni dbyangs dang gsal byed ring po'i chos rnams so/_/ro drug dang khams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i dbye bas khams sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ba dang /_phung po 
[\[46a.2\]]drug dbang po drug gi dbye bas phung po sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ro drug dang khams drug dang dbang po drug dang yul drug dang las kyi dbang po drug dang las kyi dbang po'i yul drug ni ro drug dang khams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs 
[\[46a.3\]]pa rnam par shes pa drug dang /_de bzhin du 'du byed drug dang tshor ba drug dang /_'du shes drug dang gzugs kyi phung po drug dang /_ye shes kyi phung po drug ni phung po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o/_/'chad par 'gyur bar rgya cher brjod par bya ste le'u dang po 'dir ni mdor 
[\[46a.4\]]bsdus pa tsam zhig nye bar bstan to/_/'dir stong pa chen po yi ge lnga ni dbyangs kyi tshogs te khu ba dang zla ba zhes brjod do/_/thig le stong pa yi ge drug ni gsal byed kyi tshogs te rdul dang nyi ma zhes brjod do/_/'dir khu ba dang zla ba ni waM yig ste rdo rje'o/_/rdul dang nyi ma ni e 
[\[46a.5\]]yig ste pad+ma'o/_/rdo rje dang pad+ma 'di gnyis gcig pa nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste rdo rje ni mchog gi bde ba dang ye shes dang khu ba'o/_/sems dpa' ni rnam pa thams cad pa dang shes rab kyi gzugs dang shes bya dang nyi ma dang ye shes dang rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_
[\[46a.6\]]sgrib pa dang bral ba dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa dang /_de nyid dang 'gro ba'i don byed pa po yin no/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes gcig tu sbyor ba 'di nyid zhal bzhi'i rgyur 'gyur te/_ye shes ni nub kyi zhal ser po'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni shar gyi zhal nag 
[\[46a.7\]]po'o/_/zla ba dang sku ni byang gi zhal dkar po'o/_/nyi ma dang gsung ni lho'i zhal dmar po'o/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di dag ni gtso bo dang phal pa'i dbye bas khams drug drug tu rtogs par bya ste/_de dag kyang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang ro chen po'i cha shas so/_/'di 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]rnams la khu ba las byung ba gsum dang /_byung ba ma yin pa gsum ste/_chu'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang ro'i khams te/_khams 'di dag ni khu ba las byung ba'o/_/ro'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi ming ngo /_/rdul las byung ba gsum dang byung ba ma yin pa 
[\[46b.2\]]gsum ste/_sa'i khams dang me'i khams dang ro chen po'i khams te/_khams 'di dag ni rdul las byung ba'o/_/'dir ro chen po ni ye shes kyi khams kyi ming ngo /_/khams lhag ma dag ni khu ba dang rdul las byung ba'o/_/de ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dag las 
[\[46b.3\]]byung ba'i khams gsum po rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems su 'gyur te/_zla ba'i khams rnams thabs kyi lus dang ngag dang sems dang /_nyi ma'i khams rnams shes rab kyi lus dang ngag dang sems te khu ba dang rdul 
[\[46b.4\]]las byung ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro/_/khams 'di dag ni dbang po drug la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs drug go/_/de bzhin du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs ni ngo bo nyid kyi rigs dang lhan cig rigs bzhir 'gyur ro/_/sku gsum sku bzhir 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs 
[\[46b.5\]]gsum gnas skabs bzhir 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khams lnga'i rigs ni ye shes kyi khams dang lhan cig rigs drug tu 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi phung po lnga'i rigs ni ye shes kyi phung po dang lhan cig rigs drug tu 'gyur ro/_/bu mo la lo bcu 
[\[46b.6\]]gnyis dang /_skyes pa la lo bcu drug gis te/_bu mo la rdul gyi dus ji srid par rigs gsum dang rigs lngar rig par bya'o/_/skyes pa la khu ba 'pho ba'i dus ji srid par rigs gsum dang rigs lngar rig par bya'o/_/ye shes kyi khams byung ba'i dus nas 'chi ba'i 
[\[46b.7\]]bar du gnyis ka la rigs bzhi dang rigs drug go/_/de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid/_/rang bzhin gcig dang rigs brgya'o/_/zhes so/_/da ni rigs kyi rigs can brjod pa sangs rgyas 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]zhes pa la sogs pa'o/_/'dir sangs rgyas ni ye shes dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa phung po drug go/_/lha dang lha min yang zhes pa'i yang yig gis byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi dbang po la sogs pa drug dang de bzhin du khams drug dang yul drug dang /_de bzhin 
[\[47a.2\]]du khro bo drug las kyi dbang po drug dang /_khro bo'i lha mo drug las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug go/_/lha ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs bcu gnyis la 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams te/_de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa brgyad do/_/lha min ni klu'i rgyal po 
[\[47a.3\]]rnams dang lha mo khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so/_/da ni mu stegs pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang bzhin dang skyes bu brjod do/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo/_/'byung dang sdud par byed 
[\[47a.4\]]pa mo/_/rang nyid byed po rang 'phrog po/_/rang nyid rgyal po rang gtso bo/_/zhes pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ste/_don dam par byed pa po dang 'phrog pa po med do/_/mu stegs byed rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'i chos rang bzhin dang skyes bu la sogs pa gzhan yang ngo /_/
[\[47a.5\]]'dir mu stegs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid dang skyes bu nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/_/de la rtsa ba'i rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_sems can rnams kyi bzhi pa'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa nam mkha'i khams so/_/chen po la sogs pa bdun 
[\[47a.6\]]ni rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang yid dang blo dang nga rgyal lo/_/rnam pa bcu drug ni rnam par 'gyur ba ste/_dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang las kyi dbang po lnga dang mchog gi dbang bo ste/_rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/
[\[47a.7\]]'dir skyes bu ni khyab byed nyid yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin yang ma yin rnam par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/_/phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid grub ste/_phyi rol du khams lnga dang sgra gcan dang nyi ma dang zla ba zhes pa ni rang bzhin brgyad 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]do/_/bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang /_sa la sogs pa rnams kyi ro drug ni rnam par 'gyur ba bcu drug ste/_kha cig ni dbang po la sogs pa rnams dang 'tsho ba'i lus drug ces so/_/de bzhin du lus la sna tshogs tshad ni nang gi 
[\[47b.2\]]le'ur brjod par bya'o/_/srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa zhes pa la/_'dir phyi rol du srid pa gsum ni 'jig rten gyi khams yin la nang du ni mi'i lus kyi khams so/_/de'i bkod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bshad du gsol zhes pa bya ba'i nges pa'o/_/lha dang 
[\[47b.3\]]lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang zhes pa ni 'dir lha rnams nyin mo longs spyod cing lha ma yin rnams mtshan mo longs spyod de de bzhin du byang du bgrod pa dang lhor bgrod pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi'i bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol zhes 
[\[47b.4\]]pa la/_'dir 'jig rten gyi bden pas tshon dang thig gdab pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_don dam pa'i bden pas nam mkha'i khams la thig gdab pa dang bral zhing /_tshon dgye ba dang bral ba kha dog dang phyag dang dbyibs kyi gzugs kyi lha rnam par rtog 
[\[47b.5\]]pas bsgoms pa'i sems dang bral ba/_rnam pa thams cad pa me long gi pra phab pa lta bu bshad du gsol zhes pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dbang ni chu dang cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang rdo rje dril bu dang brtul zhugs chen po dang ming dang rjes su gnang ba ste bdun no/_/de 
[\[47b.6\]]bzhin du gong ma ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa ni bzhi pa ste thams cad yang dag par bshad du gsol lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa'i yul 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rdo rje slob dpon 
[\[47b.7\]]rdzas la brkam pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_phyug po rdzas kyis mngon par khengs pa rnams kyi khyim du song nas rdzas kyi don du chos 'tshong bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzas la chags pas skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ster bar 'gyur ba dang 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]dang po rgyal po la sogs pa'i ma ngag gzhug pa phyi nas bla mar 'gyur ba dang /_rdzas kyis dman pa mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su btang zhing sems can skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa gzhan rnams la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang mi ster bar 
[\[48a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_de dag rnams la nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzas kyi dbang gis gdug pa'i sems can rnams la rdo rje'i tshig rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan yang rdo rje'i tshig mi shes pa phan tshun rtsod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_mkhas 
[\[48a.3\]]pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rgyud kyi don mi shes pa rnams kyang rgyud kyi 'grel bshad byed par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi ris rnams sems can rnams kyi bla mar gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig phyin ci log tu ston par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dbang po gnyis las skyes 
[\[48a.4\]]pa'i bde bar byis pa'i blo can rnams la ston par 'gyur ba dang /_gsum pa shes rab ye shes de nyid bzhi pa ste/_de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i sgra rgyu dang 'bras bu dbye ba med pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes gsum pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su smra 
[\[48a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i yul gang du mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis/_glegs bam mthong nas dbang bskur med par rdo rje theg pa ston pa po byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir/_de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi gdug pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi 
[\[48a.6\]]'jug pa gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud dang /_rgyud gzhan thams cad du bzhi pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gsal por ma mdzad de/_rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /_bsdus pa'i rgyud rnams su bzhi pa shes rab ye shes dang /_phyag 
[\[48a.7\]]rgya chen po bsgom pa du ba la sogs pa'i lam shin tu sbas shing /_rtsa ba'i rgyud 'ga' zhig la rab tu gsal lo/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di dang /_bsdus pa'i rgyud la yang bzhi pa shes rab ye shes rab tu gsal zhing phyag 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rgya chen po bsgom pa du ba la sogs pa'i lam yang rab tu gsal ba/_rdo rje slob dpon brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ma yin pa ste/_dper na sngags kyi lha dang /_phyi rol gyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs dang /_dpa' bo'i rim pa dang /_rang 
[\[48b.2\]]byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa yang /_bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ma yin pa bzhin no/_/rnam par dag pa'i rim pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa po 'di/_mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la rab tu gsal bar glegs bam du bris 
[\[48b.3\]]te/_chu bo shI ta'i byang du sems can skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems kyi lhag par mos pa mkhyen nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing /_phyag na rdo rjes glegs bam la bris pa'o/_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa tshad mar byas nas/_sems 
[\[48b.4\]]can rnams the tshom med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa des na/_sngags kyi theg pa'i tshul thams cad kyi nges pa'i don/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la yang dag par bstan to/_/de'i phyir gang gis mchog gi dang po'i sangs 
[\[48b.5\]]rgyas mi shes pa des mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mi shes so/_/gang gis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mi shes pa des rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku mi shes so/_/gang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku mi shes pa des sngags kyi theg pa mi shes so/_/gang gis 
[\[48b.6\]]sngags kyi theg pa mi shes pa de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba pa ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lam dang bral ba'o/_/de lta bas na mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas ni bla ma dam pa rnams kyis bstan par bya zhing /_thar pa don du gnyer pa'i slob ma dam pa rnams kyis mnyan 
[\[48b.7\]]par bya'o/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las/_dkyil 'khor dang dbang la sogs pa bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus te drug pa'o//_//
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]da ni sdud par byed pa po 'jam dpal gyis zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig yang dag par bsdus pa de nyid bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/
[\[49a.2\]]zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu zhes pa la zla ba bzang po ni bod pa ste kye zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu'o/_/gang las ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor 'di ni rab mchog lha dang mi la sogs pa rnams kyis shes pa ma yin pas de'i phyir bdag 
[\[49a.3\]]mgu'o/_/'dir rab mchog lha rnams ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris la sogs pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar nye bar son pa rnams so/_/mi ni 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'o/_/srin po ni bden bral la sogs pa'o/_/lha min ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs 
[\[49a.4\]]pa'o/_/klu ni mtha' yas la sogs pa'o/_/chags bral ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa'o/_/thub mchog ni drang srong mi sbyin la sogs pa ste 'di dag gi rigs rnams kyis so/_/rab mchog lha dang mi la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis shes pa ma yin pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i 
[\[49a.5\]]rnal 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug ces pa gang gi dang po mya ngan las 'das pa ye shes kyi khams dang mtha' 'dzin mas ste dbus su ma brjod pa nyid las nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu'i khams so/_/nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams 'di dag ni 
[\[49a.6\]]khyab par bya ba ste/_khyab par byed pa ni ye shes kyi khams so/_/de ltar khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i 'brel pas rnal 'byor te/_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_/sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang ni/_/rnam shes khams 
[\[49a.7\]]drug par brjod pa/_/skyes bu chen po'i gang zag go/_/zhes so/_/tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas zhes pa la tshig ni rnam pa gnyis te A li kA li'i bdag nyid can no/_/de dag gi bgrod pa ni tshig gi bgrod pa ste mgrin pa dang rkan dang spyi bo dang mchu dang so'i gnas rnams las dbyangs 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]dang gsal byed rnams brjod pa'o/_/bgrod pa de dang bcas pa ni sngags kyi brdas rab tu brjod pa'o/_/'dir sngags kyi brda ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni sngags kyi brda yin la gnyis pa ni de kho na nyid kyi brda'o/_/de la sngags kyi brda ni rab tu brjod pa ste 'jig rten pa'o/_/de 
[\[49b.2\]]kho na nyid ni dam pa'i don can tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'o/_/gang du rab tu brjod pa'i brda yin pa der oM AHhU~M zhes pa la sogs pa sngags kyi ming ngo /_/gang du de kho na nyid kyi brda yin pa der a yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste gdod mnas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dang /_de bzhin 
[\[49b.3\]]du sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung /_/a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog_/don chen yi ge dam pa yin/_/srog chen po ste skye ba med/_/tshig tu brjod 
[\[49b.4\]]pa spangs pa ste/_/brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog_/tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/_/ces dang /_yang de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/_gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge med/_/gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa/_/stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/_/thig le stong pa yi ge 
[\[49b.5\]]drug_/ces so/_/de kho na nyid dam pa'i don can gyi brda sngags kyi theg pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa ye shes kyi khams gzhom du med cing brjod du med pa ste/_brjod du med pa'i dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi mtshan nyid can no zhes so/_/
[\[49b.6\]]nam mkha'i khams la sogs pa'i sngags kyi brda rab tu brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can mgrin pa la sogs pa nas brjod pa'i chos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/_'dir a ku ha rnam par bcad pa ni mgrin pa las so/_/i tsu ya sha ni rkan las so/_/r-i Tu ra Sha ni spyi bo las so/_/
[\[49b.7\]]u pu wa \u0f89\u0fa4 ni mchu las so/_/l-i tu la sa ni so las so/_/de bzhin du gnas gnyis pa dang gnas gsum pa dang /_gnas bzhi pa dang gnas lnga pa'i sngags te brtsegs pa'i sngags rnams kyang rab tu brjod pa'i brdas rig par bya'o/_/ming gi rang bzhin can de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i slad du ming can gyi dngos po rnams go bar byed pa'o/_/de kho na nyid kyi brda tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa dam pa'i don can las kyi phyag rgya dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub spangs pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 
[\[50a.2\]]slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las nges par bstan to/_/sbyor ba 'di mtha' dag ni lus dbus su ste/_dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sems can thams cad kyis sgrib pa med pa'i gnas thob par bya ba'i slad du bdag gis 
[\[50a.3\]]bshad par bya yis mi'i bdag po bzang po khyod nyon cig ces pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig bsdus pa'i mdor bstan pa'o_/da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bsdus pa sdud par byed pa po 'jam dpal gyis mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las dus kyi stong pa 
[\[50a.4\]]rnam pa las zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas bstan pa bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/sngags kyi tshul 'di la bsngags pa ni/_theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la/_/theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/_gang theg pa 
[\[50a.5\]]gsum gyi dgongs pa mi shes pa de ni dus las thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi theg pa la ldem por dgongs pa'i skad gzhan mi shes pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang /_tshogs khang dang gtsug lag khang gi rdzas la nye bar longs spyod pa 
[\[50a.6\]]byas pa dang /_rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyogs gzung bas phyi rol gyi yul nye bar longs spyod pa la chags par gyur na/_slob dpon gyi chas kyis dkon mchog gsum la co dris nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'dir 'jig rten pha rol dang 'jig rten 'di'i don du sems can rnams 
[\[50a.7\]]kyis ma nyes par bya ba'i rgan pa bzhi ste/_de dag las ye shes kyi rgan pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dge slong ngam/_khyim pa mchod par 'os pa dge slong bcu dang mnyam par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/_/de 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]med na dka' thub kyis rgan pa ni ngur smrig 'dzin pa ste/_ngur smrig 'dzin pa rnams las lo dang /_sngags pa rnams dbang gis rgan pa khyim pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis thams cad du phyag bya ste/_dka' thub kyis rgan pa'i phyir dang /_khyim pa rnams la mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir 
[\[50b.2\]]ro/_/thos pas rgan pa ni mkhas pa mchod par 'os pa/_bstan pa gsal bar byed pa phas kyi rgol ba bdud kyi rigs rnams 'dul bar byed pa ste/_'di dag ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du sems can rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o/_/nor gyis rgan pa ni rgyal po ste 'jig rten 'di'i 
[\[50b.3\]]longs spyod don du gnyer ba rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o/_/de ltar rgan po bzhi ni sems can rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o/_/de'i phyir theg pa gsum shes pa po ni dka' thub kyis rgan pa ste/_khyim pa la ni ji srid dka' thub par ma gyur bar nyan thos kyi theg pa las so sor 
[\[50b.4\]]thar pa mnyan pa'i skabs med do//_//de'i phyir khyim pa ni mngon shes dang ldan pa ma gtogs par rgan por mi 'gyur zhing khyim pa rab tu byung ba dang bral ba rnams tshogs khang dang gtsug lag khang la nye bar longs spyod pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa gang du yang ma 
[\[50b.5\]]gsungs so/_/de bas na theg pa gsum yongs su shes par bya ba'i slad du dang por bye brag tu smra ba'i gzhung la brten nas rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yod cing de bzhin du khur khur ba'i gang zag yod de rtag pa'am mi rtag par bdag mi smra'o zhes bcom ldan 
[\[50b.6\]]'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_chags pa dang 'jig pa'i dus kyang rig par bya'o/_/des na chags pa ni 'byung ba'i dus kyi dbang gi stong pa rnams las zhes pa la stong pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis mig la sogs pa'i 
[\[50b.7\]]dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdul phra rab kyi ngo bos rnam par gnas pa sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro'i rdzas yon tan lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi rang bzhin rnams dang /_yon tan drug pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par byed pa ni stong pa rnams so/_/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]stong pa rdul phra rab de rnams las 'byung ba'i dus kyi dbang gis rlung zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab de rnams kyi nang nas dang por re zhig rlung gi rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun 'byar bar 'gyur ro/_/'byar ba de las yang zhing g.yo ba nyid du bgrod pa ni rlung zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du me'i rdul phra 
[\[51a.2\]]rab rnams kun du 'byar bar gyur pa rlung dang ldan pa'i glog ni me zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du chu'i rdul phra rab rnams 'dus pa kun du 'byar bar gyur pa rlung dang me dang ldan pa'i char ni chu zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du sa'i rdul phra rab kun du 'byar ba nam mkha' la dbang po'i gzhur snang ba ni 
[\[51a.3\]]'dzin ma zhes brjod do/_/ro'i rdul phra rab rnams ni thams cad du khyab par byed pa ste/_de ltar stong pa lnga rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma rnams su 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par 'dzin pa dang srub pa dang dbyibs kyi rlung gi mthu las gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang zhes pa la gling ni bdun 
[\[51a.4\]]no/_/ri bo ni bdun no/_/rgya mtsho ni bdun no/_/rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong zhes pa la rgyu skar ni nyi shu rtsa bdun dang de'i 'brel pa mtha' yas pa'o/_/nyi zla ni zlum po'i rnam pa'o/_/skar ma gza' yi tshogs zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid du skar ma'i rnam pa can bkra 
[\[51a.5\]]shis la sogs pa rnams so/_/drang srong ni skar ma bdun no/_/lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang /_zhes pa la lha ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris la sogs pa'o/_/'byung po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa'o/_/klu ni mtha' yas la sogs pa'o/_/dud 'gro skye gnas rnam 
[\[51a.6\]]pa bzhi dang zhes pa la sgo nga las skyes pa ni nam mkha' lding la sogs pa ste rlung gi skye gnas so/_/mngal nas skyes pa ni glang po'i dbang po la sogs pa ste me'i skye gnas so/_/drod gsher las skyes pa ni srin bu dang phye ma leb dang grog sbur la sogs pa ste chu'i skye gnas so/_/rdzus 
[\[51a.7\]]te skyes pa ni ljon pa la sogs pa ste sa'i skye gnas so/_/de bzhin du rdzus te skyes pa chen po ni ro'i skye gnas so/_/sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu zhes pa las zhes pa ni lung gi tshig go/_/sna tshogs kyang de yin la sa yang yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs sa ste/_gling bdun gyi rang bzhin dang dum bu 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin no/_/de'i 'og ni sna tshogs sa'i 'og ste klu'i srid pa dang dmyal ba'i srid pa bdun no/_/sna tshogs sa de la mi rnams dang 'og dmyal ba'i srid par dmyal ba rnams te yang yig ni bsdu ba'i don to/_/stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste/_chu la lan tshwa dang ni 
[\[51b.2\]]sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin zhes pa ni 'dir brtan pa rnams skyed pa la lan tshwa dang g.yo ba rnams skyed pa la sgo nga dper 'gyur te/_dang zhes pa ni sdud pa'o/_/dper na nyi ma'i 'od kyi sbyor ba las lan tshwa chu'i rdul phra rab rnams lan tshwa sra ba nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du lhun po la sogs 
[\[51b.3\]]pa brtan pa rnams so/_/dper na khu ba zhu ba'i rdul phra rab rnams sgo nga'i dbus su gdong ba'i lus la sogs pa'i cha shas nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du g.yo ba sems can rnams rig par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'byung ba ni le'u lnga par rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/'jig 
[\[51b.4\]]rten gyi khams bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus chen po'o/_/da ni 'jam dpal gyis lus dang zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma'i rim pas bstan pa rdo rje'i lus bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa bdag gis dgrol bar bya ste/_lus zhes pa ni zla ba sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/ye shes zhes pa 
[\[51b.5\]]ni nyi ma sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/nam mkha' zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams sgrib pa dang bral ba ste de bzhin du rlung gi khams dang me'i khams dang chu'i khams dang sa'i khams so/_/brtan pa zhes pa ni khams lnga'i bdag nyid brtan pa'i khams sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/g.yo ba zhes 
[\[51b.6\]]pa ni khams drug gi bdag nyid kyi gang zag gi khams sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/lha ni mthong ba skyed min dag dang zhes pa ni lha yang de yin la mthong ba skyed min yang yin pa de ni lha ni mthong ba skyed min te/_gzugs med pa'i srid pa rnam par shes pa'i nga rgyal tsam dang ldan pa nam mkha' 
[\[51b.7\]]mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o/_/de ltar lus la sogs pa rdo rje ye shes kyi rten srid pa rnam pa bcur de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rdo rje'i lus las sngags kyi skye gnas thig le la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bdag po ni bod pa'o/_/'dir sngags 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]kyi skye gnas ni zla ba las thig le dang /_nyi ma las rnam par bcad pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams las a dang rlung gi khams las i dang me'i khams las r-i dang chu'i khams las u dang sa'i khams las l-i dang brtan pa'i khams las gsal byed ma dang g.yo ba'i 
[\[52a.2\]]khams las gsal byed k+Sha dang gzugs med pa'i khams las gsal byed ha yig ste/_sngags kyi tshig 'di dag g.yon skor gyis dgod par bya'o/_/de ltar gsal byed snga ma gsal byed phyi ma'i steng du 'gro'o/_/l-i yig la sogs pa rnams ni i ka ni a tsa la ya Na'o zhes pas 
[\[52a.3\]]ya Nar bsgyur te mtha'i a yig gis yang dag par sbyar ro/_/rnam par bcad pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o/_/thig le zlum po'o/_/ye shes rtse mo'i rnam pa'o/_/yon tan dang 'phel ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyi sngags kyi skye gnas ni 'di lta ste/_ha k+Sha ma l-i u r-i i aHh+k+Sh+m+l+W+R+YaM 
[\[52a.4\]]zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshogs dang rdo rje'i lus te nam mkha'i khams la ya yig rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du ra yig me'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du wa yig chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du la yig sa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du ma yig 
[\[52a.5\]]lhun po rnam pa lnga pa'o/_/de'i steng du k+Sha yig pad+ma'i tshul gyis g.yo ba'i tshogs so/_/de'i steng du gzugs med pa'i tshogs ha yig go/_/ha yig las rnam par bcad pa nyi ma dang thig le zla ba dang nA da rdo rje'i mtshan ma rtse gcig pa ste/_de ltar rdo rje'i lus dang 'jig 
[\[52a.6\]]rten gyi khams dang dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa ni 'chad par 'gyur bas bshad par bya'o/_/de ltar sngags kyi skye gnas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing slar yang 'di nyid du grol te zhes pa ni slar yang sdud pa'i dus su 'di nyid la grol ba ste thim par 'gyur zhes pa'o/_/de ltar gang gis yang 
[\[52a.7\]]dag rig pa zhes pa ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas sgrib pa dang bral ba 'dis rdo rje'i lus gang su zhig gis rig pa'o/_/de ni phyugs min zhes pa phyugs de mi shes pa'o/_/sems kyi kun du rtog pa dag las grol zhes pa la kun du rtog pa ni dkyil 'khor du brtags pa'i chos te de las 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]grol ba ni sems kyi kun du rtog pa dag las grol ba'o/_/rnam pa bcu po 'di mdor bsdus pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa la bstod pa las de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/_/thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag_/
[\[52b.2\]]kun gyi don ni ma lus byed/_/rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/_/thog ma med pa spros med bdag_/de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag_/bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/gnyis med gnyis su med par gsung /_/yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/_/
[\[52b.3\]]bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/_/mu stegs [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ngan 'jigs byed/_/ces so/_/rdo rje'i lus bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus so/_/da ni sgra gcan la sogs pa 'byung ba bsdus pa'i tshigs bcad drug pa g.yon gyi yan lag ces pa la sogs pa bdag gis dgrol bar bya ste/_g.yon 
[\[52b.4\]]gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba zhes pa la sngar brjod pa'i gzhom du med pa dbus na gnas pa 'khyog po phyed kyi mtshan ma'i ming can gyi g.yon gyi yan lag tu thig le gcig ste/_de yang dkar po 'bar ba ces pa ye shes dkar po'i 'od zer ro/_/'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha ni cha shas 
[\[52b.5\]]nyid do/_/g.yas su dmar po'i mdog ces pa ni gzhom du med pa de'i g.yas su rnam par bcad pa'i mtshan ma'i ming can dmar po 'bar ba ye shes dmar po'i 'od zer ro/_/de dag gi phyi rol g.yon dang g.yas su yang grangs ji lta bar sgra gcan dang dus mer 'gyur ro/_/de nas zla ba dang 
[\[52b.6\]]nyi mar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gza' lag dang bkra shis dang /_pa sangs dang phur bu dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang spen pa dang /_char dang glog dang /_chu dang me ste zung bdun pa'o/_/'jig rten la ni 'jig rten gyi khams la gnas pa ste/_de nyid ni nges pa'i don to/_/'di rnams 
[\[52b.7\]]la sngags kyi tshig ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin g.yon dang g.yas su/_a~M aHu r-i/_U rI/_o ar/_o Ar/_wa ra/_wA rA/_zhes pa zung bdun ni gza' bdun po rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha'o/_/mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o/_/zhes pa mun pa dang bral ba dkar po 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]dang dmar po'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gzhom du med pa'i g.yon dang g.yas la gnas pa ni gzhom du med pa'i yan lag yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no/_/rgyab tu ser po yang zhes pa la/_yang yig gis ni ye shes ser po'i 'od zer ro zhes pa'i don to/_/
[\[53a.2\]]gzhom du med pa'i rgyab tu thod pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan ma'i ming can no/_/de'i phyi rol rnam pa dang bcas pa'i nub tu ser po 'bar ba'o/_/de nas skar ma phra mo dang skar ma sbom po'o/_/de bzhin du lha'i gzhu'o/_/sa ni rnam pa gnyis te sa dang rdo ba'i gzugs so/_/de ltar ser po 'bar 
[\[53a.3\]]ba de ni rnam pa bzhi dang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o/_/zhes pa ni gzhom du med pa de'i steng du 'od zer ljang khu ste phyi rol du stong pa'i sa bon las byung ba srog gi rlung ngo /_/'og tu 'od zer sngon po ste 
[\[53a.4\]]phyi rol du ye shes kyi sa bon las byung ba thur du sel ba'i rlung ngo /_/mdun du 'od zer nag po ste phyi rol du mnyam gnas zhes bya ba'i rlung ngo /_/de nas gyen du rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin du khyab byed dang klu dang rus sbal dang rtsangs pa dang lha sbyin dang nor las rgyal ba ste rlung bcu'o/_/'di dag 
[\[53a.5\]]las 'og dang steng du zung gcig ste shar dang nub tu ni rlung dang sa zung bdun no/_/nor las rgyal ba ni ma ning ste shi ba'i lus yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/'di rnams la sngags kyi tshig ni steng dang 'og tu ha hA'o/_/shar dang nub tu grangs ji lta bas/_a A/_i li/_-I l-I/_e 
[\[53a.6\]]al ai Al/_ya la/_yA lA k+Sha zhes pa zung bdun ni shar dang nub tu'o/_/steng 'og zung gcig ni mun pa'i mthar ro/_/zung bdun po rnams ni thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas gza' bdun po rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha'o/_/gza' nyi ma la mtshan phyed nas shar nas 'char ba la 
[\[53a.7\]]a/_lho nas 'char ba la aH_nub nas 'char ba la A/_byang nas 'char ba la aM/_zla ba la/_i r-i l-i u/_bkra shis la I r-I l-I U/_gza' lag la e ar al o/_phur bu la ai Ar Al au pa sangs la ya ra la wa/_spen pa la yA rA lA wA zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bzhin gza' bdun po rnams kyi sa bon no/_/dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon zhes pa ni steng dang 'og dang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi sa bon rnams kyi dbus kyi gzhom du med pa gri gug gi rnam pa rdo rje'o/_/de'i steng gi sa bon rjes su nga ro ste g.yon gyi yan lag la gang gnas pa 
[\[53b.2\]]de steng du 'gyur ro/_/rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas zhes pa ni rjes su nga ro'i nus pa rnam par bcad pa'o/_/de'i yon tan ni 'od zer dmar po yin la de dang bcas pa'i nus pa ni yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa ste rjes su nga ro'i 'og tu zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pas gnas 
[\[53b.3\]]pa'o/_/rang gi nus pa zhes pas ma gsungs pa nyid las shar dang nub kyi mtshan ma ni gzhom du med pa'i rkang pa dang mgo bo la'o/_/de ltar na stong pa chen po yi ge lnga ni rdo rje sems dpa'i yul la wa~M yig ste rdo rje yan lag med pa'i sgrub pa la ha~M yig go/_/de'i phyi rol du thig le 
[\[53b.4\]]stong pa yi ge drug ni wa~M yig gi phyogs la rten e yig ces brjod cing ha~M yig gi phyogs la skye gnas k+Sha yig ste rdo rje dang pad+ma yang ngo /_/kun du ye shes dang ni stong pa zhes pa la ye shes kyi sgras gzhom du med pa'i steng gi rnam par bcad pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa ste kun du zhes pa ni phyi rol 
[\[53b.5\]]gyi yi ge thams cad la 'gyur ro/_/stong pa ni thams cad la thig le'o/_/zhib gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol zhes pa la zhi ba ni gzhom du med pa'o/_/de'i gnas ni shar dang nub kyi mtshan ma ste de dang bcas pa'i zhi ba dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol ba'o/_/de nyid 
[\[53b.6\]]kun du ste phyi rol gyi yi ge'i chos thams cad la rkang pa dang mgor rlung dang sa dag grangs ji lta ba bzhin no/_/mgo'i steng du cha dang cha'i steng du thig le dang thig le'i steng du nA da gzhom du med par brjod par bya'o/_/'di'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/_oM woM k+ShoM oM oMH_a~M A~M i~M yI~M r-iM r-IM 
[\[53b.7\]]l-iM l-IM u~M U~M e~M ai~M a ra~M A ra~M a la~M A la~M o~M au~M ha~M hA~M ya~M yA~M ra~M rA~M la~M lA~M wa~M wA~M k+Sha~M/_de ltar khyab par bya ba sngags kyi tshig thams cad la stong pa chen po yi ge lnga khyab par byed pa phor rig par bya'o/_/'di'i mdor bsdus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang /_/che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'dzin/_/rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/_/yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag_/ces dang /_de bzhin du cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po/_/phra mo sa bon zag pa med/_/rdul med rdul bral 
[\[54a.2\]]dri ma med/_/nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/_/ces so/_/sgra gcan la sogs pa 'byung ba bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus so/_/da ni a sogs sum cu zhes pa la sogs pas zla ba'i cha 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang nyi ma'i bgrod pas mtshan mo dang nyin mo 'phel ba dang 'grib pa la sogs pa bsdus 
[\[54a.3\]]pa'i tshigs bcad brgyad pa bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha yar wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang zhes pa ni a yig dang po yin pa'i i yig la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang a la sogs pa ste ha yar wa lar ldan thung ngu dang ring po dang yon tan dang 
[\[54a.4\]]'phel ba'o/_/ha la sogs pa ya Nar bsgyur ba thung ngu dang ring po'i dbye bas sum cur 'gyur ro/_/zla ba'i cha 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i rgyur gyur pa de dag kyang tshes gcig la sogs pa lnga'i dbye ba gsum du 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas dga' ba rnam pa gsum dang 
[\[54a.5\]]bzang po rnam pa gsum dang rgyal ba rnam pa gsum dang stong pa rnam pa gsum dang rdzogs pa rnam pa gsum ste/_mun pa dang rdul dang snying stobs kyi dbye ba dang chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas so/_/'phel ba'i cha bco lnga dkar po'i phyogs la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi ngo 
[\[54a.6\]]bos gnas pa rnam pa gsum mo/_/'dir tshes gcig a gnyis pa i gsum pa ri bzhi pa u/_lnga pa li/_dga' ba dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa ni nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khams rnams grangs ji lta ba bzhin te mun pa bsal ba dang po chung ngu'i 
[\[54a.7\]]tshad do/_/de nas rim pa gnyis pa la yon tan gyi dbye bas/_drug pa a/_bdun pa e/_brgyad pa ar/_dgu pa o/_bcu pa al/_dga' ba dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa ni nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khams rnams te/_dang po'i sde tshan gyi 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]mun pa bsal ba dang po chung ngu'i tshad gang yin pa de 'bring po'i tshad du gyur pa dang rdul bsal ba chung ngu'i tshad do/_/de nas sde tshan gsum pa la ha la sogs pa ya Nar bsgyur ba rnams te/_bcu gcig pa ha/_bcu gnyis pa ya/_bcu gsum par/_bcu bzhi pa wa/_zla ba nya ba la/_dga' 
[\[54b.2\]]ba dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa ni nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khams rnams te/_gnyis pa'i sde tshan gyi rdul 'bring po'i tshad dang /_dang po'i sde tshan gyi mun pa bsal ba chung ngu'i tshad ni chen po'i tshad do/_/'di'i dbye ba rnam pa lnga ste snying stobs kyi dbye 
[\[54b.3\]]bas bcu gcig pa la dang po'i tshes gcig gi cha chen po'i tshad bu mo'o/_/bcu gnyis pa la gzhon nu ma'o/_/bcu gsum pa la lang tsho ma'o/_/bcu bzhi ba la rgan mo'o/_/bco lnga pa la yongs su smin par gyur pa'o/_/de ltar tshes gcig gi cha bco lnga pa la yongs su smin par gyur pa ni rdzogs 
[\[54b.4\]]pa zhes mngon par brjod de de ltar dkar po'i phyogs la zla ba'i cha 'phel ba bco lnga'i dbye bas tha dad do/_/de'i mtha' nag po'i tshes gcig gi dang po la mun pa 'jug pa'i dus ni bcu drug pa'i cha zhes brjod de/_de'i mthar dkar po'i tshes gcig gi cha nag po'i tshes gcig gi mun pa la 
[\[54b.5\]]'jug par 'gyur te dkar po'i cha gnyis pa yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnyis pa yang gnyis pa'i mun pa la 'jug par 'gyur te/_gsum pa yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de yang nag po'i gsum pa'i mun pa la 'jug par 'gyur te de bzhin du bzhi pa la sogs 
[\[54b.6\]]pa cha bco lnga'i mthar thug pa yongs su smin pa rnams mun pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnam stong gi mthar cha dang po 'char ba'i mtshams dang cha bcu drug pa'i dang po'i cha la sgra gcan 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gzas zin pa rnam pa gnyis te nyal cha rdzogs pa'i mthar zla ba sgra 
[\[54b.7\]]gcan gyis 'dzin cing gnam stong la cha dang po 'char ba'i thog mar ro/_/'dir nag po'i phyogs la sa la sogs pa sdud pa'i rim pas mun pa 'jug ste de'i phyir spro ba'i rim pas shar pa rnams mdzad do/_/nag po'i tshes gcig sa'i mun pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig nam mkha'i khams 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]kyi cha zhugs te mun pas sgrib par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa rlung gi cha chu'i mun pas sgrib par 'gyur ro/_/gsum pa me'i cha me'i mun pas sgrib par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa chu'i cha rlung gi mun pas sgrib par 'gyur ro/_/lnga ba sa'i cha nam mkha'i khams kyi mun pas sgrib par 
[\[55a.2\]]'gyur te/_de ltar dang po'i sde tshan la mun pa 'jug pa chung ngu'i tshad du 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnyis pa'i sde tshan la yang mun pas sgrib pa'i bya ba brjod pa'i rim pas te sde tshan gnyis pa de la sde tshan dang po'i mun pa chung ngu'i tshad ni gnyis pa 'bring po'i tshad do/_/de bzhin du gsum pa'i sde 
[\[55a.3\]]tshan la yang mun pas sgrib pa'i bya ba ste sde tshan de la chung ngu'i tshad gnyis pa'i sde tshan la 'bring po'i tshad ni gsum pa chen po'i tshad do/_/de la chen po'i tshad kyi dbye ba rnam pa lnga ste mun pa chen po'i tshad kyi dbye ba bcu gcig pa la byis pa'o/_/bcu gnyis pa la gzhon nu'o/_/bcu 
[\[55a.4\]]gsum pa la lang tsho'o/_/bcu bzhi pa la rgan pa'o/_/gnam stong la yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa'i sde tshan la 'bring po'i tshad dang gsum pa'i sde tshan la mun pa chung ngu'i tshad kyi'o/_/de nas dkar po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid kyi 
[\[55a.5\]]mun pa smin pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa la chu'i mun pa'o/_/gsum pa la me'i mun pa'o/_/bzhi pa la rlung gi mun pa'o/_/lnga pa la nam mkha'i khams kyi mun pa'o/_/de ltar cha dang po chung ngu'i tshad sa rdzogs pa ni smin par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa rgan mo'o/_/gsum pa lang 
[\[55a.6\]]tsho ma'o/_/bzhi pa gzhon nu ma'o/_/lnga pa bu mo ste drug pa la sogs pa nub par gyur pa rnams gnas so/_/de ltar chung ngu'i sde tshan la cha chung ngu smin yang ji srid nag po'i phyogs la gsum pa chen po'i tshad smin par ma gyur par mun pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/so so'i bco lnga'i cha 'di 
[\[55a.7\]]dag nub par gyur pa rnams nyi ma bcu drug pa la 'char ro/_/shar ba rnams nyi ma bcu drug pa la nub par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs ni zla ba'i cha'i ming ste dkar po'i cha rnams dang mun pa zhugs pa nye bar btags pas nag po'i ming can rnams so/_/dkar po dang 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi dbyangs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/_aM iM r-iM uM l-iM/_aM eM/_a raM oM a la~M/_haM yaM paM paM laM/_lAHwAHrAHyAHhAH/_A laH_auH_AraH_eHAH/_l-IHUHr-IH_IHAH_zhes pa de dkar po'i phyogs la zla ba thig les 
[\[55b.2\]]brgyan pa cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/nag po'i phyogs la nyi ma rnam par bcad pas brgyan pa zla ba'i cha bco lnga sgrib par byed pa'o/_/thung ngu ni zla ba'o/_/ring po ni nyi ma'o/_/de bzhin du yon tan ni zla ba'o/_/'phel ba ni nyi ma ste ha la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/nyin phyed kyang ka la sogs pa'i sde 
[\[55b.3\]]rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me'i tshad kyis spyod par byed ces pa ni 'dir ka yig sde pa gang dag gi dang po yin pa de ni ka yig la sogs pa'i sde ste sde zhes pa ni yi ge lnga'i tshogs so/_/nam mkha' la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas lngar klog ste dbyangs kyi tshogs ni 
[\[55b.4\]]thams cad du nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbye bas klog go/_/'dir so sor sdud pa shes par byed pa ni gsal byed bklag pa thams cad la 'dir gsal byed dag pa sum cu ste ya yig la sogs pa gzhan du ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed bklag par ma bsdus shing a la sogs pa dbyangs 
[\[55b.5\]]kyi sde tshan du bklags pa rnams ni dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di lta ste a i r-i u l-i ka_/a e ar o al tsa/_ha ya ra wa la Ta ces dang /_de'i 'og tu nga nya Na ma na na/_g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha d+ha/_ga dza Da ba da da/_kha tsha Tha pha tha tha/_ka tsa Ta ba ta ta/_Th+ka sha Sha \u0f89\u0fa4 sas zhes pa ste dang 
[\[55b.6\]]po dang mtha' bklags pa las so/_/ya yig la sogs pa ni ka yig la sogs pa'i sde pa'i nang du mi 'gyur te rab tu brjod pas dbyangs kyi chos can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir gsal byed kyi bdag nyid ni sum cu ste ka la sogs pa sde pa drug po ka tsa Ta pa ta sa rnams ni nam 
[\[55b.7\]]mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin te/_mgrin pa dang rkan dang spyi bo dang mchu dang so las brjod pa'i dbang gis so/_/drug pa so sor brjod pa la khams lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/ka la sogs pa'i sde ba de rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa ste dbyangs ni a la 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]sogs pa thung ngu lnga dang ring po lnga ste bsres pa ni bcur 'gyur ro/_/thung ngu'i mthar rjes su nga ro ni dbyangs drug pa'o/_/ring po'i mthar rnam par bcad pa ni dbyangs drug pa'o/_/de dag kyang dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshungs par ldan pas brjod par bya ste dbyangs de dag dang 
[\[56a.2\]]ldan pa ni dbyangs dang bcas pa'o/_/nyin zhag stong drug me'i tshad kyis spyod par byed ces pa ni nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus te/_stong drug me yi tshad de dag gis zla ba bcu gnyis dang bgrod pa gnyis su yang 'gyur ro/_/lho dang byang gi bgrod pa so so la nyin zhag brgya brgyad cur 'gyur ro/_/'pho 
[\[56a.3\]]ba'i zla ba'i dbye bas kaR+ka Ta la sogs pa lhor bgrod pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa spro ba'i rim pas dbyangs thung ngu drug dang bcas pa'i sde pa drug nyi mas zla ba drug gis spyod do/_/de nas byang du bgrod pa las la sogs pa'i dbye bas dbyangs ring po dang bcas pa'i sde pa drug zla ba drug gis 
[\[56a.4\]]spyod do/_/gang du dbyangs thung ngu dang bcas pa spyod pa der mtshan mo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du dbyangs ring po dang bcas pa spyod pa der nyin mo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'dir lhor bgrod pa ni zla ba'o/_/byang du bgrod pa ni nyi ma'o/_/gsal byed gcig ni zla ba'o/_/gsal byed gnyis 
[\[56a.5\]]brtsegs pa ni nyi ma'o/_/gsal byed gsum brtsegs pa ni sgra gcan no/_/de bzhin du dbyangs thung ngu ni zla ba'o/_/ring po ni nyi ma'o/_/shin tu ring po ni sgra gcan no zhes pa ni thams cad du yin no/_/de ltar sgra gcan gyi shin tu ring po nyid la mun pa rnam pa gsum ste chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen 
[\[56a.6\]]po'i bdag nyid do/_/'dir kaR+ka Ta'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la spro ba'i dbye bas ka sde'i nga yig a yig dang bcas pa nyi mas spyod do/_/gnyis pa la ngi/_gsum pa la ng+R-i/_bzhi pa la ngu /_lnga pa la ng+l-i/_drug pa la ngaM /_de bzhin du nyin zhag bdun pa dang por byas nas nyin zhag bcu gnyis 
[\[56a.7\]]pa'i mthar g+ha yig spyod de ji ltar nga yig rnam par spyod pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du nyin zhag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi mthar thug pa ga yig dbyangs dang bcas pa spyod do/_/nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'i bar du kha yig spyod do/_/de bzhin du nyin zhag sum cu pa'i bar du ka yig dbyangs dang bcas 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]pa spyod do/_/stong pa'i nyin zhag 'ga' zhig la gzhom du med pa'o/_/de bzhin du seng ge'i 'pho ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu po rnams kyis nya yig la sogs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams spyod do/_/bu mo'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis Na yig la sogs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams spyod do/_/
[\[56b.2\]]srang gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis ma yig la sogs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams spyod do/_/sdig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis na yig la sogs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams spyod do/_/gzhu'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis \u0f88\u0f90 la sogs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa'i gsal 
[\[56b.3\]]byed rnams spyod do/_/de ltar na lhor bgrod pa la zla ba drug gi nyin zhag rnams kyis sde pa drug dbyangs dang bcas pa grangs brgya brgyad cu rnams zla ba'i rang bzhin mtshan mo 'phel ba'i dbye bas spyod do/_/de nas byang du bgrod pa'i dbye ba ni sa yig la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pas brjod 
[\[56b.4\]]de chu srin la sogs pa 'pho ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag gi dbye bas sde pa drug dbyangs dang bcas pa ni sdud pa'i rim pas dbyangs ring po dang bcas pa'i yi ge rnams nyi mas spyod do/_/'dir chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la s+sAHdbyangs dang bcas pa spyod do/_/gnyis pa la s+s+l-I/_gsum pa la s+sU/_
[\[56b.5\]]bzhi pa la s+s+R-I/_lnga pa la s+sI/_drug pa la s+sA/_de bzhin du nyin zhag drug pa gzhan rnams kyis/[ \[\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f7f\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0fb3\u0f71\u0f80]/[ \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f74]/[ \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0fbc\u0f71\u0f80]/[ \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f72]/[ \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71]/[\] ]de bzhin du Sha dang de bzhin du sha'o/_/de bzhin du\u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f7f[ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0fb3\u0f71\u0f80]/[ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f74]/[ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0fbc\u0f71\u0f80]/[ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f72]/[ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71]/_zhes pas sde dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cus spyod do/_/
[\[56b.6\]]de bzhin du bum pa dang nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis/_ta sde dang pa sde dang Ta sde dang tsa sde dang ka sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag brgya brgyad cus spyod do/_/kaR+ka Ta'i 'pho ba'i bar du nyin mo 'phel ba yin la nyin mo 
[\[56b.7\]]'phel ba ni nyi ma ste sdud pa'i ngo bos rig par bya'o/_/'dir mtshan mo dang nyin mo 'phel ba'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge rnams ni 'di lta ste/_mtshan mo 'phel ba nga ngi ng+R-i ngu ng+l-i ngaM /_g+ha g+hi g+h+R-i g+hu g+h+l-i g+haM/_ga gi g+R-i gu g-I gaM_/kha khi kh+R-i khu kh+l-i khaM/_ka ki k+R-i ku kl-i kaM zhes pa ni kaR+ka Ta'i 'phel ba'o/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]nya nyi ny+r-i nyu ny+l-i nyaM/_dz+ha dz+hi dz+h+R-i dz+hu dz+h+l-i dz+haM/_dza dzi dz+R-i dzu dz+l-i dzaM/_tsha tshi tsh+R-i tshu tsh+l-i tshaM/_tsa tsi ts+R-i tsu ts+l-i tsaM zhes pa ni seng ge'i 'phel ba'o/_/Na Ni N+R-i Nu N+l-i NaM/_D+ha D+hi D+h+R-i D+hu D+h+l-i D+haM/_Da Di D+R-i Du D+l-i DaM/_Tha Thi Th+R-i Thu Th+l-i ThaM/_Ta Ti T+R-i Tu T+l-i TaM/_zhes pa ni bu mo'i 'phel ba'o/_/ma mi m+R-i mu m+l-i maM/_b+ha b+hi b+h+R-i b+hu b+h+l-i b+haM/_ba bi b+R-i bu bl-i baM/_pha phi ph+R-i phu ph+l-i phaM/_pa pi 
[\[57a.2\]]p+R-i pu p+l-i paM/_zhes pa ni srang gi 'phel ba'o/_/na ni n+R-i nu n+l-i naM/_d+ha d+hi d+h+R-i d+hu d+h+l-i d+haM/_da di d+R-i du d+l-i daM/_tha thi th+R-i thu th+l-i thaM/_ta ti t+R-i tu t+l-i taM/_zhes pa ni sdig pa'i 'phel ba'o/_/\u0f88\u0f90 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f72 \u0f88\u0f90\u0fbc\u0f80 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f74 \u0f88\u0f90\u0fb3\u0f80 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f7e/_sha shi sh+R-i shu sh+li shaM/_Sha Shi Sh+R-i Shu Sh+l-i ShaM/[ \[\u0f89\u0fa4] \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f72 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0fbc\u0f80 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f74 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0fb3\u0f80 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f7e/[\] ]sa si s+Ri su sl-i saM/_zhes pa ni gzhu'i 'pho ba la ste/_zla ba drug gi 
[\[57a.3\]]nyin zhag rnams kyis mtshan mo 'phel zhing nyin mo 'dzad do/_/de nas chu srin la sogs pa la nyin mo 'phel ba ni s+sAHs+s+l-I s+sU s+s+R-I s+sI s+sA/[ \[\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f7f\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0fb3\u0f71\u0f80] \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f74 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0fbc\u0f71\u0f80 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71 \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4\u0f71\u0f72/[\] ]Sh+ShAHSh+Sh+l-I Sh+ShU Sh+Sh+R-I Sh+ShI Sh+ShA/_sh+shAHsh+sh+l-I sh+shU sh+sh+R-I sh+shI sh+shA/[ \[\u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f7f\u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0fb3\u0f71\u0f80] \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f74 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0fbc\u0f71\u0f80 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71\u0f72 \u0f88\u0f90\u0f8d\u0f90\u0f71 [\]]zhes pa ni chu srin gyi 'phel ba'o/_/t+tAHt+t+l-I t+tU t+t+R-I t+tI t+tA/_th+thAHth+th+l-I th+thU th+th+R-I th+thI th+thA/_d+dAHd+d+l-I d+dU d+d+R-I d+dI d+dA/_d+h+d+hAH
[\[57a.4\]]d+h+d+h+l-I d+h+d+hU d+h+d+h+R-I d+h+d+hI d+h+d+hA/_n+nAHn+n+l-I n+nU n+n+R-I n+nI n+nA zhes pa ni bum pa'i 'phel ba'o/_/p+pAHp+p+l-I p+pU p+p+R-I p+pI p+pA/_ph+phAHph+ph+l-I ph+phU ph+ph+R-I ph+phI ph+phA/_b+bAHb+b+l-I b+bU b+b+R-i b+bI b+bA/_b+h+b+hAHb+h+b+h+l-I b+h+b+hU b+h+b+h+R-I b+h+b+hI b+h+b+hA/_m+mAHm+m+l-I m+mU m+m+R-I m+mI 
[\[57a.5\]]m+mA/_zhes pa ni nya'i 'phel ba'o/_/T+TAHT+T+l-I T+TU T+T+R-I T+TI T+TA/_Th+ThAHTh+Th+l-I Th+ThU Th+Th+R-I Th+ThI Th+ThA/_D+DAHD+D+l-I D+DU D+D+R-I D+DI D+DA/_D+h+D+hAHD+h+D+h+l-I D+h+D+hU D+h+D+h+R-I D+h+D+hI D+h+D+hA/_N+NAHN+N+l-I N+NU N+N+R-I N+NI N+NA/_zhes pa ni lug gi 'phel ba'o/_/ts+tsAHts+ts+l-I ts+tsU ts+ts+R-I ts+tsI ts+tsA/_tsh+tshAHtsh+tsh+l-I tsh+tshU tsh+tsh+R-I tsh+tshI tsh+tshA/_
[\[57a.6\]]dz+dzAHdz+dz+l-I dz+dzU dz+dz+R-I dz+dzI dz+dzA/_dz+h+dz+hAHdz+h+dz+h+l-I dz+h+dz+hU dz+h+dz+h+R-I dz+h+dz+hI dz+h+dz+hA/_ny+nyAHny+ny+l-I ny+nyU ny+ny+R-I ny+nyI ny+nyA zhes pa ni glang gi 'phel ba'o/_/k+kAHk+k+l-I k+kU k+k+R-I k+kI k+kA/_kh+khAHkh+kh+lI kh+khU kh+kh+R-I kh+khI kh+khA/_g+gAHg+g+l-I g+gU g+g+R-I g+gI g+gA/_g+h+g+hAHg+h+g+h+l-I g+h+g+hU g+h+g+h+R-I g+h+g+hI g+h+g+hA/_d+dAHd+d+l-I d+dU d+d+R-I d+dI d+dA/_zhes 
[\[57a.7\]]pa ni 'khrig pa la nyin mo 'phel ba ste/_zla ba drug ji srid pa'i mthar ni 'grib pa'o/_de ltar na lhor bgrod pa dbyangs thung 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ngu dang ldan pa'i gsal byed de/_gnyis ka zla ba'i cha'i mtshan nyid do/_/byang du bgrod pa la gsal byed gnyis brtsegs pa dbyangs ring po dang ldan pa ste gnyis ka nyi ma'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/gsal byed gcig dbyangs ring po dang ldan pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/_
[\[57b.2\]]de bzhin du gsal byed gnyis brtsegs pa dbyangs thung ngu dang ldan pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi dbye bas zla ba rnam pa gnyis dang nyi ma rnam pa gnyis so/_/de bzhin du yon tan dang 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i gsal byed rnams rig par bya'o/_/
[\[57b.3\]]zhes pa ni bgrod pa'i dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i dbyangs kyi dbye ba dang dbyangs kyi dbye ba gzhan nam mkha' la sogs pa dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pas sum brgya drug cu'i dbye bas tha dad pa ni 'chad par 'gyur bas bshad par bya'o/_/'di'i mdor bsdus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba 
[\[57b.4\]]las/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/_/rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/chags bral dang po chags pa che/_/kha dog sna tshogs 'bar 
[\[57b.5\]]ba'i 'od/_/ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/'dir dkar po'i phyogs la lnga pa dang bcu pa dang nya ni chags pa'o/_/nag po'i phyogs la lnga pa dang bcu pa dang gnam stong ni chags bral lo/_/'di gnyis kyi dbus rdzogs pa gsum gyi mjug dga' bral gyi mthar stong pa 
[\[57b.6\]]chen po yi ge lnga gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs te/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po ni zla ba cha bcu drug pa'i mthar stong pa chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas ni gnam stong gi mtha' cha dang po 'char ba'i 
[\[57b.7\]]mtshams nyi ma mun pa bcu drug pa'i mthar thig le stong pa yi ge drug go/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba ni stong pa chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin ni thig le stong pa'o/_/rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni thig le stong pa yi ge drug go/_/rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od ni stong 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pa chen po yi ge lnga'o/_/shes rab dang thabs kyi chos ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las rgya cher brjod par bya ste/_gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge med/_/gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa yang rgya cher ro/_/da ni nyin zhag so so'i mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i chu tshod gsungs 
[\[58a.2\]]pa ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod ces pa ste ha la sogs pa de dag dbyangs kyang yin pas na ha sogs dbyangs rnams so/_/kyang yig gis gzhan gsal byed do/_/de dag dbyangs bcu gnyis dang bcas pa ni dbyangs drug cur 'gyur ro/_/de la mtshan mo 'phel ba 
[\[58a.3\]]la dbyangs thung ngu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs sum cu'i bdag nyid nyi ma phyed nas mtshan phyed kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/nyin mo 'phel ba la dbyangs ring po dang ldan pa sum cu mtshan phyed nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nyin zhag so so la mtshan mo dang nyin mo 'phel ba rig par bya'o/_/
[\[58a.4\]]'dir sngags kyi tshig rnams ni mtshan mo 'phel ba la spro ba'i rim pa dang nyin mo 'phel ba la sdud pa'i rim pas 'di lta ste/_ha hi h+R-i hu h+l-i haM/_ya yi y+R-i yu y+l-i yaM/_ra ri R+R-i ru rl-i raM/_wa wi w+R-i wu w+l-i waM/_la li l+R-i lu l+l-i laM/_zhes pa mtshan mo ste bsam pa'i dbye bas shes rab 
[\[58a.5\]]dang lus kyi dbye bas thabs so/_/l+lAHl+l+l-I l+lU l+l+R-I l+lI l+lA/_w+WAHw+W+l-I w+WU w+W+R-I w+WI w+WA/_R+RAHR+R+l-I r+RU R+R+R-I R+RI R+RA/_y+YAHy+Y+l-I y+YU y+Y+R-I y+YI y+YA/_h+hAHh+h+l-I h+hU h+h+R-I h+hI h+hA/_zhes pa nyin mo ste bsam pa'i dbye bas thabs dang lus kyi dbye bas shes rab bo/_/khu ba dang zla ba ni shes rab kyi bsam pa las byung ba 
[\[58a.6\]]nyid kyi phyir shes rab dang /_thabs kyi lus las byung ba nyid kyi phyir thabs so/_/de bzhin du rdul dang /_nyi ma ni thabs kyi bsam pa las byung ba nyid kyi phyir thabs dang /_
[\[58a.7\]]shes rab kyi lus las byung ba nyid kyi phyir shes rab ste de ltar thams cad du rjes su rtogs par bya'o/_/da ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba khams gsum pa'i sngags gsungs pa lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa zhes pa ste/_lha ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gzugs med pa ste lha ma yin yang de'i nang du 'dus so/_/mi dang gdengs can ni rab tu grags pa ste rgyal po dang mtha' yas la sogs pa'o/_/'byung po'i skye gnas ni sngar brjod pa rnam pa bzhi'o/_/brtan pa'i skye gnas ni lhun po dang shing la sogs pa ste de dag thams cad sngags 
[\[58b.2\]]kyi ming gis ming can du byas pa'i sngags su 'gyur ro/_/khams gsum po 'dir gang gi ming gang yin pa de'i de bsgrub pa'i slad du sngags kyi brdar 'gyur te dang po'i yi ge ni ye shes kyi sa bon du 'gyur zhing /_ming mtha' dag ni bzlas pa'i sngags su 'gyur ro/_/don sna tshogs 
[\[58b.3\]]bsgrub pa'i slad du sems can mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dbye bas sngags mtha' yas par khong du chud par bya'o/_/dper na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i don du ming gi yi ge dang pos khyim dang ming gi yi ge thams cad kyis kyang dbyangs dman pa dang lhag pa g.yul 'gyed pa'o/_/
[\[58b.4\]]de bzhin du dang po'i yi ge dang ming thams cad kyis kyang bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i bya ba 'grub ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'khrul pa med cing nor bu dang sngags dang /_sman rnams kyi mthu rang gi sems yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/a 
[\[58b.5\]]sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las zhes pa la a sogs ni a yig la sogs pa ste dbyangs kyi tshogs so/_/ka sogs ldan pa ni ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed dang ldan pa dag las so/_/de ltar ni brjod pa'i rim pa 'dis so/_/khams gsum dag ni 'dod pa dang /_
[\[58b.6\]]gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams te nges par skyed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bdag ces pa ni bod pa'o/_/zla ba'i cha la sogs pa dang sna tshogs pa'i sngags bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus so/_/da ni dbyangs ni zhes pa la sogs pas dbyangs rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas la sogs pa 
[\[58b.7\]]bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan \u0f88\u0f90 la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas zhes pa la 'dir dbyangs ni sngar brjod pa'i a yig la sogs pa rnams te a i r-i u l-i lnga'o/_/'di rnams kyi skye ba'i 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gnas rnam pa lnga grangs ji lta ba bzhin no/_/dbyangs ji ltar gyur pa rnams kyi zhe na/_ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan pa dang \u0f88\u0f90 la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi zhes pa ste grangs ji lta ba bzhin ka yig la sogs pa'i sde pa dang /_sbyar ba dang /[ \u0f88\u0f90] la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge 
[\[59a.2\]]so so dang sbyar ba ni \u0f88\u0f90 sha Sha \u0f89\u0fa4 sa dang /_yang dag par sbyar ba rnams kyi ste sogs pa smos pa'i phyir ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa rnams kyi'o/_/de ltar yang a ku ha rnam par bcad pa ni mgrin pa las byung ba'o/_/i tsu ya sha ni rkan las byung ba'o/_/r-i Tu ra Sha ni spyi bo las byung ba'o/_/
[\[59a.3\]]u pu wa \u0f89\u0fa4 ni mchu las byung ba'o/_/l-i tu la sa ni so las byung ba'o/_/zhes skye ba'i gnas gsungs so/_/mgrin rkan steng gi cha ji ltar gyur pa zhen mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes pa'i gnas so/_/mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag gi skye ba'i gnas su a yig la sogs pa rnam 
[\[59a.4\]]grangs ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba ste skye ba ces pa ni gnas de dag tu brjod pa rnams kyi sgra'i don rtogs pa'o/_/'dir sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa'i don du skye ba'i gnas rig par bya ste gzhan ni bsgom pa'i gnas kyi don du lus kyi 'khor lo'i dbye bas brjod pa/_a sogs 
[\[59a.5\]]rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pas te/_zhes pa la a sogs zhes pa a yig la sogs pa dbyangs rnams kyi grangs bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas grangs bzhin du gtsug tor la sogs pa'i 'khor lo rnams 
[\[59a.6\]]bsgom pa'i don du skye ba'i gnas su rig par bya'o/_/'dir a ku ha rnam par bcad pa ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la bsgom par bya'o/_/i tsu ya sha ni snying kha'i 'khor lo la'o/_/r-i Tu ra Sha ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo la'o/_/u pu la \u0f89\u0fa4 ni dpral ba'i 'khor lo la'o/_/l-i tu las ni lte ba'i 'khor lo la bsgom 
[\[59a.7\]]par bya'o/_/sna tshogs ni kha dog sna tshogs ljang khu ste gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'o/_/nag pa ni snying kha'i 'khor lo'o/_/dmar ba ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/ri bong can gyi mdog ni dpral ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/gser 'dra ni lte ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]zhes pa ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang nam mkha'i khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'o/_/'du byed dang rlung gi khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa snying kha'i 'khor lo'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang me'i khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang 
[\[59b.2\]]ldan pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/'du shes dang chu'i khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa dpral ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/gzugs dang sa'i khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa lte ba'i 'khor lo ste de ltar phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o/_/'chad par 'gyur ba la 
[\[59b.3\]]yan lag dgod pa la sogs pa rig par bya'o/_/dbyangs rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas nges par bstan pa'o/_/dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las bsdus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las 'jig rten 
[\[59b.4\]]gyi khams bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus te bdun pa'o//_//da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad gsungs pa sdud par mdzad pa po 'jam dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa la sogs pas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las 
[\[59b.5\]]bsdus pa rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams zhes pa la sogs pa de nyid bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/_/rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis zhes pa la 'dir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu mos pa sna tshogs pa'i 
[\[59b.6\]]sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad sems can rnams la gsungs shing rab tu snang ngo /_/don dam par ni 'jig rten gyi khams la tshad dang dpangs med de sems can rnams kyi bsod nams dang sdig pa'i dbang gis so/_/'dir phug khru lnga pa'i tshad 
[\[59b.7\]]gang du 'dod chags dang bral ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa'i phug der bsod nams dang ye shes bsten pa de'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba sde dang bcas pa 'ongs shing rab tu 'jug ste de sus kyang ma bskyed cing phug der zhugs pa'i 'khor 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]los sgyur ba'i sde yang dag pa nyid ma yin no/_/don dam par 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/'dir 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad gang yin pa de ni/_ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin lus zhes gsungs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad 'jig rten 
[\[60a.2\]]gyi khams dkyil 'khor gyi don dang /_lus kyi tshad lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don du ste/_lus ni dkyil 'khor zhes brjod do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar phyi rol du 'jig rten pa'i tshad kyis lhun po'i dpangs dpag tshad 'bum yin pa de bzhin du lus kyi sgal tshigs kyi dpangs 
[\[60a.3\]]khru gang ste khru'i tshad des lus ni khru bzhi'o/_/lhun po dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag bzhi'o/_/rnam pa gzhan du na ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin lus su mi 'gyur te mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad kun rdzob tu ji lta ba de ltar 
[\[60a.4\]]'gyur du chug mod/_/'dir bsregs bcad ces pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam bcas pa ni ma yin te/_'on kyang dam bcas pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi yul la yin no/_/gang gi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul la mdzod kyi 'dod pa dang /_rig 
[\[60a.5\]]byed kyi grub pa'i mtha'i bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i yul sa gcig ni dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon no zhes [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i phyir nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i slad du tshangs pa'i yul sa'i tshad de rnam par gzhom pa'i don du gza' dang rtsis dang khyim 
[\[60a.6\]]gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad rab tu bkod do/_/de'i phyir tshad 'di la sangs rgyas pa'i mdzod mthong nas 'khrul pa 'di mi bya ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad 'bum phrag sum cu so drug lhag pa dang /_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi 
[\[60a.7\]]khams dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi'i tshad du gsungs/_'dir bcom ldan 'das [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung ba po yin nam ci zhes pa 'ga' zhig 'dod par gyur na de'i tshig mkhas pa rnams kyis khas blang bar mi bya ste sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis so/_/de bzhin du yang /_sems can 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]mos pa sna tshogs pa/_/grub mtha' sna tshogs rig pa po/_/sna tshogs lam la rab gnas pa/_/shes pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa can/_/de dag rang bzhin grub mtha' la/_/ji srid rigs pa ma bstan pa/_/de srid khengs pa can de dag_/kun mkhyen gyi yang dbang mi 'gyur/_/
[\[60b.2\]]sems can phan las mi bden pa/_/bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu yin te/_/gzhan la gnod las bden pa ni/_/mnar med la sogs rab tu ster/_/gtong ba po min [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis/_/khyim gyi gnas ni rir mthong ste/_/sdig pa byed pa dag gis khyim/_/khab rtse ri yi rnam 
[\[60b.3\]]par ro/_/sa 'og dngos grub thob gyur cing /_/lha mo rnams kyi grong 'gro ba/_/grub pa rnams kyis rab brtan sa/_/kun nas bug pa bcas par mthong /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni sems can rnams 
[\[60b.4\]]kyi rang gi sems kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis rab tu snang ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par zhen pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzigs nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bos dngos po'i tshad gsungs pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de ltar thams cad yongs su mkhyen nas drang 
[\[60b.5\]]srong rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad dang lus kyi tshad dkyil 'khor gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/'dir rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su zhes pa ni sa dang chu dang me'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'og na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[60b.6\]]nam mkha'i khams la rnam par gnas te/_rlung gi mtha' de nas lhun po'i bar du dmyal ba'i gnas bdun dang brgyad pa ni gdengs can gyi grong khyer te/_dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis yin no/_/'dir rlung gi dkyil 'khor stong phrag lnga 
[\[60b.7\]]bcur 'gyur te drag po'i rlung chen po dang mun pa chen po de la dmyal ba'i gnas gnyis steng 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha ste rgya'i tshad ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad do/_/de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor la dmyal ba'i gnas gnyis te/_me'i dmyal ba gcig 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dang de'i steng du du ba mi bzad pa'i dmyal ba'o/_/de bzhin du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dmyal ba gnyis te 'dam gyi chu 'dam dang chu yang dag par ldan pa dang bye ma'i chu bye ma dang chu yang dag par ldan pa ste grang ba chen po'o/_/sa'i dkyil 'khor la gseg ma chu'i dmyal 
[\[61a.2\]]ba dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/de'i steng du gdengs can gyi grong khyer steng 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/de nyid la tshad rnam pa gnyis te phyed ni lha ma yin gyi gnas yin la phyed ni klu'i 'jig rten gyi gnas so/_/de bzhin du lus la rkang pa'i mthil 
[\[61a.3\]]nas rked pa'i bar du khru gnyis te khru gnyis po de nyid cha brgyad du byas nas cha re re la rim pa bzhin du dmyal ba dang gdengs can gyi grong khyer rnams rig par bya'o/_/lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste sa'i dkyil 'khor de nas lhun po'i tshad ni steng 'og tu dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig 
[\[61a.4\]]ste lus la rked pa nas mgrin pa'i 'og gi bar du khru gang ngo /_/de nyid du gza'i tshogs rnams 'khor te gza'i tshogs kyi gnas de nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga lhun po'i mgrin pa ste lus la sor drug go/_/de nas gdong la lnga bcu lhun po'i gdong mgrin pa nas dpral ba'i mtha'i 
[\[61a.5\]]bar du ste lus la sor bcu gnyis so/_/de nas brtan pa'i go 'phang g.yo med gtsug tor ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga ste/_lus la dpral ba'i mtha' nas gtsug tor gyi gnas kyi bar du sor drug gi tshad do/_/de'i phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid 
[\[61a.6\]]kyis dman pa'o zhes pa ni 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang steng gtsug tor de'i phyi rol stong pa gcig pu ste rdul phra rab so so'i ngo bo khams lnga pa stong pa gcig pu'o/_/nam mkha' ni ma yin te thams cad du khyab par byed pa'i phyir stong pa gcig pur rtogs par mi bya'o/_/de ltar 'jig 
[\[61a.7\]]rten gyi khams kyi tshad 'bum phrag bzhi ste lus la khru bzhi'o/_/khru yang sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid do/_/da ni 'dir zheng gi tshang gsungs pa rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams la 'bum phrag bzhi ste rlung nas rlung gi mtha' shar nas nub kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar dang de 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]bzhin du lho nas byang gi mtha'i bar ro/_/brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams zhes pa ni de nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa dang /_de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /_chu'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[61b.2\]]gyi dbus su sa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nyid ni brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi ste de la gling drug dang ri drug dang /_rgya mtsho drug go/_/bdun pa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pas rgya mtsho bdun dang /_bdun pa 'dzam bu'i g+l+ling dang bcas pas gling bdun dang /_rdo rje'i ri dang bcas pas ri 
[\[61b.3\]]bdun no/_/rdo rje'i ri ni rta gdong gi me ste lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar 'og dang thad ka'i cha la gnas so/_/sa 'dzam bu'i gling chen po'i mthar phyogs thams cad dang 'og tu lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho rnam par gnas so/_/lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho'i 
[\[61b.4\]]mthar 'bum phrag bzhi'i phyed de/_bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te zhes pa lhun po'i dbus nas g.yas g.yon du lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar 'bum phrag gnyis te g.yas su 'bum phrag gcig dang g.yon du 'bum phrag gcig ste/_de bzhin du shar dang nub dang rlung 
[\[61b.5\]]dang me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan du'o/_/lan tshwa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor de las g.yas dang g.yon du me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/g.yas su 'bum phrag gcig dang g.yon du 'bum phrag gcig ste phyogs thams cad du de bzhin no/_/dbus 
[\[61b.6\]]na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste/_/zhes pa ni dbus na lhun po'o/_/de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na gang gi steng na khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa skar ma'i phung po mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa'i skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba'o/_
[\[61b.7\]]'dir tshig 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/_gang gis 'di brjod par bya ba lhun po gzhan yang yod dam ci zhe na/_brjod pa 'dir man+dar yang lhun po'i ming gis smos pa des na man+da ra las tha dad du bya ba'i slad du tshig 'di rigs so/_/cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis zhes pa ni 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'dir brjod pa'i rim pas 'og dang steng dang shar dang nub dang lho dang byang gi cha drug la sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis so/_/srid gsum mtha' dag ni mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og ste/_srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las 
[\[62a.2\]]rab tu skyes/_/zhes pa chags pa skye ba'i dus kyi dbang gis yang dag par 'dzin pa dang srung ba dang /_dbyibs kyi rlung gi dus kyi sbyor ba dag las sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'i don du skyes so/_/da ni 'dir khor yug gi tshad 
[\[62a.3\]]brjod pa 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste/_zhes pa ni 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur khor yug gi tshad du 'gyur te/_lhun po la sogs pa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug 
[\[62a.4\]]pa gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad kyi'o/_/sa'i khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang zhes pa la sa yi ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar du thad ka'i tshad 'bum phrag gcig ste khor yug gi tshad 'bum phrag gsum du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du chu me rlung rnams kyi zhes pa ni chu dang 
[\[62a.5\]]me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar du thad ka'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gnyis dang /_'bum phrag gsum dang /_'bum phrag bzhi ste/_khor yug gi tshad ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so zhes pa ste/_chu'i 
[\[62a.6\]]dkyil 'khor la 'bum phrag drug dang /_me'i dkyil 'khor la 'bum phrag dgu dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor la nyi ma ste 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su rim pas rig par bya'o/_/mi'i dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa/_/de ni sa'i 
[\[62a.7\]]steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo /_/zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa'i rim pas phyi rol du 'jig rten gyi khams la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig gang yin pa de nyid rang gi lus la rang gi khru yis khru gang gi tshad du 'gyur ro/_/da ni phra rab ces pa la 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]sogs pas rdul phra rab la sogs pa rnams kyi dpag tshad brjod de/_phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig ces pa ni 'dir phra rab rdul phra rab brgyad phreng bar gnas pa dag gis phra mo gcig ste phra mo gcig gi tshad du 'gyur ro/_/phra mo 'di brgyad rnams kyis mi rnams kyi skra yi
