[\[202b.7\]]dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa'i gnas rnams dran par bya ste byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms so/_/de 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsam par bya ste sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyod pa dang don mthun pa'o/_/de nas mi dge ba bcu yongs su spang ba bsgom par bya ste srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang 
[\[203a.2\]]tshig rtsub dang phra ma dang tshig 'khyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log lta'o/_de bzhin du 'gyod pa dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang the tshom ste sgrib pa lnga yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga rgyal te nyon 
[\[203a.3\]]mongs pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta ba'i zag pa spang bar bya'o/_/de nas rnam par thar pa bzhi bsgom par bya ste/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon 
[\[203a.4\]]par 'dus ma byas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i khams gsum po tshigs su bcad pa 'dis rnam par dpyad par bya ste/_dngos po med la bsgom pa med/_/sgom pa sgom pa nyid ma yin/_/de ltar dngos po dngos min pas/_/sgom pa 
[\[203a.5\]]dmigs su med pa'o zhes pa'o/_/'di'i don ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o/_/da ni stong pa zhes pa la sogs pas yang srid pa gzung ba'i slad du stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te/_stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos 
[\[203a.6\]]po dag gis rnam par dman pa gang yin pa'i stong pa chen po de las kyang sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag kyang med do/_/de bzhin du 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas su bya'o zhes pa mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste mtha' dag de ltar shes nas sangs 
[\[203a.7\]]rgyas nyid kyi slad du de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya zhes pa ste 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa dang sems can thams cad la yang dag 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]par bstan pa'i slad du sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la gtso bo sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o/_/da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po gzung ba dang 'khor ba pa'i phung po yongs su spang ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa chu yis 
[\[203b.2\]]zhes pa la sogs pa ste mi yi 'jig rten 'dir mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus su chu yis me rnam par nyams par byed do/_/de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson rnams kyis bya/_phyi nas me med 
[\[203b.3\]]pa'i phyir 'dzin ma dag ni sra ba nyid spangs te lan tshwa bzhin du zhu bar gyur nas chur 'gyur te chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs so/_/de nas rlung ni chu de rnams mtha' dag bskams nas nam mkha' la mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar khams kyi tshogs myur du rnam par nyams te de nas 
[\[203b.4\]]sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ste/_nam mkha'i khams rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_o~M a ni 
[\[203b.5\]]mit+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_o~M a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_o~M a na b+hi saM skA ra dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_zhes pa brjod nas khams gsum po rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes pa ni de bzhin 
[\[203b.6\]]gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las gnas bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste dang pa'o//_//da ni smon 
[\[203b.7\]]lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du mngal du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis skyed pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa/_stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_'dir phyi dang nang du bskyed pa'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]pa dang shes rab kyi chos 'byung gru gsum mo/_/phyi rol du mi yul la rdo rje'i rang bzhin rtsibs bcu zlum po ste nang du ma'i lus so/_/de la phyi rol du ya~M yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po dbus su gzhu'i rnam pa thad kar dpag tshad 'bum phrag 
[\[204a.2\]]bzhi pa 'og dang steng du hu~M yig yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du ra~M yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum rgyar dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum pa 'og dang steng du hu~M yig yongs su gyur 
[\[204a.3\]]ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa'i bkra shis kyis mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du wa~M yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis pa steng dang 'og tu hu~M yig yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa pad+mas 
[\[204a.4\]]mtshan pa'o/_de'i steng du la~M yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po gru bzhi pa dpag tshad 'bum yod pa 'og dang steng du hu~M yig yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du ma~M yig yongs su gyur pa las lhun po chen 
[\[204a.5\]]po rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'og gi rgyar stong phrag bcu drug dang steng la stong phrag lnga bcu pa'o/_/de'i dbus su k+Sha~M yig yongs su gyur pa las lhun po'i tshad phyed kyis sna tshogs chu skyes so/_/de'i sum cha ni lte ba'o/_/de'i steng du ha~M yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lte ba dang mnyam 
[\[204a.6\]]pa'o/_/de'i steng du rnam par bcad pa yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du thig le yongs su gyur pa las me zhes pa sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mthon mthing ste de ltar mtha' dag gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni [\[]h+k+Sha~Mm+law+Raya [\]]zhes pa sa bon gyi yi ger rnam par bsgom par bya ste de 
[\[204a.7\]]las 'jig rten gyi khams grub par bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni phyi rol du'o/_/nang du ni sngar gsungs pa'i rnam pas mi'i lus la dpral bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /_mgrin par me'i dkyil 'khor dang /_snying khar chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /_lte bar sa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]dang /_lte ba nas gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mthar thug pa lhun po chen po'o/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma ni bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma bzhin no/_/bshang ba dang gcib dang khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa gsum ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor te gsang ba'i pad+ma'i lte bar de rnams 'dus pa'o/_/
[\[204b.2\]]de bzhin du de'i steng du khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am rdo rje las skyes te hu~M yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje gur ni yum gyi skye gnas su ste/_rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las so/_/de nyid kyis na yang na rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gur ro/_/de'i 
[\[204b.3\]]dbus su rdo rje'i sa la b+h+ru~M yig yongs su gyur pa 'am o~M yig yongs su gyur pa las nor bu'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ste/_o~M yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan zhes pa sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug par 
[\[204b.4\]]thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa ste nor gyi pad+ma zhes pa pad+ma brgyad po 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa ste nyin 
[\[204b.5\]]mor byed pa'i pad+ma zhes pa pad+ma bcu gnyis zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman pa dang de bzhin du sgo bzhir shing rta rnams so/_/de ltar sku'i dkyil 'khor ni zheng du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum mo/_/de'i phyed ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang de'i yang phyed ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang de'i 
[\[204b.6\]]yang phyed ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang de'i yang phyed ni bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'o/_/pad+ma'i sum cha ni lte ba ste de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams so/_/de bzhin du nang du ni snying kha nas 'og dang steng du gsang ba'i pad+ma dang spyi bo ji srid par ro/_/
[\[204b.7\]]yang na snying kha nas dpung ba dang nye ba'i dpung ba dang sen mo'i mtha' ji srid par te ma'i lus la rnam par brtags pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor re re la sgo bzhi bzhi ste de ltar sgo bcu gnyis rnams ni nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ste rgyal po zhes pa bod pa'o/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]nor bu dang gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad dang snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rnams te cha bcu drug gi dbye bas ka ba bcu drug go/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no/_/rgyal ba'i shin tu 
[\[205a.2\]]longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/'di la lus kyi khams rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni ye shes kyi le'u las brjod par bya'o/_/'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas chos kyi phung po rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_
[\[205a.3\]]sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun chos/_/thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnams kyis ni/_/rdo rje'i thig ni bzhi po ste/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams kyis/_/kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do/_/yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa yis/_/sgo 
[\[205a.4\]]ni bcu gnyis po rnams te/_/de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis kyis/_/rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa rnams/_/'phags la ma yan lag brgyad rnams kyis/_/phyogs brgyad du ni dur khrod rnams/_/stong nyid bcu drug ka pa rnams/_/khams rnams kyis kyang khang pa brtsegs/_/
[\[205a.5\]]rnam thar brgyad kyis sgo khyud rnams/_/gzugs can yon tan brgyad rnams kyis/_/'gram rnams dang ni logs rnams nyid/_/thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so/_/tshul khrims la sogs phung po lngas/_/kha dog lnga ni rnam par dag_/theg pa gsum gyis rab gsum/_/
[\[205a.6\]]dad pa'i dbang po sogs kyis lnga/_/dad sogs stobs rnams dag gis lnga/_/thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor la'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyis/_/dkyil 'khor gsum la stegs bu ste/_/pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa yis/_/rin chen snam bu rnam par 
[\[205a.7\]]bkra/_/ma 'dres chos ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis/_/do shal do shal phyed pa rnams/_/dbang rnams kyis kyang ba ku lI/_/dge bas kra ma shIr Sha'o/_/stong nyid la sogs rnam thar gyis/_/dril bu'i sgras ni gang ba ste/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pas rgyal mtshan gtams/_/spong bas me long 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]rab tu 'bar/_/byang chub yan lag rnga yab g.yo/_/yan lag dgu yi phreng bas brgyan/_/bsdu ba bzhi po rnams kyis ni/_/zur du sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan/_/bden bzhis rin po che rnams kyis/_/sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams su spras/_/mngon shes lnga yis rtag tu ni/_/khor yug 
[\[205b.2\]]chen po lnga yis bskor/_/rnam pa kun mkhyen byang chub pas/_/rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor/_/bde ba gcig pu'i khor yug gis/_/de bzhin ye shes rdo rje 'bar/_/thabs dang shes rab cha yis ni/_/zla ba nyi ma rtag tu shar/_/thugs gsung sku dang dag pa yis/_/chos 
[\[205b.3\]]kyi 'khor lo bum pa che/_/rnga bo che dang byang chub shing /_/de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu sogs/_/'di ni dpal ldan dus 'khor gyi/_/dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings nyid do/_/phun tshogs kun byed bsgoms nas ni/_/de nas a sogs ka sogs dgod/_/ces pa ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[205b.4\]]'das mngal du 'jug pa'i dus su mngal sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/_/da ni zla ba zhes pa la sogs pas phyi rol du lha rdzogs pa dang nang du mngal rdzogs pa gsungs te/_'dir dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i steng gi zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 
[\[205b.5\]]a sogs dbyangs sum cu dang thig le dang rnam par bcad pa ste sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi don du g.yon dang g.yas su bskor bas dgod par bya'o/_/de la a i r-i u l-i zhes pa ni dang po'i cha lnga'o/_/de nas yon tan gyi dbye bas a e ar o a la 
[\[205b.6\]]zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i cha lnga'o/_/de nas ya Na ra bsgyur bas ha ya ra wa la zhes pa ni gsum pa'i cha lnga'o/_/cha [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i mthar thig le a~M zhes pa ste bcu drug ni g.yon skor gyis so/_/de nas g.yas skor gyis nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha rnams dgod par 
[\[205b.7\]]bya ste/_lA wA rA yA hA A la au Ar ai A l-I U r-I I A zhes pa ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa gnam stong gi mthar rnam par bcad pa aHzhes pa ste dbyangs bcu drug go/_/'di rnams ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams te zla ba'i yan lag dang mngal 'dzin pa'i khu ba'i 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]khams la'o/_/de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ka sogs gsal byed gcig gi bdag nyid bzhi bcu dang brtsegs pa bzhi bcu rnams te/_de la ha ya ra wa la dang bcas pa'i sde pa drug po rnams ni sum cu rtsa lngar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis 
[\[206a.2\]]brjod pa'i dbang gis la wa ya Da D+ha rnams gzung bar bya ste l+la w+Wa y+Ya D+Da D+h+D+ha/_l+la w+Wa r+Ra y+Ya h+ha/_s+sa\u0f89\u0fa4\u0f8e\u0fa4 Sh+Sha sh+sha \u0f88\u0f90\u0f88\u0f90/_t+ta th+tha d+da d+h+d+ha n+na/_p+pa ph+pha b+ba b+h+b+ha m+ma/_T+Ta Th+Tha D+Da D+h+D+ha N+Na/_ts+tsa tsh+tsha dz+dza dz+h+dz+ha ny+nya/_k+ka kh+kha g+ga g+h+g+ha ng+nga/_zhes pa bzhi bcu ste/_g.yas skor du sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas brtsegs pa 
[\[206a.3\]]rnams so/_/de nas g.yon skor gyis nga g+ha ga kha ka/_nya dz+ha dza tsha tsa/_Na D+ha Da Tha Ta/_ma b+ha ba pha pa/_na d+ha da tha ta/_th+ka sha Sha \u0f89\u0fa4 sa/_ha ya ra wa la D+ha Da ya wa la zhes pa gsal byed gcig gi bdag nyid bzhi bcu'o/_/de ltar nyi ma dang mngal 'dzin pa'i rdul la dpe byad 
[\[206a.4\]]brgyad cu rnams so zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/de ltar zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas zhes pa ni de dag las 'og tu nyi ma'o/_/nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'o/_/zla ba'i dbus su hu~M yig zla ba'i mtshan ma lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du rdul gyi steng du khu ba'o/_/khu ba'i dbus 
[\[206a.5\]]su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dri za'i sems can no/_/de nas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis zhes pa ni de la zla ba dang khu ba dbyangs dang ldan pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te gzugs kyi phung po skyed par byed pa rnam par snang mdzad do/_/nyi ma dang rdul gsal byed dang ldan pa 
[\[206a.6\]]ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te tshor ba'i phung po skyed par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan no/_/dri za'i sems can huM yig dang ldan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te 'du shes kyi phung po skyed par byed pa snang ba mtha' yas so/_/de rnams gcig pa nyid dang srog gi rlung hi yig dang ldan pa ni 
[\[206a.7\]]bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te 'du byed kyi phung po skyed par byed pa don yod grub pa'o/_/de nas yan lag thams cad kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa dang rnam par shes pa haM yig dang ldan pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po skyed par 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]byed pa mi bskyod pa ste phyi dang nang du ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/'di rnams gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni sa bon te dbyangs rnams kyi thig le dang gsal byed rnams kyi rnam par bcad pa dang rnam par shes pa gzhom du med pa dang srog gi a yig go/_/de ltar gsungs pa'i 
[\[206b.2\]]rim pas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya zhes pa ste phyi rol dang mngal du sku rdzogs pa'i nges pa'o/_/da ni lha'i sku la dus kyi cha yis dbyibs gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir lha rnams 
[\[206b.3\]]skye ba'i dus su rgyan thams cad dang bcas par skye ste de rnams kyang lus kyi cha shas sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs nyid du skye'o/_/de'i phyir rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sku dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma ni phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/nyi ma zhes pa dpung pa bcu gnyis 
[\[206b.4\]]so/_/dus kyi zhal ni zhal bzhi'o/_/mgrin pa gsum dang spyan bcu gnyis te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o zhes pa'o/_/nang du lus rdzogs pa la rnam par shes pa lus kyi bdag po'i mtshan nyid ni dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i lte bar dang rang gi lus 
[\[206b.5\]]mthar gyis 'byung ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas lha rnams rnam par dgod pa gsungs pa dpal ldan o~M yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zhes pa snying po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni zhes pa la la nA dang ra sa nA dang a ba d+hU tI'i ste ba du drag po lus med 
[\[206b.6\]]gnyis kyi zhes pa bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs te/_g.yon dang g.yas par rab tu 'bab pa dag gi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs zhes pa'o/_/de la bdud ni 'dod pa'i lha kha dog dmar po gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhi 
[\[206b.7\]]pa lag na me tog gi mda' lnga dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste zhabs g.yas pa kha dog dmar po'i 'og tu'o/_/de bzhin du drag po dkar po mig gsum pa gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhi pa rtse gsum dang Da ma ru dang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa ste zhabs g.yon pa 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dkar po'i 'og tu'o/_/'di ltar sku mdog sngon po ste de bzhin du dbus kyi mgrin pa mthon mthing dang g.yas pa nyi ma dang mtshungs pa dmar po dang g.yas min te g.yon pa ni zla ba'i mdog can dkar po ste de ltar mgrin pa gsum mo/_/sngar gsungs pa'i rnam 
[\[207a.2\]]pas shar gyi zhal ni nag po mche ba gtsigs pa drag po dang g.yas pa ni chags pa dang bcas pa dmar po dang g.yon pa ni rab tu zhi ba dkar po dang nub ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ser po'o/_/ral pa'i cod pan la sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pa dang rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can 
[\[207a.3\]]rdo rje nor bu dang rdo rje rna rgyan dang rdo rje mgul rgyan dang rdo rje gdu bu dang rdo rje ska rags dang rdo rje rkang gdub dang rdo rje dar dpyangs dang rdo rje phreng ba dang stag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o/_/de bzhin du g.yas kyi phrag pa dang po mthon mthing dang gnyis pa dmar po dang gsum pa dkar po ste de 
[\[207a.4\]]bzhin du g.yon du yang ngo /_/de bzhin du g.yas dang g.yon du yang dpung pa gnyis mthon mthing dang gnyis dmar po dang gnyis dkar po'o/_/de bzhin du g.yas dang g.yon du yang phyag bzhi nag po dang bzhi dmar po dang bzhi dkar po ste de rnams kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshon cha 
[\[207a.5\]]dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du phyag re re la sor mo lnga ste mthe bo ser po dang mdzub mo dkar po dang gung mo dmar po dang ming med nag po dang mthe chung ldang gu'o/_/de rnams re re la tshigs gsum ste phyag gi mthil nas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs kyi phreng ba dang po nag po dang gnyis 
[\[207a.6\]]pa dmar po dang gsum pa dkar po'o/_/de ltar phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can so so la kha dog lnga ste de dag sor gdub rnams kyis 'phro ba'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams rab tu zhugs pa'i nges pa ste mngal gyi zla ba gsum pa dang gnas skabs dang po'o/_/
[\[207a.7\]]da ni nag ces pa la sogs pas mtshon cha'i tshogs gsungs te nag po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang por rdo rje dang gnyis par ral gri dang gsum par rtse gsum dang bzhi par gri gug go/_/de bzhin du dmar po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang por me yi mda' dang gnyis par rdo rje lcags kyu 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]dang gsum par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bzhi par tho ba'o/_/gsum pa dkar po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang po'i phyag gi mthil du 'khor lo dang gnyis par mdung dang gsum par dbyug pa dang bzhi par dgra sta'o zhes pa ni g.yas pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs te rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi 
[\[207b.2\]]pad+ma g.yas la'o zhes so/_/da ni g.yon pa'i nag po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la mtshan ma gsungs te/_dang por rdo rje dril bu dang gnyis par phub dang gsum par kha T+wA~M ga rnam par rgyas pa'i kha can dang bzhi par khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o/_/de bzhin du dmar po'i phyag gi mthil 
[\[207b.3\]]bzhi la dang por gzhu dang gnyis par zhags pa dang gsum par nor bu rin chen dang bzhi par pad+ma dkar po'o/_/de bzhin du dkar po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang po'i phyag gi mthil du chu na rgyu ba zhes pa dung dang /_gnyis par me long dang /_gsum par rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_
[\[207b.4\]]bzhi par tshangs pa'i mgo bo zhes pa 'di ltar rig byed gdong ldan tshangs pa'i mgo bo gang yin pa pad+mas brgyan pa ste spras pa rgyal ba'i g.yon pa'i phyag na'o zhes so/_/der bdud dang drag po la yang dag par nye ba na bdud dang drag po dag gi rang gi lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin 
[\[207b.5\]]cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed de bdud kyi dga' ma dang drag po'i u ma'o/_/mi bskyod pa rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/da ni sna tshogs yum gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa gser mdog ces pa la sogs pa ste/_de la ro mnyam pa gcig las zla ba dang khu ba'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[207b.6\]]skyed cing nyi ma dang rdul gyi rang bzhin gyis lha mo skyed do/_/de la dkar po dang nag po'i chos can ni zla ba ste dmar po dang ser po'i chos can ni nyi ma'o/_/des na gser mdog go/_/rig byed zhal ldan ni zhal bzhi'o/_/nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma ni phyag brgyad de mdun nas 'khyud pa dag ni 
[\[207b.7\]]sna tshogs yum mo/_/de'i g.yas kyi phyag dang po na gri gug dang gnyis pa na lcags kyu dang gsum pa na sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bzhi pa na bgrang phreng ngo /_/g.yon gyi phyag dang po na thod pa dang gnyis pa na zhags pa dang gsum pa na 'dab ma brgya pa'i pad+ma dkar po dang bzhi pa na 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid du'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ni g.yas brkyang ste sna tshogs yum ni g.yon brkyang ngo /_/nyi ma'i spyan ni spyan bcu gnyis so/_/rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan ni rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can no/_/phyag rgya lnga po rnams 
[\[208a.2\]]kyi rgya yis btab pa snyoms par zhugs pas gnas pa'o/_/ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sna tshogs yum de'i nang du 'dus shing pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams te/_pha rol du phyin pa brgyad ni 'dab ma rnams la lha mo brgyad de de rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma ni 
[\[208a.3\]]phyag brgyad do/_/rig byed zhal ni zhal bzhi'o/_/nyi ma'i spyan ni spyan bcu gnyis so/_/de dag rnams kyi nang nas bzhi ni klu yi rnga yab 'dzin te phyag brgyad kyis rnga yab brgyad 'dzin pa'o/_/zur bzhir rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so zhes pa ni mer nag mo dang bden bral du dmar mo dang rlung 
[\[208a.4\]]du ser mo dang dbang ldan du dkar mo'o/_/de bzhin du de rnams kyi rgyab tu dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po dang bden bral du chos kyi gaN+DI dmar po dang mer yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o/_/de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la nag mo dang lhor dmar mo 
[\[208a.5\]]dang byang du dkar mo dang nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o/_/phyogs bzhi'i dbye bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi dbye ba ji lta ba de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi ste sna tshogs yum gyi dang po'i zhal gser gyi mdog dang g.yas pa dkar po dang g.yon pa dmar po dang rgyab mthon mthing ste de bzhin du 
[\[208a.6\]]lha mo ser mo rnams kyi'o/_/dkar mo rnams kyi mdun dkar po dang g.yas nag po dang rgyab dmar po dang g.yon ser po'o/_/dmar mo rnams kyi dang po dmar po dang g.yas ser po dang g.yon mthon mthing dang rgyab dkar po'o/_/nag mo rnams kyi mdun nag po dang g.yas 
[\[208a.7\]]dmar po dang g.yon dkar po dang rgyab ser po'o/_/snying po'i pad+ma'i lha mo rnams kyi rgyan dang phyag rgya lnga po rnams ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gi mtshan 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]ma rnams gsungs pa nag mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil ba'i snod de tsan+dan gyi snod dang dmar po sbyar ba gur gum kyi snod ni gsum pa na'o/_/myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa zhes pa gla rtsi dang bcas 
[\[208b.2\]]pa'i ga pur gyi snod ni bzhi pa na ste g.yas kyi phyag rnams na'o/_/g.yon pa'i dang po na dril bu dang gnyis pa na pad+ma dang gsum pa na lha'i shing gi me tog dang bzhi pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rim pas so zhes pa ste shar gyi 'dab ma la'o/_/dmar mo 'bar ma'i g.yas kyi 
[\[208b.3\]]phyag dang po na mar me dang gnyis pa na do shal dang gsum pa na cod pan dang bzhi pa na gdu bu'o/_/de bzhin du g.yon pa'i phyag dang po na gos dang gnyis pa na ska rags dang gsum pa na rin po che'i rna rgyan dang bzhi pa na rkang gdub bo/_/de bzhin du ser mo 'bar ma'i g.yas kyi dang po na 
[\[208b.4\]]dung dang /_gnyis pa na gling bu dang /_gsum pa na nor bu dang /_bzhi pa na Da ma ru'o/_/g.yon gyi dang po na rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang gnyis pa na rnga dang gsum pa na sgra sgrogs pa'i khar rnga dang bzhi pa na zangs dung ngo /_/de bzhin du dkar mo 'bar ma'i dang po na 'o ma'i snod dang /_gnyis pa na chu'i 
[\[208b.5\]]snod dang /_gsum pa na mchog gi sman dang /_bzhi pa na chang gi snod do/_/g.yon gyi dang po na bdud rtsi'i snod dang gnyis pa na grub pa'i ro'i snod dang /_gsum pa na bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /_bzhi pa na zas kyi snod de dkar mo yi'o/_/rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa ste rdo rje 
[\[208b.6\]]sems dpa' rdzogs pa'o/_/da ni ming dang gzugs la sogs pa skyed pa'i slad du 'dod chags chen pos gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gyi 'jig rten dang po'i sangs rgyas bstan par bya ba'i snod du mngon par gzigs nas shin tu dga' ba'i sgras rang gi lus la mi bskyod 
[\[208b.7\]]pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi tshogs rnams te skyes bu dang rig ma dang mig la sogs pa dang /_gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin gyis lha'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa rnams gzhug par bya ste slar yang de 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]rnams rang gi lus las spros nas sna tshogs yum gyi nang du ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin nyid du spros nas slar yang khams dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pas rang gi lus la gzhug par 
[\[209a.2\]]bya ste zhu ba zla bar gyur pa rnams rang gi rdo rje nas spros te rang gi rig ma'i pad+mar de rnams yongs su gyur pa las lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/mi bskyod pa lhag pa'i bdag por bsgoms nas dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 
[\[209a.3\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas phyogs kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas bzhi rnams ni nges par spyan dgu pa me'i zhal zhes pa zhal gsum pa dus kyi phyag ces pa phyag drug pa rnams spros par bya'o/_/de la shar gyi pad+mar nyi ma'i steng du don yod grub pa nag po ste g.yas skor gyis nag po dang 
[\[209a.4\]]dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal can no/_/lhor rin chen 'byung ldan kha dog dmar po ste g.yas skor gyis dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can no/_/byang du snang ba mtha' yas dkar po ste g.yas skor gyis dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can no/_/nub tu rnam 
[\[209a.5\]]par snang mdzad ser po ste g.yas skor gyis ser po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can no/_/de ltar bzhi ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ste nyin mo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las so/_/mer sgrol ma don yod grub pa lta bu'o/_/bden bral du gos dkar mo 
[\[209a.6\]]rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o/_/dbang ldan du mA ma kI snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'o/_/rlung du spyan ma rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'o/_/de ltar bzhi ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ste mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las so/_/slar yang lha dang lha mo de 
[\[209a.7\]]dag gi bar gyi mtshams brgyad du bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyad do/_/de ltar lha dang lha mo nag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste zhes so/_/shar gyi sgor khro bo shin tu stobs te kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni don yod grub pa lta bu nag po'o/_/lho'i 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sgor rmugs byed de kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu dmar po'o/_/nub kyi sgor rengs byed de kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni rnam par snang mdzad lta bu ser po'o/_/byang du khengs byed de kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni snang ba mtha' yas lta bu dkar po'o/_/steng du 
[\[209b.2\]]gtsug tor te kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni mi bskyod pa lta bu ljang khu'o/_/'on kyang khro bo 'di rnams g.yas brkyang pa ste khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni g.yon brkyang ngo /_/zla ba bzhi pa la ming dang gzugs skye ba'i dus su gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid dang rlung dang me dang 
[\[209b.3\]]sa dang chu'i khams kyi bdag nyid de des na khams dang phung po dang khro bo rnams spro ba'o/_/de nas zla ba lnga pa la skye mched drug skye ba'i dus su nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa spro bar bya ste mkha' snying la sogs zhes pa ni 'dir rlung las skyes pa sna ni nam mkha'i snying po 
[\[209b.4\]]dbyibs la sogs pa don yod grub pa lta bu ste shar gyi sgo'i g.yas su ra ba'i rtsig pa la ste phyogs su'o/_/phyogs bral du gnas ni me'i zur du rlung las skyes pa reg bya rdo rje ma ste dbyibs la sogs pa sgrol ma lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du lho'i sgo'i g.yas su me las skyes pa 
[\[209b.5\]]mig ni sa'i snying po ste dbyibs la sogs pa rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du bden bral gyi zur du me'i khams las skyes pa ro rdo rje ma ni gos dkar mo lta bu'o/_/nub kyi sgo'i g.yas su sa las skyes pa lus kyi dbang po ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste 
[\[209b.6\]]rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du rlung gi zur du sa'i khams las skyes pa dri rdo rje ma ni spyan ma lta bu'o/_/byang gi sgo'i g.yas su chu las skyes pa lce ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'o/_/dbang ldan du chu las skyes pa gzugs rdo rje ma ni mA ma kA 
[\[209b.7\]]lta bu'o/_/'og tu ye shes kyi khams las skyes pa yid ni kun tu bzang po kha dog sngon po zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa kha dog dus kyi 'khor lo lta bu ste shar gyi sgo'i g.yon du ra ba'i rtsig pa la'o/_/de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams las skyes pa sgra rdo rje ma ni kun tu bzang po 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]lta bu ste byang gi sgo'i g.yon du'o/_/steng du nam mkha'i khams las skyes pa rna ba ni phyag na rdo rje ljang khu mi bskyod pa lta bu ste lho'i sgo'i g.yon du'o/_/de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams las skyes pa chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ni phyag na rdo rje lta bu ste nub kyi sgo'i 
[\[210a.2\]]g.yon du'o/_/de ltar zla ba lnga pa la skye mched drug dang drug pa la reg pa zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las reg bya la sogs pa'i yul rnams te de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis spro ba'o/_/sku rdo rje'i gnas skabs gnyis pa'o/_/'dir shar dang byang dang steng na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[210a.3\]]dang lha mo nag po dang dkar po rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya ste nam mkha' dang rlung dang chu'i khams rnams khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir ro/_/yang na phyogs bral du gnas pa zur gyi lha mo rnams zla ba la ste mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags zhes gsungs pa'i 
[\[210a.4\]]phyir ro/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang 'og na gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo dmar ba dang ser ba rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ste ye shes dang me dang sa'i khams rnams rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir ro/_/yang na phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams nyi ma la ste nyin mo bcom ldan 'das 
[\[210a.5\]]rdo rje can zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar gang zhig bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa de ni gtso bo ste phyogs rnams su'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa'i lha mo ni gtso mo ste phyogs bral rnams su'o/_/gzhan du phyogs pa ni gtso bo ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[210a.6\]]de'i phyir shes rab phang bar thabs ni gtso bo ma yin pa ste pad+ma dang zla ba la zur gyi char phyogs bral rnams su'o/_/de bzhin du thabs kyi lha rnams kyi phang bar yang lha mo gtso mo ma yin pa ste nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la phyogs rnams su'o/_/gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu 
[\[210a.7\]]skyes 'chang par 'gyur ba'i rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa dag gis phan tshun 'khyud/_/mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na de de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman/_/chu skyes kyi mtshan ma dang rin po che dang ral gri ni g.yon dang g.yas su yang thun mong ngo /_/de ltar 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]shar dang nub dang g.yon dang g.yas dang 'og dang steng du shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i 'dug stangs dag gis bzhugs pa ni thabs 'dren pa ste pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa ni lha mo'i tshogs 'dren ma'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni 
[\[210b.2\]]nag po rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan ma rnams gsungs te/_'dir rigs drug gi phung po rnam par dag pas mtshan ma drug rnams so/_/de la 'du byed kyi rigs las skyes pa don yod grub pa dang sgrol ma dang shin tu stobs dang nam mkha'i snying po dang reg bya rdo rje ma 
[\[210b.3\]]ste nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag dang po na ral gri dang gnyis pa na gri gug dang gsum pa na rtse gsum mo/_/g.yon gyi dang po na phub dang gnyis pa na thod pa dang gsum pa'i phyag gi mthil na kha T+wA~M ga dkar po'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba'i rigs las skyes pa rin chen 'byung 
[\[210b.4\]]ldan dang gos dkar mo dang rmugs byed dang sa'i snying po dang ro rdo rje ma ste dmar po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag dang po na me'i mda' dang gnyis pa na rdo rje lcags kyu dang gsum pa na sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ste rim pa yis so/_/g.yon gyi dang po na gzhu dang gnyis pa na rdo rje 
[\[210b.5\]]zhags pa dang gsum pa na dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu rin po che rtse mo dgu pa'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi rigs las skyes pa rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan ma dang rengs byed dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang dri rdo rje ma ste ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag dang po na 'khor 
[\[210b.6\]]lo dang gnyis pa na dbyug pa dang gsum pa na 'jigs byed rdo rje'o/_/g.yon gyi dang po na dung dang gnyis pa na rdo rje lcags sgrog dang gsum pa na sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bu'o/_/de bzhin du 'du shes kyi rigs las skyes pa snang ba mtha' yas dang mA ma kI dang pad+ma 
[\[210b.7\]]mthar byed dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang gzugs rdo rje ma ste dkar po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag dang po na tho ba dang gnyis pa na mdung dang gsum pa na rtse gsum mo/_/g.yon pa'i dang po na pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgya pa dang gnyis pa na me long dang gsum pa na bgrang phreng 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ngo /_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rigs las skyes pa mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang gtsug tor dang phyag na rdo rje dang chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste ljang khu rnams kyi g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje dang gnyis pa na gri gug dang gsum pa na dgra 
[\[211a.2\]]sta'o/_/g.yon gyi dang po na dril bu dang gnyis pa na thod pa dang gsum pa na tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o/_/de bzhin du ye shes kyi rigs las skyes pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang sna tshogs yum dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang kun du bzang po dang sgra rdo rje ma ste sngon po rnams kyi yang ngo /_/mtshan 
[\[211a.3\]]ma'i nges pa'o/_/yang na sgrol ma dang kun du bzang po'i kha T+wA~M ga'i gnas dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i gnas su ut+pa la'o/_/gang gi tshe du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dang bum pa brgyad dang chos kyi dung la sogs pa res 'ga' dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma dag la dpal 
[\[211a.4\]]ldan 'khor lo ste thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid du yang 'gyur te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nye bar bskor ba yang dpal 'dus pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/'di la skyon med de ris med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de ltar sgrub pa po rnams 
[\[211a.5\]]kyis rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya'o/_/dbang gi don du yang na dkyil 'khor rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur ro/_/'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba rdo rje 
[\[211a.6\]]sems dpa' khu ba mngal du zhugs pa ni zla ba dang po la ma rig pa dang gnyis pa la 'du byed dang gsum pa la rnam par shes pa dang bzhi ba la ming dang gzugs so/_/gzugs dang 'brel pa skye mched drug dang reg pa la sogs pa ni zla ba drug pa ji srid par te rigs kyi 
[\[211a.7\]]dbang gis so zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du snying khar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor khams lnga lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/de nas zla ba bdun pa la tshor ba skye ba'i dus su gnas skabs gsum pa ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la rtsa'i lha mo rnams spro ba ste de la 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni mgrin pa nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa gru bzhir gzung bar bya'o/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo de la rtsa rnam pa bzhi ste snying po'i zlum skor dang po la bzhi dang gnyis pa la brgyad dang gsum pa la bcu gnyis te thugs dang gsung dang sku'i rang bzhin 
[\[211b.2\]]gyis so/_/de nas zlum skor bzhi pa la rdo rje gsum thun mong gi rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste de la drug cu ni dkyil 'khor 'bab pa yin la bzhi ni stong pa'o/_/de bzhin du mgrin par sum cu ni yud tsam 'bab pa ste gnyis ni stong pa'o/_/de ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas gsung gi rtsa thun 
[\[211b.3\]]tshod brgyad kyi dbye ba 'bab pa zlum skor gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams dang lhan cig tu mgrin pa'i bar du spro bar bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni phyi rol zhes pa la sogs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha spro ba gsungs pa/_'dir thugs kyi dkyil 
[\[211b.4\]]'khor gyi phyi rol ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor te phyi rol der ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis pad 'dab brgyad pa rnams la phyogs brgyad kyi lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu tsaR+tsi kA sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral zhing rang rang gi bzhon pa la gnas pa rig byed phyag 
[\[211b.5\]]ces pa phyag bzhi dang spyan gsum ma gdong sna tshogs pa'o/_/de la shar gyi pad+mar tsaR+tsi kA zhal gcig ma nag mo'o/_/mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma khyab 'jug ma'o/_/phag mo dang gdong drug ma ni kha dog dmar mo ste gshin rje dang bden bral du'o/_/chur dbang mo ser 
[\[211b.6\]]mo'o/_/rlung du chu gter gdong ma ste tshangs ma ser mo'o/_/byang du drag mo dkar mo zhal gcig ma'o/_/dbang ldan du dpal mo dkar mo'o/_/de ltar lte ba la gnas pa'i gtso mo'i kha dog dang dbyibs ji lta ba de bzhin du de rnams kyi 'dab ma la gnas pa'i lha mo 
[\[211b.7\]]rnams so/_/de ltar brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so/_/da ni shar la sogs par zhes pa la sogs pas tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag gnyis la mtshan ma rnams rim pa bzhin du gsungs 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]te/_'dir shar du tsaR+tsi kA'i phyag dang po na gri gug dang gnyis pa na rtse gsum mo/_/khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo dang be con no/_/phag mo'i dbyug pa dang ral gri'o/_/gzhon nu ma'i sha ka ti dang lcags kyu'o/_/dbang mo'i rdo rje dang mda'o/_/tshangs ma'i pad+ma dang 
[\[212a.2\]]tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o/_/drag mo'i rtse gsum dang Da ma ru'o/_/dpal chen mo'i pad+ma dang bgrang phreng ngo zhes pa ste g.yas kyi phyag gnyis la'o/_/de bzhin du 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams kyi yang ngo /_/de nas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la shar la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du ste tsaR+tsi 
[\[212a.3\]]kA'i g.yon gyi phyag dang po na thod pa dang gnyis pa na khaT+wA~M ga'o/_/khyab 'jug ma'i pad+ma dang dung ngo /_/phag mo'i lcags sgrog dang phub bo/_/gzhon nu ma'i rin po che dang zhags pa'o/_/dbang mo'i dril bu dang gzhu'o/_/tshangs ma'i spyi blugs dang snod do/_/drag mo'i kha T+wA~M 
[\[212a.4\]]gdang sbrul lo/_/dpal chen mo'i pad+ma dang rin po che nyid do/_/de bzhin du pad+ma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma'i phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no ste gtso mo'i ji lta ba de bzhin no zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni de rnams kyi ming du 'gyur te de la tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa'i 
[\[212a.5\]]pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la shar la sogs pa g.yas skor gyis tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams rig par bya'o/_/de la 'dab ma dang po la 'jigs ma ste gnyis pa la sogs pa la drag mo dang /_dus kyi mche ba ma dang /_me 'bar gdong ma dang /_rlung 
[\[212a.6\]]gi shugs ma dang /_rab gtum ma dang /_drag spyan ma dang /_sna chen ma ste tsaR+tsi kA'i nor 'dab pad+ma la rang gi phyogs rnams su'o/_/khyab 'jug ma'i 'dab ma dang po la sogs pa la g.yang mo dang sgyu ma dang grags ma dang dpal mo dang rnam par rgyal ma dang dpal ldan 
[\[212a.7\]]rgyal ma dang dpal ldan rgyal byed ma dang brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma ste nor 'dab pad+ma la ni khyab 'jug ma'i phyogs kyi char zhes pa mer ro/_/de nas phag mo'i 'dab ma dang po la sogs pa la kang rus mdang dus mtshan ma dang /_rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dang 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dus kyi lce dang gtsigs ma dang nag mo dang 'jigs rung ma dang gzugs ngan ma rnams nor bdag pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo'o zhes pa lhor ro/_/de bzhin du gzhon nu ma'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la pad+ma dang lus med ma dang gzhon nu ma dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[212b.2\]]bdag pos 'gro ma dang rin chen phreng ba ma dang mig bzang ma dang rul ma dang bzang mo ste gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab ma la'o rgyal po kye zhes pa ste bden bral du'o/_/de bzhin du dbang mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus 
[\[212b.3\]]dang gser ldan ma dang Ur pa sI dang bkra ba'i ri mo dang ram b+hA dang zug rngu med dang shin tu sgrol ma ste pad+ma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o zhes pa nub tu'o/_/de nas tshangs ma'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la sa bI trI dang pad+ma'i spyan ma dang chu skyes can 
[\[212b.4\]]ma dang blo gros ma dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma dang gA ya trI dang glog ma dang dran ma rnams kyang pad+ma rigs byed gdong ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o zhes pa rlung du'o/_/de nas drag mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la gau rI dang gaM gA dang rtag ma dang myur ma dang to ta lA dag 
[\[212b.5\]]mtshon byed ma dang dmar ser ma dang nag mo ste/_de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o zhes pa byang du'o/_/de nas dpal mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la dpal ldan dkar mo dang zla ba'i ri mo dang ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma dang ngang 
[\[212b.6\]]pa'i mdog ma dang 'dzin ma dang pad+ma'i dbang mo dang skar mig ma dang dri med ri bong 'dzin ma ste dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas pa'o/_/de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mo tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa rnams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la rnal 'byor ma drug cu 
[\[212b.7\]]rtsa bzhi po rnams te tshor ba'i yan lag la'o/_/sred pa'i yan lag la sku rdo rje thams cad rdzogs pa ste sku rdzogs pa la dpral ba nas gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mthar gru bzhir rig par bya'o/_/de la lag pa dang rkang pa'i las kyi 'khor lo dang bya ba'i 'khor lo'i tshigs 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bcu gnyis la 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i pad+ma bcu gnyis po gang yin pa de rnams ni zla ba brgyad pa la rtsa dang lha'i gzugs kyis spro bar bya'o/_/de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la zhes pa ni de'i phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma bcu gnyis po rnams la shar 
[\[213a.2\]]gyi sgo'i g.yas kyi cha la sogs par ra ba'i rtsig pa la nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa bzhin du bden bral la sogs pa rnam grangs bzhin du gsungs te lha min bden bral te shar gyi sgo'i g.yas su'o/_/g.yo ba zhes pa rlung ste mer ro/_/gshin rje zhes pa lho'i sgo'i 
[\[213a.3\]]g.yon du'o/_/g.yas su me dang bden bral du gdong drug go/_/nub kyi sgo'i g.yon du gnod sbyin dang g.yas su brgya byin dang rlung du tshangs pa'o/_/byang gi sgo'i g.yon du drag po dang g.yas su rgya mtsho dang dbang ldan du tshogs kyi bdag po'o/_/shar gyi sgo'i g.yon 
[\[213a.4\]]du khyab 'jug ste thams cad phyag bzhi pa'o/_/bcu gnyis po 'di rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag gnyis la rim pa bzhin mtshan ma rnams su 'gyur te bden bral gyi dang po na ral gri dang gnyis pa na gri gug go/_/rlung gi dang po na ljon shing dbang po ste dpag bsam gyi 
[\[213a.5\]]shing dang gnyis pa na yongs 'du'i me tog go/_/gshin rje'i dang po na dbyug pa dang gnyis pa na ral gri'o/_/me'i dang po na shaka ti dang gnyis pa na dbyug pa'o/_/gdong drug gi dang po na sha ka ti dang gnyis pa na mdung ngo /_/nor sbyin gyi dang po na nor bu rin po che 
[\[213a.6\]]dang gnyis pa na be con no/_/dbang po'i dang po na rdo rje dang gnyis pa na me'i mda'o/_/tshangs pa'i dang po na khab dang gnyis pa na bgrang phreng ngo /_/drag po'i dang po na rtse gsum dang gnyis pa na mda'o/_/chu lha'i dang po na zhags pa dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o/_/log 
[\[213a.7\]]'dren gyi dang po na dgra sta dang gnyis pa na rdo rje'o/_/khyab 'jug gi dang po na 'khor lo dang gnyis pa na dbyug tho'o/_/de nas g.yon du bden bral gyi phyag dang po na phub dang gnyis pa na thod pa'o/_/rlung gi dang po na in+d+ra nI la dang gnyis pa na ut+pa la sngon po'o/_/gshin 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]rje'i dang po na lcags sgrog dang gnyis pa na zhags pa'o/_/me'i dang po na pad+ma dang gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs so/_/gdong drug pa'i dang po na rin po che dang gnyis pa na me long ngo /_/gnod sbyin gyi dang po na ne'u le dang gnyis pa na pad+ma'o/_/dbang po'i dang po na dril bu dang 
[\[213b.2\]]gnyis pa na gzhu'o/_/tshangs pa'i dang po na pad+ma dang gnyis pa na spyi blugs so/_/drag po'i dang po na sbrul dang bcas pa'i kha T+wA~M ga dang gnyis pa na gzhu'o/_/rgya mtsho'i dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa dang gnyis pa na zla ba chu shel gyi nor bu rin po che'o/_/log 'dren gyi 
[\[213b.3\]]dang po na zhags pa dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o/_/nor lha'i dang po na pad+ma dang gnyis pa na skye ba lnga pa'i dung ste thams cad kyi phyag g.yon pa gnyis la rim pa bzhin du mtshan ma rnams so/_/bden bral la sogs pa pad+ma'i lte ba la gnas pa de rnams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma 
[\[213b.4\]]ni 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad de g.yas skor gyis 'dab ma'i zlum skor gsum las zlum skor dang po la 'dab ma bzhi dang gnyis pa la brgyad dang gsum pa la bcu drug go/_/de ltar 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams la nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba'i tshes rnams te dkar po dang 
[\[213b.5\]]nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi nya dang gnam stong gi gtso bo nyid kyi lte ba la gnas so/_/de ltar nag pa'i zla ba'i tshes rnams bden bral gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la'o/_/sa ga'i zla ba'i tshes rnams rlung gi la'o/_/snron gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams me'i la'o/_/chu stod kyi zla ba'i tshes 
[\[213b.6\]]rnams gdong drug gi la'o/_/gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams rgya mtsho'i la'o/_/khrums stod kyi zla ba'i tshes rnams log 'dren gyi la'o/_/tha skar gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams dbang po'i la'o/_/smin drug gi zla ba'i tshes rnams tshangs pa'i la'o/_/mgo'i zla ba'i tshes 
[\[213b.7\]]rnams drag po'i la'o/_/rgyal gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams gnod sbyin gyi la'o/_/mchu'i zla ba'i tshes rnams khyab 'jug gi la'o/_/dbo'i zla ba'i tshes rnams gshin rje'i la'o/_/lha mo rnams kyi kha dog dang mtshon cha dang dbyibs ni de bzhin no/_/de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]ma rnams la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag tshes rnams dang ni lte bar rdzogs pa gnyis/_mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong pa dus dang 'jig rten zhes pa sum brgya drug cu ste de rnams lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya'o/_/'chad par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[214a.2\]]sa bon dang por gyur pa rdo rje'i mtha' can ni 'di rnams kyi ming du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil dang gtsug tor dang bshang lam gyi rtsa spro ba'i dag pas sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi 
[\[214a.3\]]ma rnams te/_'di rnams ni gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro ba'i phyir gtso mo ma yin pa nyid do/_/dbyug pa sngon po la sogs pa rnams ni rang gi gnas kyi phyir gtso bo nyid do/_/de'i phyir rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la sogs pa 'di rnams mngon du phyogs pa'i gnas su 'gro ba 
[\[214a.4\]]ni shar la sogs pa'i rigs so/_/rigs kyi dbang des na lcags sgrog ma'i g.yas kyi phyag dang po na ral gri dang gnyis pa na rdo rje ste don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi dbang gis so/_/de bzhin du rin chen rigs kyi dbang gis khro gnyer can gyi phyag dang po na mda' 
[\[214a.5\]]dang gnyis pa na lcags kyu dang bcas pa'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi dbang gis 'od zer can gyi g.yas kyi phyag dang po na 'khor lo dang gnyis pa na dbyug pa'o/_/rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhes pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang gis tsun dA'i phyag dang po 
[\[214a.6\]]na tho ba dang gnyis pa na mdung ngo /_/ye shes kyi rigs kyi dbang gis shin tu sngon mo'i dang po na gri gug dang gnyis pa na rdo rje'o/_/nam mkha'i rigs kyi dbang gis drag spyan ma'i dang po na dgra sta dang gnyis pa na rtse gsum mo/_/de bzhin du lcags sgrog ma'i g.yon 
[\[214a.7\]]gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul lo/_/khro gnyer can gyi dang po na gzhu dang gnyis pa na zhags pa'o/_/'od zer can gyi dung dang rin chen no/_/tsun dA'i pad+ma dang me long ngo /_/shin tu sngon mo'i thod pa dang dril bu'o/_/drag spyan ma'i sbrul gyi zhags pa dang kha T+wA~M ga'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]du shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor gnas pa dbyug pa sngon po dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba'i 'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/de nas zla ba dgu pa len pa la bya ba'i 'khor lo'i sor mo nyi shu'i rtsa rnam par dag pas klu bcu dang rab gtum ma bcu 
[\[214b.2\]]spro bar bya ste sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu rta babs bzhi'i ka ba brgyad kyi 'og tu klu brgyad dang 'og dang steng du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba dag go/_/thams cad phyag bzhi pa ste g.yas kyi dang po na bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang gnyis pa na rdo rje'o/_/g.yon gyi dang po na pad+ma 
[\[214b.3\]]dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o/_/de'i phyir bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyag rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhes pa ste shar gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis la pad+ma dang stobs kyi rgyu dag go/_/lhor me'i dkyil 'khor la nor rgyas kyi bu dang dung skyong ngo /_/
[\[214b.4\]]nub tu sa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jog po dang pad+ma chen po'o/_/byang du chu'i dkyil 'khor la mtha' yas dang rigs ldan no/_/nam mkha' la rgyal ba'o/_/ye shes la rnam par rgyal ba'o zhes pa ste rkang pa'i sor mo bcu'o/_/de nas lag pa'i sor mo rnam par dag 
[\[214b.5\]]pas shar du khyi gdong ma dang lhor phag gdong ma dang nub tu ce spyang gdong ma dang byang du stag gdong ma ste rlung dang me'i khor yug gi dbus su dur khrod chen po la zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can no/_/de bzhin du mer bya rog gdong ma dang bden 
[\[214b.6\]]bral du bya rgod gdong ma dang rlung du mkha' lding gdong ma dang dbang ldan du 'ug gdong ma dang sa 'og tu rdo rje'i mig dang nam mkhar sngon mo ste 'di rnams thams cad phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba'o/_/de bzhin du ba 
[\[214b.7\]]spu dang skra rnam par dag pas phyed dang bcas pa bye ba phrag gsum gyi 'byung po'i skye gnas g.yo ba'i mthar zhes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar te pags pa'i mthar ba spu rnams so/_/zhes bsngags pas phyi rol du spro bar bya ste de ltar zla ba dgu'i mthar lus dang lha'i tshogs 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]rdzogs pa'o/_/da ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dmar dang zhes pa la sogs pas tsA muN DA la sogs pa rnams kyi pad+mar gdan rnams gsungs te/_'dir shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la tsA muN DA'i gdan [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po dmar pa'o/_/lte ba dang 'dab ma brgyad tsA mu Na DA la sogs pa'i lha mo 
[\[215a.2\]]rnams so/_/de bzhin du khyab 'jug ma'i mkha' lding dang phag mo'i ma he dang gzhon nu ma'i rma bya dang dbang mo'i glang po dang tshangs ma'i ngang pa dang drag mo'i khyu mchog dang dpal chen mo'i seng ge ni rim pas gdan te phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi pad+ma rnams su'o/_/lha min la 
[\[215a.3\]]sogs rnams kyi de bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bden bral gyi pad+mar gdan ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dmar po'o/_/khyab 'jug gi mkha' lding dang gshin rje'i ma he dang gzhon nu'i rma bya dang dbang po'i glang po dang tshangs pa'i ngang pa dang drag po'i khyu mchog go zhes pa ni bden bral 
[\[215a.4\]]la sogs pa rnams kyi nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni zhes pa lnga po rnams kyi grangs bzhin du ste nor bdag gi glang po che dang me'i lug dang rgya mtsho'i chu srin dang rlung gi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang tshogs kyi bdag po'i byi ba'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[215a.5\]]du bya rog gdong ma'i 'khor lo'i 'og tu b+he ruN+Da dang bya rgod gdong ma'i khrung khrung dang mkha' lding gdong ma'i mig sngon dang 'ug gdong ma'i bya ma byi ste zur du'o/_/de bzhin du phyogs rnams su khyi gdong ma'i 'khor lo'i 'og tu bse dang phag gdong ma'i dom dang ce spyang 
[\[215a.6\]]gdong ma'i seng ge dang stag gdong ma'i 'bri'o zhes pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs rnams su'o/_/rdo rje'i mig ma'i rkang pa brgyad pa sa 'og shing rta la gnas pa'o/_/mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi mkhar bgrod khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas 
[\[215a.7\]]mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa'o/_/de bzhin du shar gyi sgor 'od zer can gyi shing rta la phag bdun dang lhor tsun dA'i shing rta la rta bdun dang nub tu lcags sgrog ma'i shing rta la glang po bdun dang byang du khro gnyer can gyi shing rta la seng ge bdun no/_/de bzhin du 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]de nas snying kha'i rtsa bcu'i rang bzhin gyis thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi stegs bu la mchod pa'i lha mo spro bar bya ste shar du dri ma dang phreng ba ma dang lhor bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang nub tu sgeg mo dang bzhad ma dang byang du rol mo ma dang 
[\[215b.2\]]gar mkhan ma dang nam mkhar glu ma dang 'dod ma dang 'og tu bshang ba dang gci ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin gyis lha bshos ma dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ma'o/_/rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa'i lha mo gang su yang rung ba de rnams ni shar dang nub kyi 
[\[215b.3\]]rta babs kyi 'og tu blta bar bya ste phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams bsgom pa ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i gnas nyid du'o/_/sgo'i g.yon gyi kun du bzang po la sogs pa bzhi yang de bzhin no zhes pa nges pa'o/_/de ltar mchod pa'i lha mo rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[215b.4\]]mtha' yas pa'i gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste stegs bu la'o/_/de bzhin du gdeng sa can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du stegs bu la'o/_/de'i phyir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la 'dod ma rnams 
[\[215b.5\]]so/_/de la shar du sgrol ma las skyes pa dbye bar 'dod ma dang lhor gos dkar mo las skyes pa bskyod par 'dod ma dang byang du mA ma kI las skyes pa rgyas par 'dod ma dang nub tu spyan ma las skyes pa rengs par 'dod ma ste de ltar lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa 
[\[215b.6\]]yis so/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma las skyes pa ni srid gsum skyed ma gsod par 'dod ma'o/_/sna tshogs yul las skyes pa ni skyed par 'dod ma'o/_/de bzhin du sgra las skyes pa rol mo 'dod ma dang gzugs las skyes pa rgyan 'dod ma dang /_ro 
[\[215b.7\]]las skyes pa zas 'dod ma dang /_dri las skyes pa dri 'dod ma dang /_reg bya las skyes pa gos 'dod ma dang /_chos kyi khams las skyes pa 'khrig pa 'dod ma ste/_shar la sogs pa'i stegs bu rnams la rigs kyi dbye bas so/_/tsA mu Na DA las skyes pa 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]lus la 'phrug par 'dod ma dang /_khyab 'jug ma las skyes pa kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor bar 'dod ma dang /_phag mo las skyes pa lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang /_gzhon nu ma las skyes pa gar 'dod ma dang /_drag mo las skyes pa stan 'dod 
[\[216a.2\]]ma dang /_tshangs ma las skyes pa chu la rkyal bar 'dod ma dang /_dbang po las skyes pa mal stan la snyes par 'dod ma dang /_dpal mo las skyes pa rgyal srid 'dod ma ste tsA mu Na DA la sogs pa brgyad kyi bya ba rnams so/_/de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod 
[\[216a.3\]]ma ste 'dir shin tu sngon mo las skyes pa kun du gdung ba 'dod ma dang /_rengs byed ma las skyes pa gnyen pa 'dod ma dang /_nga rgyal ma las skyes pa 'jam par smra ba 'dod ma dang /_rmugs byed ma las skyes pa skems 'dod ma dang /_shin tu stobs ma las 
[\[216a.4\]]skyes pa skrod 'dod ma dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma las skyes pa reg bya 'dod ma dang /_khro gnyer can las skyes pa dgug 'dod ma dang /_tsun DA las skyes pa 'ching 'dod ma dang /_'od zer can las skyes pa phur bus 'debs par 'dod ma dang /_drag 
[\[216a.5\]]spyan ma las skyes pa rgyug par 'dod ma'o/_/de bzhin du lha min rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi 'dod ma rnams ni khyi gdong ma las skyes pa yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma dang /_phag gdong ma las skyes pa bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang /_ce spyang 
[\[216a.6\]]gdong ma las skyes pa sems can rnams la slu bar 'dod ma dang /_stag gdong ma las skyes pa rtsod pa mang po 'dod ma dang /_bya rog gdong ma las skyes pa lhag ma za bar 'dod ma dang /_bya rgod gdong ma las skyes pa g.yul 'dod ma dang /_mkha' 
[\[216a.7\]]lding gdong ma las skyes pa sbrul 'ching bar 'dod ma dang /_'ug gdong ma las skyes pa byis pa khro bar 'dod ma ste/_'dod ma sum cu rtsa bdun rnams ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la rang gi rigs kyi dbye bas rang rang gi phyogs rnams su'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams zhes pa 'dod ma rnams las bzlog pa ni phyir 'dod ma zhes brjod de/_de rnams sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la rang gi rigs kyi dbang gis rang rang gi phyogs rnams su 'o zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o/_/de ltar phyi yi dkyil 
[\[216b.2\]]'khor gyi phyi rol gyi snam bu la gzhan yang nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can gyi bya ba 'dod pa de thams cad 'dir khams kyi dbang gis rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gsungs pa zhes pa de ltar zhes pa la sogs 
[\[216b.3\]]pa ste zhes pa de ltar skye ba'i zla ba bdun pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phyi rol du rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang zhes pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gsungs te/_byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyi sems brtan 
[\[216b.4\]]par bya ba'i don du'o/_/'dir phyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang nang lus dang gzhan brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor la spro ba dang bsdu ba ni spro dang bsdu ba dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas zhes pa la 'dir dngos po ni rdul phra rab kyi rdzas sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ste 'byung ba 
[\[216b.5\]]bzhi po rnams dang nam mkha'i khams ni zla ba dang rjes su nga ro 'am khu ba'am de bzhin du rdul lam thig le gnyis dang nyi ma yang nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin du sgra gcan rnam par shes pa'i khams te de ltar khams drug gi bdag nyid can skyes bu chen po'i gang zag 
[\[216b.6\]]ni dngos po'i skye ba'o/_/dngos po'i skye ba de'i 'byung ba ni spro ba'o/_/nyams pa ni sdud pa ste de gnyis las 'byung ba las skyes pa rnams yang dag par gnas so/_/de ltar sa'i skye ba ni ljon shing la sogs pa brtan pa rnams dang chu'i skye ba ni drod gsher las 
[\[216b.7\]]skyes pa rnams dang me'i skye ba ni mngal skyes rnams dang /_rlung gi skye ba ni sgong skyes rnams dang zla ba'i skye ba ni klu dang lha ma yin rnams dang nyi ma'i skye ba ni 'byung po dang lha rnams dang sgra gcan gyi skye ba ni gzugs med rnams dang dus me'i skye ba ni dmyal ba rnams so/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]de ltar skye ba rnam pa brgyad ni dngos po'i rang bzhin can te dngos po'i skye ba'o/_/de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje zhes pa la 'dir mkha' zhes pa ni dgu pa nam mkha'i rdul phra rab kyi rdzas dang bral ba mi chod pa ste gcad du med pa dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir 
[\[217a.2\]]dang rdzas med pa'i phyir mkha' yi rdo rje nam mkha'i khams ni rtag pa ste nam mkha'i khams de thams cad na gnas pa nyid kyi phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas kyang mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sngar brjod pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi 
[\[217a.3\]]yi bdag po mig 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du brtags na med pa zhes pa'i rigs pa las so/_/de ltar rnam par dpyad kyang rtag pa stong pa chen po mthong zhing mi rtag pa rdul phra rab phrad pa dang 'bral ba yang mthong ste gnyi ga sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs su mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[217a.4\]]lta na yang blun po'i blo can byis pa rnams gzhug pa dang sems ni dag pa'i don slad du kye mi'i bdag po zla ba bzang po khyod kyis sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste don dam par ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i dngos po snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med do/_/
[\[217a.5\]]de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa de nyid ni zhes pa nges pa ste 'dir gang zhig brtags pa'i sgrub thabs de ni 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang yin pa'o/_/de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba ste 
[\[217a.6\]]brtags pa dang bral bdag ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang por bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni dpal ldan zhes pa la sogs pas rten dang brten pa gsungs te sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la dpal ldan rdo rje can gtso bo ni thugs rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag sku gsung thugs 
[\[217a.7\]]kyi mtshan nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni sku yi rdo rje'o/_/lha rnams 'khor lo A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o/_/de ltar gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha'i tshogs ni gsung rdo rje'o/_/de ltar sku'i rnam pas thugs rnam pa gsum dang 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas sku rnam pa gsum dang so sor brjod pas gsung yang rnam pa gsum mo zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o/_/'dir pad+ma rnams kyi rtsa ba dang sdong bu ni a yig las byung ba'o/_/'dab ma rnams dang ge sar rnams ni u yig las yang dag 
[\[217b.2\]]par byung ba'o/_/dbus kyi lte ba dang zla ba'i gdan ni ma yig las so/_/nyi ma'i gdan ni yang na ra yig las so/_/de ltar o~M yig pra Na ba ni snying por gsungs te pad+ma'o/_/mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba 'di la dang po lha'i sku'i dbyibs rdzogs pa'o zhes 
[\[217b.3\]]pa ste nges pa'o/_/de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can bsgoms te/_de nas 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bkug 
[\[217b.4\]]nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du bcug par bsgom par bya'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khams dang bcas pa rnams rang gi snying khar bcug nas byang chub kyi sems su zhu bar gyur pa rnams rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nas spros te byang chub kyi 
[\[217b.5\]]sems des sems can de rnams thams cad la dbang bskur bar bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis reg pa'i sems can de rnams thams cad zhal gsum pa dang zhal sna tshogs pa dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lca'i rang bzhin shes rab 
[\[217b.6\]]dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can mchog gi dga' ba'i bde bas gang bar bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas de rnams kyi rang gi lus dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gyur par skad cig gis blta bar bya'o/_/de la sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gsal byed sna tshogs 
[\[217b.7\]]brtsegs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams so/_/'dir gsal byed thams cad kyi tshogs ni k+Sha yig ste shes par byed pa des gang gi ming gi gsal byed dang po gang yin pa de sa des thams cad bya'o/_/'dir k+Sha k+Shi k+Sh-I k+Shu k+Sh-I zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o/_/de bzhin du k+ShA k+ShI k+Sh+RI k+ShU k+Sh+l-I zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa khams lnga'o/_/de bzhin du k+Sha k+She k+Shar k+Sho k+Shal k+ShaM zhes pa ni rna ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug go/_/de bzhin du k+ShA k+Shai k+ShAr k+Shau k+ShAl k+ShaHzhes pa ni yul drug 
[\[218a.2\]]go/_/k+Sh+ha k+Sh+Ya k+Sh+Ra k+Sh+Wa k+Sh+la zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga'o/_/de bzhin du khro mo rnams ni k+Sh+hA k+Sh+YA k+Sh+RA k+Sh+WA k+Sh+lA zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po'i yul lnga'o/_/de ltar phung po lnga dang khams lnga dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang las kyi dbang po lnga dang las kyi dbang po'i yul lnga ste de ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu 
[\[218a.3\]]rtsa gnyis su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par sems can thams cad skad cig gis bsgom par bya'o/_/yang na rgyas par te lha mo'i gsang bar sa bon so so re res de rnams so sor rdzogs par byas nas spro bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las 
[\[218a.4\]]gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas zhing na sems can gang /_/sku gsum dam tshig bdud rtsi yis/_/bskyed cing rdo rje dpal gyis reg_/thams cad der ni de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes thob/_/'dir ni rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur par/_/bsgoms te de nas de 
[\[218a.5\]]dag rnams/_/rang rang zhing du rab tu gzhug ces pa'o/_/sems can rnams la brtse ba'i don du dbang bskur sbyin pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni zla ba bcu pa srid pa'i yan lag la srog spro ba dang gsung gi rdo rje bskyed pa'i slad du btsa' ba gsungs te/_phyi rol du yang skyed pa 
[\[218a.6\]]gnyis pa'o/_/de la lte ba dang gtsug tor du yang hoHyig ste 'di gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i dpral bar sku rdo rje o~M mgrin par gsung rdo rje AHsnying gar thugs rdo rje hu~M zhes pa'i yi ge gsum po 'di ni sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid rtsa gsum skyed par byed pa'o/_/lte bar hoH
[\[218a.7\]]yig ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis zhu ba bde mnyam pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang zhes pa yang yig gis shes rab dang lhan cig ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin du rnam par bltas nas nang du dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa'i don dang 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]phyi rol gyi yul thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i don dang phyi rol du lha rdzogs pa na 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don byed pa'i slad du byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin can/_sgrol ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang spyan ma ste lha mo rnams kyis glu dag [\]]
[\[218b.2\]]mdzad pa/_bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po/_/bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod ces pa ste/_byams pa'i rang bzhin sgrol mas thugs rdo rje dang /_snying rje'i rang bzhin mA ma kI sa sku rdo 
[\[218b.3\]]rje dang /_dga' ba'i rang bzhin gos dkar mos gsung rdo rje dang /_btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin spyan mas ye shes rdo rje skul bar byed do/_/de ltar thugs dang sku dang gsung ye shes kyi bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can des de rnams kyi glu dag gsan nas 'dod pa dang 
[\[218b.4\]]gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur gzigs nas zla ba zhu ba de la hu~M yig kha dog sngon po dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba bltas te de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o/_/de las spros pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba bdag 
[\[218b.5\]]nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan can shes rab kyis 'khyud par gyur pa yang rdzogs pa'o/_/sngar bzhin du slar yang shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid thugs dang gsung dang sku'i chos kyis dkyil 'khor rab tu spro bar bya ste skyes pa'i byis pa 
[\[218b.6\]]rab tu sad pa du bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir sngags kyi tshul la mngal nas skyes pa skye ba'i rim pas zla ba dgus byis pa'i lus rdzogs shing rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid ni lha rnams kyi sku rdzogs pa ste bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang po'o/_/'dir lha'i nga 
[\[218b.7\]]rgyal gyi slad du sngags kyi tshig ni o~M su bi shud d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes brjod de de nas gsung rdo rje bskyed pa'i slad du rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa'i yan lag gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las bskyed pa'i rim pas sku rdzogs pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste gnyis pa'o//_//'dir ni srog gi kun spyod dag las gsung gi rdo rje dkyil 'khor bcu'i bdag nyid de/_/
[\[219a.2\]]stong pa la sogs dbye ba dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can las rtag tu gnas lnga la gnas shing /_/srid pa'i 'jigs las sems can rnams kyi lhag par mos pas dam pa'i lam ni ston byed pa/_/'di yi skyed pa 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs pa rgyas 'grel gyis ni rnam par 
[\[219a.3\]]rgyas par bya/_/hoHyig ces pa la sogs pa ni 'dir mi'i 'jig rten du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi srog gi rlung bskyed pa'i slad du rang gi dkyil 'khor 'bab pa sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyis rmi lam gyi gnas skabs su zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa la sad pa'i gnas 
[\[219a.4\]]skabs kyi don du skul bar byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can don gyi slad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams rig par bya'o/_/'dir lha la lte ba dang gtsug tor gyi a ba d+hU tI'i lam du hoHyig thog ma tha mar bkod de de nas dpral bar sku rdo rje o~M dang mgrin par gsung rdo rje AHdang 
[\[219a.5\]]snying gar thugs rdo rje hu~M ste de ltar sku gsung thugs las yang dag par byung ba zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi mtshan nyid do/_/dus kyi mes 'og dang steng nas shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis zhu ba ste shes rab chags pas zhu ba zhes pa la shes rab ni gtum mo ste des zhu ba'o/_/'dir bskul ba 
[\[219a.6\]]rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni srog rdzogs pa'i slad du yin la gnyis pa ni lo bcu drug gi mthar bde ba rdzogs pa'i slad du'o/_/des na rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba bzhin bltas nas yang yig gis shes rab kyang ste shes rab dang bcas pa'i thugs dang ye shes rdo rje a ba d+hU tI dang dung can 
[\[219a.7\]]ma la rten pa'o/_/lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po/_/bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod/_/'dir byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]rang bzhin can sgrol ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang spyan ma ste lha mo rnams kyis byis pa rnams la dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i don dang bcom ldan 'das la 'gro ba'i don gyi slad du skul bar byed do/_/lha mo'i rdo rje'i glus bskul ba'i nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_
[\[219b.2\]]spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i yum/_/rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas/_/bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/_/dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/_/mA ma kI bdag sring mo ste/_/rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas/_/bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/_/
[\[219b.3\]]dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/_/gos dkar mo bdag bu mo ste/_/rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bur gnas/_/bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/_/dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/_/sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste/_/rnal 'byor ba yi dri bral gnas/_/
[\[219b.4\]]bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/_/dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod/_/stong pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams myong nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam pa yis/_/'gro ba'i mgon po spro bar mdzod/_/ces pa ste de ltar bde 
[\[219b.5\]]mnyam 'bras bu ster ba lte ba dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i pad+ma la byis pa rnams kyi rnam par shes pa brgya la bar gyur pa sad bar byed pa bzhin du lha'i sku gnas so zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to/_/da ni rdo rje can des glu zhes pa la sogs pas lha bzhengs pa gsungs te 'dir stong pa 
[\[219b.6\]]nyid la rab tu zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das glu rnams kyis rab tu sad par gyur pa na 'gro ba mtha' dag sgyu ma lta bur gzigs nas sems can gyi don gyi slad du slar yang skyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma hu~M yig yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa spros byas nas 
[\[219b.7\]]des rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan zhes pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no/_/shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur ba zhes pa ni stong pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma sna tshogs yum gyis te de'i snying gar byis pa rnams kyi bzhin no/_/rgyal 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]po zhes pa bod pa ste shes rab thabs kyis ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par zhugs pas dkyil 'khor lnga'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas nam mkhar gnas pa rnams phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[220a.2\]]gyi don du rang gi lus la bcug ste shes rab kyi pad+mar sngags kyi rang bzhin yi ge so so rnams so/_/de nas pad+ma las sngon bzhin du zhal dang phyag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid can rnams ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams la spro bar bya'o/_/
[\[220a.3\]]de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo /_/kyang yig gis sngon bzhin zhes pa'o/_/byis pa mngal nas 'byung ba'i dus su srog la sogs pa'i rlung bcu skye'o/_/slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su me tog 'thor ro/_/gcer bu mngal gyi phru ma'i 
[\[220a.4\]]gos 'dzin pa byis pa zhes pa'i rnam par dag pas lha'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/_/de nas dbang po rab tu sad pa ni ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa ste byis pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du lha la rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor pa 
[\[220a.5\](]rnam [,]rnams [)]kyis bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas sku rdzogs pa ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag ste/_rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs par byang chub pas gsung rdzogs pa ni nye ba'i sgrub pa'o/_/de ltar skyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni mngal 
[\[220a.6\]]nas skyes pa dang gnyis pa sgo nga las skyes pa'o/_/gang sgong las skyes pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams skyed pa ste tshangs pa'i sgo nga zhes pa'i tshig gi phyir ro/_/gang mngal nas skyes pa de ni mi rnams skyed pa'o/_/gang skad cig gis gang yin pa de ni sems can rnams rdzus 
[\[220a.7\]]skyes las skyed pa'o/_/de ni skyed pa'i rim pa gcig ste skad cig gi rnam pa sems can gyi bsam pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni rtog pa dang bral ba ste/_nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/_/shes rab ye shes me bo che/_/'od chen rnam 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]par snang bar byed/_/ye shes snang ba lam me ba/_zhes pa la sogs pa rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas rtogs par bya'o/_/da ni 'od zer sngon po zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa gsungs te/_'dir byis pa skyes pa'i dbu ma'i 
[\[220b.2\]]srog 'byung ba ni 'od zer sngon po ste de'i 'byung bas dbang po rnams rab tu sad cing phyi rol gyi yul rnams la rnam par shes pa drug po rnams 'jug pa ni nang du'o/_/de'i phyir phyi rol gyi lha rdzogs pa la dbu ma'i srog rnam par dag pas rdo rje shugs 'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i 
[\[220b.3\]]sku rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal mche ba phyed gtsigs pa sgra drag po sgrogs pa spyan bcu gnyis pa/_/gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa shes rab dang thabs las rab tu byung ba gtso bo bzhin du mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa glang po 
[\[220b.4\]]che'i pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa thod pa dang mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa hu~M yig rdo rje'i sprul pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas zhes pa sgra dang reg bya dang ro dang gzugs dang dri dang snying stobs dang 
[\[220b.5\]]rdul dang mun pa'i yon tan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa ste/_bdud dang nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje shugs de ni ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du zhes pa yul lnga'i shes pa 'jug pa'i slad du bskul bar bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las 
[\[220b.6\]]'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/de nas lte ba'i pad+ma las phyi rol du 'byung ba'i srog gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams bkug nas slar yang ldog go/_/de'i phyir rnam par dag pas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nges par lte bar rdo rje lcags kyus bsnun 
[\[220b.7\]]byas shing /_phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams rang gi rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa ngag gis bcings nas rang gi mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs par byas te/_de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgrub byar byas shing dngos po'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i 'khor lo mtha' dag bskyod par byas 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]nas slar yang rang gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/de nas gzhug pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang mig gi dbang po las skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa rmugs byed kyis byed do/_/bcing ba ni lus kyi dbang po las skyes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa rengs 
[\[221a.2\]]byed kyis byed do/_/mnyes pa ni lce'i dbang po las skyes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa khengs byed kyis byed do/_/ro mnyam par byed pa ni sna'i dbang po las skyes pa sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu stobs kyis byed do/_/de ltar na rnam pa lnga ni dzaHyig gis dgug pa dang hU~M yig gis gzhug pa dang 
[\[221a.3\]]ba~M yig gis bcing ba dang hoHyig gis mnyes pa dang hI yig gis ro mnyam par byas te/_rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje dbyug pas so/_/de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod de sngar bzhin dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ro mnyam pa nyid du 
[\[221a.4\]]gyur pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni skyed pa'i zhes pa sogs pas skyed pa'i rim pas gnas so sor ye shes kyi lha rnams dam tshig gi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu gcig pa nyid gsungs te/_'dir skyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi skyed pa'i rim pa dag la rnam par shes pa na nam 
[\[221a.5\]]mkha' dang bcas zhes pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang lhan cig tu snying po'i pad+mar zhes pa bde ba chen po la me'i steng du ste zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan nam dus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' ro mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[221a.6\]]du shar gyi 'dab ma la nag mo 'bar ma ro mnyam pa'o/_/mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lhor dmar mo 'bar ma dang byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dang nub tu ser mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal gyi dbang gis so/_/de bzhin du mer du ba ma dang bden bral du 
[\[221a.7\]]smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan du mkha' snang ma dang rlung du mar me ma ro mnyam pa'o/_/de bzhin du me'i zur du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bden bral du chos kyi gaN+DI dang dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ste rdo rje phreng ba dang pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag gi bar du zur gyi cha la'o/_/de 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bzhin du shar gyi pad+ma'i gdan gyi lte bar nyi ma la 'du byed dang sa gnyis po dam tshig sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig ro mnyam pa'o/_/lhor tshor ba dang chu'i khams dang byang du 'du shes dang me'i khams dang nub tu rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs ro mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/'dir thabs rnams 
[\[221b.2\]]gtso bo'o/_/de bzhin du me'i phyogs su rlung dang gzugs dag ro mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/bden bral du me'i khams dang 'du shes dang dbang ldan du chu'i khams dang tshor ba dang rlung du sa'i khams dang 'du byed dang ro mnyam pa ste zur du lha mo rnams gtso mo'o/_/de bzhin du lha mo sangs 
[\[221b.3\]]rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro'i bum pa rnams ro mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phar ma la'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma'i shar gyi pad+ma la sna dang dri ro mnyam pa'o/_/lhor mig dang yul gzugs dang 
[\[221b.4\]]byang du lce dang ro dang chur lus kyi dbang po dang reg bya dang nam mkhar rna ba dang sgra dag ste lho yi sgo'i g.yon du'o/_/sa 'og tu ni nges par yid dang chos kyi khams su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo'i g.yon du'o/_/de ltar dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang 
[\[221b.5\]]gis dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur ro/_/phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ces pa ni chos kyi khams la sogs pa ste 'dir mer reg bya rdo rje ma dang lus kyi dbang po'o/_/bden bral du ro rdo rje ma dang lce'o/_/dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma dang mig go/_/rlung du dri rdo rje ma dang sna'o/_/
[\[221b.6\]]sa 'og tu sgra rdo rje ma dang rna ba ste byang gi sgo'i g.yon du'o/_/nam mkha' la chos kyi khams dang yid de nub kyi sgo'i g.yon du rang rang gi pad+ma'i gdan la zla ba'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' dang ro mnyam du byed pa'o/_/de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[221b.7\]]'phar ma la'o/_/da ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid gsungs te/_shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te/_de'i phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o/_/lho'i sgor rmugs byed dang phyag rgya nga rgyal ma'o/_/byang gi sgor khengs byed dang phyag rgya rmugs byed ma'o/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]nub kyi sgor rengs byed dang de'i phyag rgya mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur te sgo'i dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la ro mnyam pa'o/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ro mnyam par byed pa ste skye ba can gyi lte ba'i 'khor lo dang snying ga'i pad+ma la'o zhes pa ni 
[\[222a.2\]]nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du khro bo'i zhar las byung ba phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo skyong ste shar du dbyug pa sngon po dang 'od zer can ro mnyam pa'o/_/lhor 'dod pa dang tsun dA shing rta la gnas pa'o/_/byang du mi g.yo ba dang khro gnyer can ma'o/_/nub tu brtson 'grus mtha' yas 
[\[222a.3\]]te/_stobs po che dang lcags sgrog ma ro mnyam pa'o/_/sa 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po dang drag spyan ma'o/_/steng du gtsug tor dang shin tu sngon mo'o/_/rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la shar gyi sgo'i steng du gtsug tor dang nub tu gnod mdzes te/_gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang ngo 
[\[222a.4\]]zhes pa nges pa'o/_/bsgom pa la ni 'og dang steng du shing rta'o/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor la kha dang dbang po dang bshang lam dang gtsug tor ni sgo rnams te dbang po zhes pa ni gci ba dang khu ba'i sgo'o/_/phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor la sna dang mig dang lce dang lus dang rna ba 
[\[222a.5\]]rnams te byis pa'i lus la ji lta ba de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du gnas lnga nas brjod pa'i dbang gis gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo lnga ste de ltar 'og dang steng du stong pa'i sgo gsum po khu ba'i sgo dang lus dang mgrin pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[222a.6\]]spangs nas dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams la sgo bcu gnyis so/_/de ltar nyi ma'i dus sbyor gyi dbye bas sgo bcu gnyis dang zla ba'i cha'i dbye bas bco lnga ste sems can thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos kyis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 
[\[222a.7\]]ro mnyam pa nyid dang g.yon pa rkyang la sogs pa'i stabs rnams ni go sla ste/_gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhes pa nas brtsams te rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o zhes pa'i mthar thug pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bcas pa dgu ni go sla'o/_/da ni cod pan zhes pa las sogs pas lha 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]rnams kyi rigs kyi rgyas gdab pa gsungs pa 'dir mchog gi dang bo'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor du cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi ni rdo rjer 'gyur te de ci'i phyir zhe na ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na ye shes kyis rnam par shes pa
