[\[324b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ste/_slob ma rnams kyis gdon mi za bar bya'o/_/da ni dpal ldan zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams gsungs te/_'dir rgyud thams cad las rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi'o/_/de rnams las ji ltar so sor 'gyur ba de bzhin du gsungs pa 
[\[324b.7\]]bu rnams te dbang bskur ba'i slob ma rnams kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin pa zhes pa dang por 'gyur te/_dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las zhes pa la 'dir bla ma rnam pa gnyis te/_bla ma dam pa dang bla ma dam pa ma yin pa'o/_/de dag gi thugs dkrugs pa yang rnam pa 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]gnyis te gzhan gyi don dang rang gi don las so/_/de la gzhan gyi don las gang gi thugs 'khrug pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o/_/rang gi don las gang gi thugs 'khrug pa de ni bla ma dam pa ma yin pa'o/_/'dir slob ma mi dge ba bcu la zhugs pas dpal ldan 
[\[325a.2\]]bla ma'i thugs dkrugs par 'gyur te/_thugs dkrugs pa de las rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi don la zhugs pa'i bla ma ni mi dge ba bcu la zhugs pa las ma yin no zhes pa ste nges pa'o/_/de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan rtsa ba'i ltung ba gnyis par 'gyur te/_
[\[325a.3\]]bla ma'i lkog tu gyur par mi dge ba bcu byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du spun la khros pas gsum par 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe rdo rje'i spun rgan po'am gzhon nu bslab pa dang ldan pa la rab tu khro bar byed na'o/_/byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te zhes pa la 'dir byams pa btang 
[\[325a.4\]]ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen po dang shin tu chen po'i dbye bas so/_/de la chung ngu ni skad cig tsam byams pa btang zhing de nas ldog par 'gyur ba ste/_chu la dbyug pa'i ri mo lta bu'o/_/'bring po ni bye ma'i ri mo slar yang rlung gis mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba lta 
[\[325a.5\]]bu'o/_/chen po'i bdag nyid ni sa gas pa slar yang dbyar gyi chus mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du byams pa med pa'i sems shin tu chen po'i bdag nyid ni yongs su smin pa ste/_dper na rdo tha dad pa slar yang 'ga' zhig tu yongs su rdzogs par ro mnyam par mi 
[\[325a.6\]]'gyur ba'am dper na 'bras bu smin pa shing la mi gnas pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la byams pa yongs su gtong ba ste/_des rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/mda' zhes pa lnga par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las zhes pa la 'dir byang 
[\[325a.7\]]chub kyi sems ni khu ba ste/_de nyams pa las 'pho ba med pa'i bde bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir de kho na nyid med pa dbang po gnyis kyi bde bas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pa rnams la rtsa ba'i ltung ba lnga par 'gyur ro/_/drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ste grub pa'i mtha' ni shes rab kyi 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang sngags kyi tshul la de kho na nyid kyi le'u 'o/_/de la smod pa gang yin pa de ni drug pa'o/_/ri bo zhes pa bdun par 'gyur te ma smin pa'i mi nyan thos kyi lam la gnas pa la gsang ba byin las zhes pa bde ba chen po byin pa las slob dpon rnams la ltung ba'o/_/phung po nyon 
[\[325b.2\]]mongs pa las klu zhes pa brgyad pa ste/_phung po nyon mongs pa la sogs pa ni bsnyung bar gnas pa la bkod pa la sogs pa dang lus gcod pa la sogs par brjod de de las brgyad par 'gyur ro/_/slar yang dgu pa ni dag pa'i chos te stong pa nyid kyi chos la ma dad par gyur pa gang yin 
[\[325b.3\]]pa'o/_/sgyu yi byams pa ni kha nas tshig gzhan 'don zhing snying la gzhan sems pa ste/_sgyu yi byams pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs zhes pa bcu pa'o/_/ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni drag po zhes pa ste bcu 
[\[325b.4\]]gcig pa'o/_/dag pa'i sems can dag la ste rnal 'byor pa la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma zhes pa bcu gnyis par 'gyur ro/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lor dam tshig thob par gyur pa gtong ba las gzhan te bcu gsum par 'gyur ro/_/bud med thams cad la smod pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[325b.5\]]nges par te/_gdon mi za bar ma nu zhes pa bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o/_/gang dag rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la ste dbang bskur ba rnams la'o zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nges pa'o/_/ltung ba sbom po rnams ni du ma ste de rnams la chad pa shin tu chung bar 'gyur ro 
[\[325b.6\]]zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i mdor bsdus chen po ste bzhi pa'o//_//rab gnas byas nas lhar bcas lha 
[\[325b.7\]]min dbang po dang /_/klu dang mi dbang tshogs kyis gang la phyag byas pa/_/dus kyi 'khor lo de la spyi bos rab btud nas/_/sku gzugs la sogs rnams kyi rab gnas brjod par bya/_/'dir dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'jam 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa bzhi lhag pa'i ba rgya pa la sogs pas phyung ba ni rgyas 'grel gyis dgrol bar bya'o/_/klu dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir dang por 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur te de nas 
[\[326a.2\]]rgyud thams cad shes shing dam bca' ba la gnas pa'i slob ma ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag po'i slad du bla mas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/kye dpal ldan bla ma khyod kyi bka' drin las da ni bdag gis bde bar gshegs pa'i lam thams cad shes so zhes bla ma la zhus nas dam bca' ba bya ste dus 
[\[326a.3\]]'di nas brtsams te khyod dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spangs nas bla ma gzhan bsten par mi bgyi'o/_/yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i slob ma dam bca' ba la gnas pa gzigs te de nas sngar brjod pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rnams te de rnams klu zhes 
[\[326a.4\]]pa brgyad dang bzhi dang bum pa gcig gis bdag po rnam pa gsum la sbyin par bya ste klu rnams kyis dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa la'o/_/bzhi yis dge tshul la'o/_/gcig gis khyim pa la ste de ltar sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas sman la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bum pa rnams kyis bkru ste/_'dir 
[\[326a.5\]]dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du mnyam pa'i sa'i char khru bzhi pa la ra ba lnga'i re khA byas nas dbus su khru gnyis pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa mtshan ma lnga dang bral ba kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/_/'di nyid ni gdan gyi pad+ma ste shing stan gyi steng du tshon sna lngas bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma de'i dbus kyi steng 
[\[326a.6\]]du dge slong bkod nas bum pa brgyad rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba dang bcas pa bcus khrus bya ste bu mo gzugs mdzes shing rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bu ma skyes pa brgyad dang gzhon nu ma skye gnas ma nyams pa gnyis kyis mgo bor cod pan dar dpyangs dang phyag rgya drug dang bcas pa 
[\[326a.7\]]bcings te khrus bya'o/_/gdug pa sdigs par byed pa'i mchog/_/gang gi ngur smrig mthong ba yis/_/lha min sa yi 'og tu 'gro/_/dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya zhes pa ste de ltar na klu rnams kyis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcing ste nor 'dab pad+mar zhes bya'o/_/dge tshul la yang dar dpyangs 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]bcing bar bya ste bu mo bzhi dang gzhon nu ma gnyis kyis dar dpyangs phyag rgya dang bcas pa bcings te rdul tshon gyi pad+ma spangs shing re khA lnga byas pa'i dbus su shing stan byin nas khrus bya'o/_/de ltar slob dpon 'bring po'o/_/de nas phyag rgyal ni 
[\[326b.2\]]zhes pa mthe bo'i rdo rje byin nas bum pa gcig dang rnam par rgyal bas bu mo gcig dang gzhon nu ma gcig gis khrus bya'o/_/re khA lnga spangs shing spyi'i byug pas re khA gsum byas nas thun mong gi gdan byin la khrus bya ste slob dpon tha ma'o/_/de 
[\[326b.3\]]ltar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khru bzhi pa dang khru gnyis pa dang khru gcig pa'i gdan byas nas dge slong dang dge tshul dang khyim pa rnams la rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bstan pa'i don du gsung ngam rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni 
[\[326b.4\]]nges pa'o/_/de nas dang por zhes pa la sogs pas dbang gi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa 'dir dang por dbang bdun po chu'i ming can dag la mngon par dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni sa bdun par lung bstan pa'i phyir dge bsnyen du brjod de nges na dge 
[\[326b.5\]]bsnyen du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur te mi g.yo bar lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sras po ste gzhon nu zhes pa'i don to/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong du 'gyur te legs pa'i blo gros 
[\[326b.6\]]su lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rgyal tshab bo/_/de nas gong ma gsum pa'i byed pa ste shes rab ye shes kyi dbang la mngon par dbang bskur ba ni gnas brtan zhes pa chos ston par byed pa dang slob ma sdud pa por 'gyur te chos kyi sprin la 
[\[326b.7\]]lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gnyis pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'jig rten gsum gcig gzhon nu'i sku/_/gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag_/sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]mtshan 'chang ba/_/sdug gu 'jig rten gsum mdzes pa zhes dang /_de bzhin du/_phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong /_/'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul/_/nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba/_/'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig 
[\[327a.2\]]po/_/dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad/_/'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul/_/bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob/_/bsil bar gyur pa rnyog pa med ces pa dang /_de bzhin du/_mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang /_/tshangs 
[\[327a.3\]]par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/_/dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/_/gtsang gnas dam pa gau ta ma/_/bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa'i rig_/mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob/_/grol ba thar pa rnam grol sku/_/rnam grol zhi ba 
[\[327a.4\]]zhi ba nyid ces pa ste slob dpon gyi dbang ngo /_/de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje byed pa'i slad du rdo rje sku'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o/_/dar dpyangs cod pan sbyin pa bya ba ni khyab 'jug byed pa'i slad du ste thugs rdo rje byed pa'i slad du'o zhes pa'i don 
[\[327a.5\]]to/_/rdo rje mchod phyir thogs gser gyi rang bzhin nam skud pa'i rang bzhin ni tshangs pa byed pa'i slad du ste sku rdo rje byed pa'i slad du sbyin par bya'o/_/rgan po dang gzhon nu de rnams la slob dpon slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis zhes 
[\[327a.6\]]pa me tog lhung ba'i dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa dbang bskur ba nyid sbyin par bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rje rnam par dag pa byed pa'i slad du ste dbang phyug chen po byed pa'i slad du'o/_/de ltar/_tshangs pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin/_/gsung gi rdo rje dbang 
[\[327a.7\]]phyug che/_/rgyal po thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/_/de yang khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje slob dpon zhes dang /_de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can/_/ral pa muny+dza 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]cod pan thogs/_/gdong lnga zur phud lnga dang ldan/_/zur phud lnga pa me tog thod ces pa ste rgyud gzhan thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o/_/'dir ston pa po'i dbang la mngon par dbang bskur ba'i dge slong ngam dge tshul lam 
[\[327b.2\]]khyim pas g.yog la sogs pa'i chos dang khyim pa'i chos mi bya'o/_/gal te ral gri dang snag tsha dang tshong la sogs pa byed na de'i bka' bcag par 'gyur zhing bka' bcag pa las mnar med par 'gro bar 'gyur te slob dpon gyi chos rnam par bshig pa'i 
[\[327b.3\]]phyir ro/_/rdo rje slob dpon bdag po'i dbang gi cho ga'i rab tu gnas pa'i nges pa'o/_/'dir sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rab tu gnas pa ni steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag tu yang ri mo gsum ni kun nas so zhes pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[327b.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa nas brtsams pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis ni go sla ste/_ji srid slob mas smon lam gdab pa dang yongs su sngo ba byed pa bsod nams 'di yis sems can rnams ni rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'i bla med byang chub thob par shog ces 
[\[327b.5\]]pa'i mthar thug pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni go sla'o/_/des na rgyas 'grel ma byas so/_/da ni ji srid phyogs kyi lo zhes pa la sogs pas dbang gong ma'i cho ga gsungs te 'dir bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang gi don du phyag rgya ni ji srid phyogs kyi lo zhes 
[\[327b.6\]]pa lo bcu'i bar ni spang bar bya ste gzhon nu ma'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pu rnam pa bcur 'gyur te lo so sor sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam par dag pas so/_/de la yang ji srid so lhung bar ma gyur ba de srid du ye shes kyi khams te 
[\[327b.7\]]mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de nas so lhung nas nam mkha'i khams so/_/de ltar khams gnyis kyis gzhon nu ma skye gnas mnyams pa'o/_/des na de ni blta bar bya ba dang reg par bya ba dang mchod par bya'o/_/lo bcu po de nas lo bcu gcig pa 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]dang por byas nas ji srid lo nyi shu'i mthar 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter zhes pa ni drug dang bcas pa'i bzhi'o/_/g.yo ba la sogs te rlung la sogs pa rnams ni bsten par bya'o/_/de'i phyir lo bcu gcig ma la rlung gi 
[\[328a.2\]]khams so/_/bcu gnyis ma la me dang bcu gsum ma la chu dang bcu bzhi ma la sa'o zhes pa ste bzhi'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ma la sgra dang bcu drug ma la reg bya dang bcu bdun ma la ro dang bco brgyad ma la gzugs dang bcu dgu ma la dri dang nyi shu ma la chos kyi khams so/_/
[\[328a.3\]]de nas lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha ni 'dir lo nyi shu'i phyi nas nyi shu rtsa gcig nas brtsams te lo so so rnams ni grangs bzhin du shin tu sngon mo dang shin tu stobs ldan ma dang rmugs byed ma dang khengs ldan ma dang 
[\[328a.4\]]rengs byed ma dang 'od zer can ma dang tsun dA dang khro gnyer can ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang drag spyan ma ste khro bo bcu'i lha mo rnams so/_/de nas lo sum cu rtsa gcig nas brgyad ni 'byung po'i cha ste/_tsartsi kA dang phag mo dang drag mo dang dbang mo dang tshangs 
[\[328a.5\]]ma dang dpal chen mo dang gzhon nu ma dang khyab 'jug ma'o/_/de nas lo sum cu rtsa dgu nas brgyad ni lha min gyi cha ste khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma dang stag gdong ma dang ce spyang gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang bya rgod gdong ma dang bya 
[\[328a.6\]]rog gdong ma ste ji srid lo bzhi bcu rtsa drug gi bar du ni phyag rgya bsgom pa'i don du'o/_/dbang gi don du ni slar yang drug dang gsum ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zhes pa me'i khams nas brtsams te ji srid chos kyi khams kyi bar du'o/_/rlung gi khams ni 
[\[328a.7\]]rdul med pa nyid kyi phyir gzung bar mi bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/'dir dbang gong ma ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni sems can gzhug pa'i don dang lam yongs su shes pa'i don dang rgyud nyan pa la dbang ba'i don du'o/_/gzhan ni slob dpon chen po'i gnas sbyin pa 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]dang ston pa po byed pa'i slad du'o/_/dang por dbang 'di la re zhig skrag pa dang 'khrul pa'i sems la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba lo bcu gnyis ma la sogs pa yongs su smin pa ni slob mas bla ma la dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas 
[\[328b.2\]]nas slob mas bla ma la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstod pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas bla ma mnyes pas 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis rang gi phyag rgya'i nu ma la reg par byed du gzhug ste des na bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do/_/de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa byas 
[\[328b.3\]]nas slob ma la bdud rtsi sbyin zhing phyag rgya'i b+ha g.yang gsal bar byed du gzhug go/_/des na ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang lta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas shes rab ye shes dbang la o~M yig la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis rigs lnga'i cha 
[\[328b.4\]]dang ldan par bya zhing de nas bla mas rgyal ba ste rdo rje sems dpa' dbang du byas nas lag bcangs dang gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa byed pa'i ched du phyag rgya de slob ma la sbyin par bya'o/_/ji ltar skal ba ngan pa'i sems can 'di ni sgom pa la sogs pa la dbang ba dang rgyud 
[\[328b.5\]]mnyan pa'i ched du ste sems can rnams la rgyud bstan pa dang dkyil 'khor bri ba'i ched du ni ma yin no zhes pa dang por slob ma gzhug pa la dbang bskur ba'i nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du slob dpon ni rgod pa yon tan gnyis kyi bdag nyid khu ba'i bde ba rnam par 
[\[328b.6\]]dag pas so/_/gsang ba zhes pa ni lta ba yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pas so/_/lag bcangs zhes pa ni yon tan bzhi'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pas so/_/gnyis gnyis zhes pa ni yon tan lnga'i bdag nyid khu ba'i bde ba rnam par dag pas 
[\[328b.7\]]so zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes grub pa las brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gzhug pa'i slad du 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang rnam pa bzhi'i nges pa'o/_/de nas rgyas 'grel dang bcas pa'i rgyud 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]thams cad thos shing shes par gyur pa na bdag po chen po nyid kyi ched du [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin gsungs pa'i rig ma bcu po rnams khyim na gnas pa'i slob mas bla ma la dbul bar bya'o/_/'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_sring 
[\[329a.2\]]mo'i bu mo bu mo dang /_/sring mo de bzhin skyed byed ma/_/de bzhin chung ma'i ma dang ni/_/de bzhin zhang po'i bud med dang /_/pha yi spun zla'i chung ma dang /_/de bzhin pha yi sring mo dang /_/rang gi ma yi spun zla nyid/_/rang gi chung ma mchog gzugs can/_/sgrol ma la sogs chos 
[\[329a.3\]]khams mthar/_/rang rigs las skyes rig ma bcu/_/thar pa 'dod pa'i khyim pa yis/_/dbang gi dus su rab sbyin bya/_/rig ma 'di rnams rigs bsrung phyir/_/gal te bla mar mi 'bul na/_/de tshe khyim na gnas rnams la/_/gzhan gyis dbang bskur sbyin mi bya/_/dkyil 
[\[329a.4\]]'khor du ni dbang bskur ba'i/_/dmangs rigs skyes sogs gzhan rnams kyis/_/dge slong dge tshul rnams la ni/_/bla mas sbyin bya mi yi bdag_/rlung sogs rim pas dmangs rigs mo/_/rgyal rigs de bzhin bram ze mo/_/rje mo g.yung mo nya pa mo/_/gar ma de 
[\[329a.5\]]bzhin tshos mkhan mo/_/ko pags byed ma gtum mo ni/_/mthar skyes chos khams ma ste bcu/_/rig ma chen mor yang dag brjod/_/longs spyod grol 'bras rab tu ster zhes pa ste de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang dbang bcu dang sa bcu dang 
[\[329a.6\]]stobs bcu rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bstod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/_/thub pa chen po thub chen ldan/_/gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/_/gsang 
[\[329a.7\]]sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/_/pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/_/pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/_/mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/_/sa bcu la ni gnas pa po/_/shes bcu rnam ngag bdag nyid can/_/shes bcu rnam dag 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]'chang ba po/_/rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/_/thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag_/kun gyi don ni ma lus byed/_/rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po zhes pa ste bdag po nyid byed pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon gyi go 'phang mngon par 'dod pas phyag rgya bcu dbul bar bya'o zhes 
[\[329b.2\]]pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/_/de ltar slob mas bla ma la phyag rgya bcu phul te de nas bka' stsal don du gnyer bar bya'o/_/kye bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob bo/_/da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi de nas slob dpon gyis gsungs pa bcu'i nang nas rang gi 
[\[329b.3\]]chung ma 'di bzung nas de dang lhan cig tu bdag la gsol ba gdab pa byos shig dge slong dang dge tshul rnams la ni gtum mo rang gi chung mar bya'o/_/de nas bla ma'i nges pas de bzung nas gnyis kyis gser la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis maN+Dal byas te de nas gsol ba gdab 
[\[329b.4\]]par bya'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad bcom pa yi/_/dus kyi 'khor lo khyod la 'dud/_/mchog tu mi 'gyur bdes gang ba/_/ye shes sku khyod la phyag 'tshal/_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/_/byang chub sems ni 'gyur med gang /_/dbang bskur de yis bdag la ni/_/mgon po de ni bka' drin 
[\[329b.5\]]mdzod/_/bu dang chung ma sogs bcas pa/_/bdag ni dus kun khyod kyi 'bangs/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar/_/bdag la skyabs gzhan yod ma yin zhes pas gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i slob ma chung ma dang bcas pa gzigs nas slob dpon gyis sgra rdo rje ma rgyan thams cad 
[\[329b.6\]]bkrol zhing gcer bur byas pa la 'khyud du gzhug par bya'o/_/khyim pa rnams ni chung ma'i ma la'o/_/de nas shar du sgrol ma dang lhor gos dkar mo dang byang du mA ma kI dang nub tu spyan ma dang mer reg bya rdo rje ma dang bden bral du ro rdo rje ma dang dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma dang rlung du dri rdo rje 
[\[329b.7\]]ma ste rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo gcer mo skra grol ma phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can rnams dgod par bya ste rig ma dgu bo rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du'o/_/de ltar sngar dbang bskur ba ni chu la sogs pas rnam pa bdun no/_/de nas gong ma'i dbang ni spyi'i las kyi phyag rgyas so/_/gong ma'i 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]yang gong ma'i dbang ni dmangs rigs las skyes pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dbul ba'i don du sngar gsungs pa bcu po rnams kyis so/_/klu ste bum pa brgyad dang rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dag gis dge slong la khrus bya'o/_/dge tshul la de rnams kyi nang nas 
[\[330a.2\]]phyag rgya drug gis bum pa bzhi dang rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dag gis khrus bya'o/_/khyim na gnas pa la dgu po de rnams kyi nang nas gcig dang rang gi chung mas bum pa gcig dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya ste sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas so/_/
[\[330a.3\]]de nas phyag rgya gtad bya ste/_/bum dbang sbyin pa'i don du'o zhes pa 'dir ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes ma'i bu mo lo nyi shu'i mthar thug pa khrag ldan te rdul dang ldan pa la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis zhes pa 
[\[330a.4\]]'chad par 'gyur ba'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas/_sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang gong ma'i gong ma'i dbang la slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba byas nas ni/_phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya ste slob dpon gyis gang la 'khyud pa'o/_/yang na bu'i chung ma la 
[\[330a.5\]]slob dpon rang gis mngon par bgrod de de nas dbang gi dus la bab pa na slob ma la slar yang rang gi chung ma gtad par bya'o/_/'dir bum pa'i dbang la shes rab kyi nu ma la thabs kyis reg par bya zhing bla mas slob ma'i chung ma'i nu ma la reg par bya'o/_/gsang ba'i dbang la slob ma dang 
[\[330a.6\]]chung ma'i khar rdo rje gzhug par bya ste slob ma'i mig bcings nas bla mas shes rab kyi na ra nA si ka gzhi ba par bya'o/_/de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi ched du slob dpon gyis rang gi chung ma phyag rgyar gtad par bya'o zhes pa ni thams cad du bdag po chen po'i dbang gi cho ga'o/_/gal te phyag rgya 
[\[330a.7\]]bcu yod na de'i tshe gang dang gang la 'dod pa spyod par nus pa'i slob ma la de dang de gtad par bya ste mtshan mo phyed nas chu tshod gnyis kyi rjes la nyi ma 'char ba ji srid par ro/_/de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol bar bya ste gshegs su gsol nas slob ma la sdom pa sbyin par bya'o/_/khyad par dga' 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]ba'i mthar lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig bdag gis brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni kun rdzob ste thig le gsum gyi mthar gang yin pa de ni don dam par mi 'gyur ro/_/don dam par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba ni 'pho ba med pa'o/_/des na bde ba chen po 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[330b.2\]]du dang po'i sangs rgyas las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor dang /_/ye shes phyag rgya'i rjes chags la'ang /_/bde ba chen po byang chub sems/_/brtul zhugs brtan pos bsrung bar bya/_/b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/_/byang chub sems ni spro mi bya/_/
[\[330b.3\]]khams gsum po ni ma lus pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/bsrungs pa 'di nyid kho na yis/_/skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid/_/tshul khrims tshogs ni yang dag rdzogs/_/bsod nams ye shes yang dag ldan/_/pha rol phyin bcu thob pa yi/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus 
[\[330b.4\]]gsum 'jug_/'di yis rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/_/rang dang gzhan don bsgrub pa'i slad/_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/_/khams gsum dbang phyug ye shes ni/_/'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin/_/skyob pa kun gyi sdom pa ni/_/gal te khyod srung bdag 
[\[330b.5\]]gi bu/_/de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/byin brlabs rdzogs byang chub 'thob 'gyur/_/ci ste chags pas zil mnan bdag_/gtso bo'i mdun du blangs nas ni/_/sdom pa skyong bar mi byed na/_/de tshe ngu 'bod du 'gro 'gyur/_/dman pa'i sems las skye gnas su/_/gang tshe byang chub 
[\[330b.6\]]sems lhung gyur/_/de tshe phyag rgyar shes nas ni/_/pad+ma'i phyi rol rang lces blang zhes so/_/skrag dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/slob dpon gyis slob ma la sdom pa byin nas slob mas kyang bla ma la yon dbul lo/_/slar yang maN+Dal byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste bcom ldan 'das 
[\[330b.7\]]bdag la dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa'i bka' drin mdzad du gsol/_/de nas bla mas slob ma bos te bu khyod nyon cig kun rdzob ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug gi mtshan nyid ni tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya pa la 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]sogs pa rnams kyis mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las 'jam pa'i rdo rjes phyung ba 'dod pa skyod par zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid la 'dod pa skyod par byed pa ni dang po dga' ba'o/_/de nas gang ba'i gnas skabs ni shes rab 
[\[331a.2\]]la 'khyud ba la sogs pas dpral bar byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir gang ba nyid du 'gyur ba ste gnyis pa mchog dga'o/_/gang ba yan lag mchog las ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le 'dzag pa ni 'khrig pa la 'bar ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa khyad 
[\[331a.3\]]par dga' bar byed do/_/de nas o D+Da'i gnas skabs ni thig le 'pho ba'i dus su sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi thig le rnams kyi mthar thig le bzhi pa 'byung ba'i dus na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba byed do/_/de ltar tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha lnga lnga po nam mkha' dang rlung dang 
[\[331a.4\]]me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin dga' ba dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa'i ming can a i r-i u l-i ka_/a e ar o al tsa/_/ha ya ra wa la Ta ces pa'i dbyangs 'di dag gi chos can rnams kyis te de ltar lnga pa ni dga' ba rdzogs pa'o/_/bcu pa ni 
[\[331a.5\]]mchog dga' rdzogs pa'o/_/nya ni khyad par gyi dga' ba rdzogs pa'o/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa ni cha bcu drug pa ste khams thams cad bsdus pa dang tshogs pa dang 'dus pa dang sdom pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi chags pa ni dkar po'i phyogs te chags 
[\[331a.6\]]bral ni nag po'i phyogs so/_/de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_chags bral dang po chags pa che/_/kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhes pa dang 
[\[331a.7\]]de bzhin du/_rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/_/bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang /_/cha med cha las 'das pa po/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang /_/zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o/_/de ltar don dam pas le'u lnga pa las phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes rgya cher brjod par bya ste des na 'dir 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]rgyas par ma byas so/_/da ni 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pas dga' ba bcu drug po rnams kyi sbyor ba bzhi gsungs pa 'dir sems can thams cad kyi sad pa dang rmi lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa dang bzhi pa'i dbye bas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi sbyor ba ste de dag kyang dga' ba la sogs 
[\[331b.2\]]pa'i dbye bas bcu drug go/_/de la 'dod pa zhes pa ni sku'i dga' ba'o/_/dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi dga' ba'o/_/'dar ba zhes pa ni thugs kyi dga' ba'o/_/'gyur med ces pa'i ming gis ye shes kyi dga' ba'o/_/de ltar bzhi po yis dga' ba'i sbyor ba gcig go/_/de bzhin du gang ba zhes pa 
[\[331b.3\]]ni sku'i mchog dga'o/_/'dir mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa gsum po rnams mtha' ma dang por byas nas gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnams te sdeb sbyor gyi dbang gis so/_/de'i phyir mchog gi dga' ba ni zhes pa gsung gi mchog dga'o/_/skye ba zhes pa ni thugs kyi mchog dga'o/_/
[\[331b.4\]]nus pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi mchog dga' ste gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/'bar ba zhes pa ni sku'i khyad par dga' ba'o/_/khyad par dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi khyad par dga' ba'o/_/gnyid yur zhes pa ni thugs kyi khyad par dga' ba'o/_/thig le zhes pa ni ye shes kyi khyad par dga' ba ste 
[\[331b.5\]]gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/de bzhin du oD+Da zhes pa ni sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/_/gnyid ces pa ni thugs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/_/nA da zhes pa ni ye shes kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i 
[\[331b.6\]]dga' ba'o/_/de bzhin du sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos dang ngo bo nyid kyi dbye bas sku rnam pa bzhi dang de bzhin du gsung rnam pa bzhi dang thugs rnam pa bzhi dang ye shes rnam pa bzhi'o/_/de bzhin du dga' ba bcu drug gi dbye ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las rgya cher brjod par bya'o/_/bcu 
[\[331b.7\]]drug gi mthar lhan cig skyes pa'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni sems kyi zhes pa la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa 'dir rgyud thams cad las ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams thun mong gis gsungs te rnal 'byor pa rnams rjes su chags pa byed pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]de yang byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa rnams kyi yin gyi gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/gzhan rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang ldan pa'i bud med gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ma la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa bud med la sems 
[\[332a.2\]]par byed na de'i tshe sems kyi bsam pa byas pas mar 'gyur ro/_/reg pas ni sring mo'o/_/rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor 'gyur ro/_/byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas sring mo'i bu mo nyid du 'gyur ro/_/thig le lhung bar gyur na chung ma'o/_/gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa gtum mo'i 
[\[332a.3\]]rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams par gyur pa las te chags bral las 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis la sogs pa rnams so/_/'dir dang por sa'i khams 'khrug go/_/de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams rnams 
[\[332a.4\]]'khrug ste 'khrug pa rnams 'dzag go/_/de'i phyir sa chu bsreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams te gnas skabs drug go/_/de bzhin du g.yas dang g.yon gyi dkyil 'khor lnga zad pa yang 'pho ba'i dus su rig par bya ste ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pas so/_/'khor lo 
[\[332a.5\]]dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ske rags dang thal ba rnam par dag pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams te de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pas so zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni chu skyes zhes pa la sogs pas sku la sogs pa'i 
[\[332a.6\]]phyag rgya gsum gsungs te 'dir rgyud thams cad las phyi rol du drang ba'i don gyis dpral bar sku'i phyag rgya dang mgrin par gsung gi phyag rgya dang snying khar thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/nges pa'i don gyis kyang chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs te rdo rje rtag tu langs pa ni sku'i phyag rgya'o/_/rtse mo can la rlung 
[\[332a.7\]]dang zhes pa rtsa dbu ma la srog gi rlung rab tu zhugs pa gsung gi phyag rgya'o/_/thig le mi ltung ba ni thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/'di rnams rnal 'byor gsum gyi ste dbu ma la rten pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams su grangs bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de'i steng du chags dang chags bral mthar 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]gyur par po zhes pa la chags pa ni dkar po'i phyogs te de'i mthar gyur pa'o/_/chags bral ni nag po'i phyogs te de'i dang po'o/_/de ltar chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po ni cha bcu drug par gnas pa ste ji srid mi 'dzag pa de srid du de ni mtha' dag yon tan gyi gter 'gyur ba med 
[\[332b.2\]]pa'i bde ba sbyin pa po rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yan lag drug gi sbyor ba kho nas rtogs par bya ba ste gzhan rnams kyis ni ma yin no/_/phyag rgya rnams las te snga ma dang phyi ma dgu po rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma skyed byed mar mngal nas 
[\[332b.3\]]skyes pa'i dus nas brtsams te 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur ro/_/rnam bcu ni du ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal 'di'o zhes pa ni ye shes kyi zhal bzhi pa'o zhes pa'i don to/_/de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i chos can no 
[\[332b.4\]]zhes pa nges pa'o/_/de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i slad du bla mas nges pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de la rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi lha mo rnams spyan drang bar bya ste/_de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu 
[\[332b.5\]]ma bcu la'o thug la sogs pa mngar ba'i zas kyis ston mo byas te yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas chu tshod bdun pa la dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mngar ba'i kha zas sha dang bral ba rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing sangs rgyas gtso bor 
[\[332b.6\]]byas nas dge 'dun la yon phul te 'phags pa'i dge 'dun chen po gtsug lag khang du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas skye bo dang bral ba'i khyim bug pa med par tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs dpa' bo dang dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi gnas rnams bsam par bya'o/_/'dir 
[\[332b.7\]]'byor pa dang rjes su mthun pas gtso bo bla ma shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ni dbus dang phyogs bzhi'i char rnal 'byor ma bzhi rnams te dbus su g.yung mo dang shar du dmangs rigs mo dang lhor rgyal rigs mo dang byang du bram ze mo dang nub tu rje rigs ma ste tshogs kyi gtso bo lnga'i 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]bdag nyid kyi'o/_/'di rnams kyi gdan ni mi'i pags pa dang khyi'i pags pa dang rta'i pags pa dang ba lang gi pags pa dang glang po che'i pags pa'o/_/de nas gnyis pa ni phyogs bral rnams su ste dbang ldan du gci ba'i snod dang rlung du bshang 
[\[333a.2\]]ba'i snod dang bden bral du khrag gi snod dang mer rkang gi snod do/_/de nas zlum skor gnyis pa thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du 'khar ba mkhan mo dang lhor 'od ma'i gar mkhan mo dang byang du nor bu mkhan ma dang nub tu khron pa mkhan ma dang mer thags mkhan ma dang 
[\[333a.3\]]bden bral du chang 'tshong ma dang dbang ldan du gser mkhan ma dang rlung du phreng ba mkhan ma ste rnal 'byor ma brgyad do/_/'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni grangs bzhin du lug gi pags pa dang 'brog dgon pa'i khyi'i pags pa dang rnga mo'i pags pa dang 'dam seng gi pags 
[\[333a.4\]]pa dang ra'i pags pa dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa dang bong bu'i pags pa dang phag gi pags pa rnams so/_/de nas zlum skor gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du sha 'tshong ma dang mar rdza mkhan ma dang lhor 'khur ba mkhan ma dang bden bral du smad 'tshong ma dang 
[\[333a.5\]]nub tu tshem bu ma dang rlung du nya pa mo dang /_byang du gar mkhan ma dang dbang ldan du btso blag mkhan ma ste rnal 'byor ma brgyad do/_/'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni kum b+hI ra'i pags pa dang 'gron bu'i phung po dang karka Ta'i rus pa'i phung po dang /_nya skam po dang /_
[\[333a.6\]]ma ka ra'i pags pa dang /_sbal ba'i pags pa dang /_rus sbal gyi khog pa dang dung rnams grangs bzhin no/_/de nas zlum skor bzhi pa sku'i 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du lcags mkhan ma dang /_lhor rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang /_nub tu srin bal mkhan 
[\[333a.7\]]ma dang /_byang du til mar mkhan ma dang /_mer smyug ma mkhan ma dang /_bden bral du shing mkhan ma dang /_rlung du ko lpags mkhan ma dang /_dbang ldan du 'dreg mkhan ma ste brgyad do/_/'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni bse'i 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]pags pa dang /_stag gi pags pa dang /_dom gyi pags pa dang /_ne'u le'i pags pa dang /_'bri'i pags pa dang /_ce spyang gi pags pa dang /_sram gyi pags pa dang /_byi la'i pags pa rnams so/_/de nas zlum skor lnga pa dur khrod 
[\[333b.2\]]kyi gnas la/_shar du kla klo ma dang /_lho ru 'phyag pa mo dang /_nub tu gtum mo dang /_byang du stag gzig ma dang /_mer bsnyon thabs ma dang /_bden bral du ro sreg ma dang /_rlung du b+hil+lI dang dbang ldan du ri khrod ma ste rab gtum ma brgyad do/_/'di 
[\[333b.3\]]rnams kyi gdan rnams ni go d+hA'i pags pa dang /_byi ba'i pags pa dang /_sA la dzA ta ka'i pags pa dang /_spre'u'i pags pa dang /_ri bong gi pags pa dang /_gzungs mo byi dur gyi pags pa dang /_I shu ka pa shu'i pags pa dang /_rtsangs pa'i pags pa rnams 
[\[333b.4\]]so/_/pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa dang /_lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa dang /_nub dang rlung du glang po'i pags pa dang /_byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa ste dbus su mi'i pags pa'o/_/de ltar gdan rnams 
[\[333b.5\]]bkod nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/_/pags pa 'di rnams kyi sder sbyin par bya ste de bzhin du skyogs rnams ni shar du nya phyis kyi snod de me ru yang de bzhin no/_/lho dang bden bral du nA ri ke la'i skyogs dang nub dang rlung du kham phor dang byang dang dbang ldan du 
[\[333b.6\]]mi'i thod pa dang dbus su shing gi snod do/_/de nas chang la sogs pa phul nas bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa sgron ma dang bcas pa 'chang bar 'gyur ba chu dang mchod yon la sogs pa rnam pa bcu po phul te maN+Dal byas nas/_slob mas las kyi rdo rje can dang lhan cig tu mchod 
[\[333b.7\]]pa'i rdzas dbul bar bya'o/_/de ltar na tshogs kyi 'khor lo la gnas dang rigs nges pa'o/_/de nas le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas/_kun du spyod pa dang 'khrig pa yang bya'o/_/kun du spyod pa de la shes rab yum gyi nang nas tshogs kyi gtso mo de ni mchog 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]gi yum zhes pa ste g.yung mo dang gtum mo'o/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo la thams cad du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi ni sring mo'o/_/sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug dang sngon mo dang drag spyan ma gnyis ni sring mo'i bu mo rnams so/_/
[\[334a.2\]]phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsaR+tsi kA sogs brgyad ni yang tsha mo'o/_/'di rnams ni 'khor lo la gnas pa dus kun tu ni kun tu spyod pas gnas pa rang rigs sa la gnas pa rnams te/_rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya'o/_/gnas dang zhing dang 'dus pa dang dur khrod de sa 
[\[334a.3\]]bcu gnyis la gnas pa rnams bsten par bya zhing skye bo dang bcas pa grong gi dbus dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang phyi rol skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/gcer bu gos dang bral zhing skra grol ba lag na gri gug dang thod pa can de rnams thams cad yang 
[\[334a.4\]]dag par rgyu'o/_/de bzhin du dpal ldan rdo rje can ni slob dpon te g.yung po'o/_/dpal ldan yab de nyid ni gtum po ste/_gtso bo nyid kyi phyir dang g.yung mo dang gtum mo'i lhag ma za ba dang de dang 'khrig pa byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar rigs rnam par dag pas rnal 'byor pa 
[\[334a.5\]]rnams kyi rang gi ma la sogs pa dang rigs las skyes pa rang gi sar 'ongs pa rnams dor bar mi bya zhing de la ngo tsha bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[334a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad ming po ste/_dmangs rigs la sogs pa dang 'phyag pa la sogs pa rnams so/_/mig la sogs pa rnams ni tsha bo ste/_'khar ba mkhan la sogs pa rnams so/_/yang tsha rnams ni brgyad de shen pa la sogs pa'o/_/yang tsha'i bu ni lcags 
[\[334a.7\]]mkhan la sogs pa rnams te/_skye bo dang bcas pa dang skye bo med par rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dor bar mi bya'o/_/phan tshun sems rnam par dag pa'i nges pa'o/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo de la bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]pa gang su dag_/bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon dpa' bo dang bcas pa la rdo rje'i mchod par 'bul byed na/_/sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang zhig 'gyur ba'i bsod nams de rnams thams cad 
[\[334b.2\]]rnal 'byor ma de la 'gyur ro/_/mi bdag ces pa ni bod pa'o/_/mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su ste mi zad par zhes pa'i don to/_/da ni sgrol ma zhes pa la sogs pas dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i rigs rnams sgrol ma la sogs pa'i rigs rnams su gsungs 
[\[334b.3\]]te/_mi'i 'jig rten 'dir las kyi rjes su mthun pas rigs so/_/de la dmangs rigs rnam pa bzhi ste/_sa gzhi rmo ba dang ba lang skyong ba dang 'jim pa'i las byed pa dang khyim la sogs pa'i gnas byed pa ste/_de ltar na sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi rus yi steng du 'gyur 
[\[334b.4\]]ro/_/gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs rnam pa bzhi ste/_rgyal rigs kyi chos kyis rkang thang dang rta la zhon pa dang glang po che la zhon pa dang shing rta la zhon pa'o/_/sa ste spyan ma ni rje rigs ma rnams te rje rigs kyi chos las rnam pa gsum ni tshong ba dang yig mkhan dang sman pa'o/_/
[\[334b.5\]]mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes bram ze mo ste/_gnyis skyes kyi chos las rnam pa bdun ni nges brjod kyi yal ga dang mchod sbyin gyi yal ga dang snyan ngag gi yal ga dang srid srung gi yal ga dang nags na rab tu gnas pa'i chung ma dang bdag po'i chung ma dang grol 
[\[334b.6\]]ba'i chung ma ste rnam pa bdun no/_/de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma ni 'khar ba mkhan ma dang /_ro rdo rje ma ni chang 'tshong ma dang /_gzugs rdo rje ma ni gser mkhan ma dang /_dri rdo rje ma ni phreng ba mkhan ma dang /_reg bya rdo rje ma ni thags mkhan ma dang /_chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ni nor 
[\[334b.7\]]bu mkhan ma dang /_drag spyan ma ni khron pa mkhan ma dang /_shin tu sngon mo ni 'od ma'i gar mkhan ma ste/_g.yung mo'i gar mkhan ma'o/_/de bzhin du tsA mu NA ni sha 'tshong ma dang /_khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma dang /_phag mo ni 'khur ba mkhan ma dang /_gzhon nu 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]ma ni smad 'tshong ma dang /_dbang mo ni tshem bu ma dang /_tshangs ma ni nya pa ma dang /_drag mo ni gar mkhan ma dang /_dpal mo ni btso blag mkhan ma ste brgyad do/_/de bzhin du rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang /_rengs byed ma ni srin bal 
[\[335a.2\]]mkhan ma dang /_khengs ma ni til mar mkhan ma dang /_shin tu stobs ma ni lcags mkhan ma dang /_'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan ma dang /_khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dang /_tsun dA ni 'dregs mkhan ma dang /_rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan ma ste brgyad 
[\[335a.3\]]ni khro bo'i rigs can rnams so/_/khyi gdong ma ni kla klo ma dang /_phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo dang /_ce spyang gdong ma ni gtum mo dang /_stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma dang /_bya rog gdong ma ni bsnyon thabs ma dang /_bya rgod gdong ma ni ro sreg ma dang /_
[\[335a.4\]]mkha' lding gdong ma ni b+hi l+lI dang /_'ug gdong ma ni ri khrod ma ste brgyad ni ra ba gtum ma'o/_/de ltar na sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te/_zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog 
[\[335a.5\]]dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas rnams kyis/_/rmongs pa rnams ni 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub ster zhes pa'o/_/slar yang 'di rnams kyi dbye ba ni bzhi ni dmangs rigs mo la sogs pa'o/_/drug ni sgra rdo rje ma 
[\[335a.6\]]la sogs pa'o/_/de bzhin brgyad ni tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa'o/_/bcu ni khro bo'i dbye ba rnams te/_de dag las gnyis ni sgra la sogs pa rnams la rab tu zhugs so/_/nor ni brgyad kyi dbye ba ste/_khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so/_/de bzhin du bzhi ni sangs 
[\[335a.7\]]rgyas kyi dbye ba rnams so/_/drug ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba'o/_/khro bo rnams ni bcu'o/_/lha min rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba ste/_gdengs can srid par gnas rnams zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]dbye ba sum cu rtsa drug ste rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya'o/_/gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo ste/_srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed de sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o/_/de bzhin du sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de khyi gdong 
[\[335b.2\]]ma la sogs pa rnams so/_/mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes rnams so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zhes bya brgyad ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten du ste/_lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug ces pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa drug go/_/tshangs pa'i yul 
[\[335b.3\]]sar dpal ldan bzhi ste/_tshangs ris la sogs pa'i gzugs can zad par sa la sogs pa bsgoms pa rnams so/_/gzugs med pa rnams ni stong pa'i khams so/_/rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du yum gcig ma ni ye shes kyi khams te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[335b.4\]]phyin ma'o/_/'di rnams rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams kyis sna tshogs te/_lus yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams kyis ni skyong bar byed pa nyid do zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rigs nges pa'o/_/da ni bu mo zhes pa la sogs pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag 
[\[335b.5\]]rgya'i dngos grub kyi don du rdo rje mchod pa'i nges pa gsungs te/_'dir dben par tshogs kyi 'khor lo'am skye bo med par bsgom pa'i dus su bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams sam/_lus ni dri ma dang bcas pa'am/_bram ze mo'am/_rgyal rigs mo'am/_rje mo'am/_dmangs 
[\[335b.6\]]mo'am/_mthar skyes ma'am/_mig dang lag pa dang bral ba'am/_rna ba chad pa'am/_sna chad pa'am/_mchu chad pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa yan lag ma tshang ba rnams te/_mtha' dag ni byang chub rgyu ru mchog gi snying rjes shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor 
[\[335b.7\]]gyis bsten par bya ste/_slob dpon nam rnal 'byor pa dri ma dag dang rnam par bral te khengs pa la sogs pa'i skyon las grol zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pa chags pa dang phyi rol dang khyim gyi 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba rnams kyis so zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]kyi nges pa'o/_/da ni dang por zhes pa la sogs pas rdo rje'i mchod pa la phyag rgya bzhi'i ming gsungs te/_'dir dam tshig 'dus pa la ming rnam pa bzhi ni dang por shes rab bud med gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyar brjod do/_/dam tshig dpal ldan 
[\[336a.2\]]skyes pa ste rnal 'byor pa thabs ni mchog gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'dus pa'i rtsed mo la tsu m+pa na la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do/_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i bde mnyam chos kyi phyag rgyar brjod de dam tshig gi skad rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni rdo rje'i mchod pa la 
[\[336a.3\]]gsungs so/_/da ni pho nya mo rnams zhes pa la sogs pas pho nya mo rnams kyi lus sam skye gnas la dri'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa/_'dir pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus la gnas pa'am pad+ma gnas par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du de rnams kyi rigs rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur ro/_/
[\[336a.4\]]de la rang bzhin ni nam mkha' la sogs pa ste de'i yon tan gyi dbang gis gla rtsi'i dri dang pad+ma'i dri dang gci ba'i dri dang nya'i dri dang rnag gi dri'o/_/grangs bzhin du dpal ldan bzang mo dang pad+ma can ma dang dung can ma dang sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma ste 'di rnams gla rtsi 
[\[336a.5\]]la sogs pa'i drir rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/dpal ldan zhes pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste/_dpal ldan shin tu bzang mo'o/_/sgrol ma ni pad+ma can ma dang /_gos dkar mo ni dung can ma dang /_mA ma kI ni sna tshogs ma dang spyan ma ni glang chen ma'o/_/de 
[\[336a.6\]]bzhin du rnal 'byor pa yang rnam pa lnga ste/_seng ge dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang rta dang khyu mchog dang glang po che ste rigs kyi dbye ba las so/_/mi bskyod pa ni seng ge dang don yod grub pa ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni rta dang snang ba mtha' yas ni khyu mchog dang rnam par snang 
[\[336a.7\]]mdzad ni glang po che'o/_/de'i phyir snga ma bzhin du dri'i nges pa dang rigs kyi nges pa'o/_/da ni yan lag phra zhes pa la sogs pas lus kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa/_'dir shin tu bzang mo ni yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la sems can la mnyes gshin 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]zhes pa ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/_/de bzhin cung zad phra ba dang ldan la cung zad ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can zhes pa ste sgrol ma'o/_/de bzhin du ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma zhes pa ste gos 
[\[336b.2\]]dkar mo'o/_/ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma zhes pa ste mA ma kI'o/_/de bzhin du sbom zhing thung la yan lag brtan ldan shin tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma zhes pa ste spyan ma'o/_/de ltar pho nya ma 
[\[336b.3\]]rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs so/_/pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs nges pa'o/_/da ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te/_seng ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med 
[\[336b.4\]]la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur byed yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'o/_/rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te/_gzhan dbang gci ba'i dri dang 
[\[336b.5\]]gzhan don gnyer ba'o zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/_/khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so/_/glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_rnag gi dri dang shin 
[\[336b.6\]]tu rmongs pa'o zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/de ltar 'ga' zhig tu rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dag pa'i rigs te thams cad du ni 'dres pa'i rigs so/_/de ltar sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye bas yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin te/_phan tshun 'dres pa 
[\[336b.7\]]las skyes par gyur pa'o/_/de'i phyir pho nya mo de rnams mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya'o/_/gang las ci'i phyir zhe na shin tu chags par 'gyur bas tshim pa med na rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor pa 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]la dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos shes par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni bzang mo zhes pa la sogs pas pho nya mo rnams kyi chos kyi khams la sogs pa'i rigs gsungs te 'dir 
[\[337a.2\]]bzang mo ni chos kyi khams ma'o/_/lha mo ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /_sha za mo ni dri rdo rje ma dang /_mi mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang srin mo ni ro rdo rje ma dang klu mo ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o/_/de la bzang mo sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang 
[\[337a.3\]]tshul can/_lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo/_/mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste/_klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor 
[\[337a.4\]]pa yis mchod par bya ste/_thams cad du gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams su'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/de bzhin gzhan pa 'dres pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rigs par bya ste/_tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa rnams dang 
[\[337a.5\]]'dod ma dang phyir 'dod ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgrub thabs kyi le'u las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas so/_/de ltar sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o/_/da ni chang zhes pa la sogs pas ston pa po'i btung 
[\[337a.6\]]ba'i nges pa gsungs pa 'dir chang thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/_sbrang rtsi las skyes pa dang bur ma las skyes pa dang 'bras las skyes pa'am shing las skyes pa'am gzhan pa'o/_/phyag rgya dang bral slob dpon gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur te 
[\[337a.7\]]myos par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur zhes pa'o/_/phyag rgya gang su rung 'tshang 'thung ba'i dus 'dir ni dkyil 'khor dang tshogs 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]kyi 'khor lo med cing dam tshig gi rdzas dang rnam par bral yang btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya ste rdo rje mchod pa'i don du'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/gang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig bzhi po bsten par gyur pa de'i yon tan gsungs te/_rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig 
[\[337b.2\]]pu 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog byed pa thams cad dus su bsten par bya zhes pa mi 'pho ba'i bde ba'o/_/shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems kyi khams phyi rol du shor ba zos pas kyang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog na rnal 'byor ldan pa dag 
[\[337b.3\]]ni smos ci dgos te mi 'pho bar byas pas so zhes pa'i don to/_/mi bskyod pa ni gci ba dang don yod grub pa ni rkang dang rgyal ba mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad de de dang ldan pa ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khyi dang rta dang ba lang dang glang po che dang ldan pa 
[\[337b.4\]]dang gzhan yang brgyad pa shin tu drag po ni sha chen te dam tshig rnams ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang skye bo phyugs la 'jigs pa ster ba'o/_/de ltar bshang ba dang gci ba dang rkang dang sgrol ma lnga ni dam tshig brgyad de gnyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag go/_/de ltar bdud rtsi lnga 
[\[337b.5\]]dang sgrol ma lngas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/chang dang sha dang 'khrig pa dang bdud rtsi za ba zhes pa dam tshig bzhin slob dpon gyis bya ste/_rnam pa gzhan du na bdud kyi phyogs kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/_/
[\[337b.6\]]da ni khyi rta zhes la sogs pas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gzugs yongs su bsgyur bas dam tshig sum cu rtsa drug gsungs te/_'dir khyi mo ni sgrol ma dang /_rta mo ni gos dkar mo dang /_ba lang mo ni mA ma kI dang glang chen mo ni spyan ma dang /_rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ni 
[\[337b.7\]]gzugs thams cad 'dzin pa'o/_/lug mo ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /_ra mo ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo ni ro rdo rje ma dang /_bong mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang /_phag mo ni dri rdo rje ma dang /_rnga mo ni chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]dbye bas 'di rnams phyogs zhes pa ste bcu'o/_/de bzhin du kum b+hI ra mo ni tsaR+tsi kA dang /_'gron bu mo ni khyab 'jug ma dang /_ku lI ra mo ni phag mo dang /_nya mo ni gzhon nu ma dang /_ma ka ra mo ni dbang mo dang /_sbal mo ni tshangs ma dang /_rus sbal mo ni dbang 
[\[338a.2\]]phyug ma dang /_dung mo ni dpal chen mo ste 'byung po las skyes pa brgyad do/_/bse ru mo ni shin tu stobs ma dang stag mo ni rmugs byed ma dang /_dom mo ni rengs byed ma dang ne le mo ni nga rgyal ma dang 'bri mo ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang ce spyang mo ni khro gnyer can ma dang /_sram mo ni 'od 
[\[338a.3\]]zer can ma dang /_byi la mo ni tsun dA dang 'brog dgon pa'i khyi mo ni shin tu sngon mo dang 'brog dgon pa'i seng ge mo ni drag spyan ma ste khro bo las skyes pa bcu'o/_/de bzhin go d+hA ni khyi gdong ma dang byi ba mo ni phag gdong ma dang /_shA li dza ta ka ni ce spyang gdong ma dang spre'u mo ni stag gdong 
[\[338a.4\]]ma dang ri bong mo ni bya rog gdong ma dang /_gzugs mo ni bya rgod gdong ma dang /_i Shu ka ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang rtsangs pa mo ni 'ug gdong ma ste brgyad ni lha min las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig dang gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba'o/_/de ltar sa la spyod pa dang chu la spyod pa'i 
[\[338a.5\]]dam tshig nges pa'o/_/da ni khengs ldan zhes pa la sogs pas mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyi dam tshig gsungs pa/_'dir khyi la sogs pa bzhi po ji lta ba de bzhin du khengs ldan 'dab chags te/_khug rta dang ne tsho dang khu byug dang ri skegs te gsal bar chu yi gter zhes pa 'am 
[\[338a.6\]]tshig bzhi ste sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams so/_/de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug ni lA ba dang phug ron dang bya dkar dang mchil pa dang ngur pa dang ngang pa'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'byung po las skyes pa'i dam tshig brgyad ni khrung khrung dang khu byug mig dang srin bya dag 
[\[338a.7\]]dang b+ha ga ba tI zhes pa skyung ka dang sreg pa dang bzhad dang /_chu la 'jug pa zhes pa chu'i bya rog dang chu skyar te nor rnams zhes pa brgyad ni tsA muN+Da la sogs pa rnams kyi ste rim pas rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig bcu ni bya rog dang bya rgod dang 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]'ug pa dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dgra zhes pa hor pa chen po dang gtsug pud can dang bya gag dang /_b+he dra zhes pa san tsa ka dang g+hA ra zhes pa'o la ba dang /_hor pa dang ljon shing dgra ste khro bo las skyes khro bo'i rigs rmugs byed la sogs pa rim pa ji lta bas so/_/de bzhin du khyi 
[\[338b.2\]]gdong ma la sogs pa lha min rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad ni mig sngon dang tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu da mu kha zhes pa pha bang dang bug ki zhes pa dA da pU ha dang rkang ste nyal zhes pa lcog dang /_b+he ru N+Da dang a ma pa ri ka ste mi yi bdag po bya rog gdong ma la sogs pa lha min 
[\[338b.3\]]mo rnams kyi mchog gi 'dab chags brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyi rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig ste dam tshig bdun cu rtsa gnyis po mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 
[\[338b.4\]]'byor pas bza' bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis byin te rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dam tshig byin pa rnams spangs na de'i tshe myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur te smad pa'i sems kyis so/_/da ni so dang zhes pa la sogs 
[\[338b.5\]]pas lus kyi cha shas kyi dam tshig gsungs te/_so dang skra dang pags pa dang sha dang chu rgyus dang rus pa dang snying dang /_pad+ma zhes pa skye gnas dang /_shig dang ba spu dang /_srin bu dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang /_chu so dang bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang chu dang rnag dang khrag 
[\[338b.6\]]dang rdul dang /_chil dang mchi ma dang /_mchil ma dang snabs dang /_dri chu dang chu ser dang zhag dang bshang ba rnams te/_sna tshogs lus la gnas pa zhes pa sems can rnams kyi lus lag nas pa'i kha dog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang /_lce dang mig dang rna ba dang 
[\[338b.7\]]sna dang ri bong can zhes pa khu ba dang nyin byed ces pa rdul te dam tshig gi rdzas 'di rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya ste/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni de dag gi rang gi rang bzhin yon tan dbang 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]gis zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi dbang gis te/_ngag+ha ga kha ka/_nya dz+ha dza tsha tsa/_Na D+ha Da Tha Ta/_ma b+ha ba pha pa/_na d+ha da tha ta/[ \u0f88\u0f90] sha Sha \u0f89\u0fa4 sa/_ha ya ra wa la k+Sha zhes pa'o/_/'di rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang 
[\[339a.2\]]ste bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/de bzhin du sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba ste a A i I r-i r-I u U l-i l-I a~M aHa A e ai ar Ar o au al Al a~M aHha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA ha~M haHzhes pa sum cu rtsa drug ste/_'di rnams 
[\[339a.3\]]ni mtha' dag srid pa la gnas rigs rnams dang mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug dang phyag rgya sum cu rtsa drug go/_/de bzhin du dbyangs dang bcas pa'i yi ge so sos bskyed pa rnams ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug go/_/de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i rigs kyi rgyud rnams 
[\[339a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa thams cad sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid du rig par bya'o/_/zhes pa ni sa gzhi dag la gnas pa rnams zhes pa ste nges pa'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni dag pa'i rigs su mi 'gyur te/_gsal byed sna tshogs kyi chos can nyid kyi 
[\[339a.5\]]phyir ro/_/de ltar rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod pa ni nya so sol bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/_/da ni chu dang zhes pa la sogs pas 'khor lo 'dus pa la mchod yon la sogs pa gsungs te/_
[\[339a.6\]]chu'i snod dang mchod yon gyi snod dang dri'i snod dang /_spos kyi snod dang me tog gi snod dang /_'bras bu'i snod dang 'bru ma nyams pa'i snod dang /_mar me'i snod dang lha bshos kyi snod dang /_gos kyi snod de de ltar mchod pa'i rdzas rnam pa bcu ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la 
[\[339a.7\]]'dus pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa'i don du'o/_/de bzhin du nang gi rdzas rnam pa bcur 'gyur te/_khu ba dang gci ba dang /_rkang dang bshang ba dang sha dang /_mchin pa dang mkhris pa dang khrag dang rgyu ma dang pags pa ste/_rnam pa bcu ni 'khor lo 'dus pa 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]la lha mo rnams mchod pa'i don du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po zhes pa ni bod pa'o/_/da ni sgrol ma la sogs pa'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug gsungs te/_'dir tshogs kyi 'khor lo la zhugs pa rnams sam/_grong ngam grong khyer du gnas pa'i 
[\[339b.2\]]rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dpral ba'am phrag pa gnyi ga'am g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i dpyi'i phyogs la gang gi tshe lus kyi kha dog las gang zhig kha dog gzhan dang gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de ni kha dog las rig par bya ste/_gang yang lag pa 
[\[339b.3\]]dang rkang pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba de ni ri mo rnams kyis rig par bya'o/_/des na rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lag pa gzung ba'i slad du bud med dang skyes pa'i mtshan nyid bslab par bya'o/_/gang gis gzhan gyi bud med kyis rang gi lag pa yang mtshan nyid kyi don du gtong du 
[\[339b.4\]]'jug par byed na des zol gyis de rnams kyi lus la gnas pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil na gnas pa dang khyim du bris pa'i mtshan ma rig par bya'o zhes pa ni thabs so/_/de la gang gi skye ba'i gnas lnga rnams su kha dog las rdo rje mthong na de ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang 
[\[339b.5\]]phyug ma ste/_lag pa'i mthil lam rkang pa'i dag la ni ri mo rnams kyis so/_/de bas na de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rigs can ma'o/_/de bzhin du sgrol ma'i ral gri dang gos dkar mo'i mda' ma rin po che dang mA ma kI'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa dang spyan ma'i lnga pa 'khor 
[\[339b.6\]]lo'i mtshan ma ste/_de ltar rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams so/_/de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma'i rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_gzugs rdo rje ma'i me long dang /_ro rdo rje ma'i snod dang /_dri rdo rje ma'i me tog phreng ba dang /_reg bya rdo rje ma'i gos 
[\[339b.7\]]dang /_chos khams rdo rje ma'i chos 'byung ste/_yul gyi rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas lnga rnams sam lag pa dang rkang pa rnams la mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/de bzhin du nges par gri gug la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]de de la tsaR+tsi kA'i gri gug dang khyab 'jug ma'i dum pa dang /_phag mo'i bcu gzar dang gzhon nu ma'i gos ser po dang /_dbang mo'i khab ba ma tho ba dang /_tshangs ma'i nya rgya dang drag mo'i rtse gsum dang /_dpal mo'i rdo gru bzhi ste/_mtshan ma 
[\[340a.2\]]brgyad po 'di ni 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi zhes pa 'chi med la sogs pa'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi'o/_/de bzhin du khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi bcu ste/_de la rmugs byed ma'i smug rtsi'i snod de nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs pa zlum po dang rengs byed ma'i dar 
[\[340a.3\]]gyi srin bu dang nga rgyal can ma'i ku sha dang /_shin tu stobs ma'i chu gri dang 'od zer can ma'i mthil lham dang tsun dA'i spu gri dang khro gnyer can ma'i shing lham dang /_rdo rje'i lcags sgrog ma'i gdugs dang drag spyan ma'i tog tse dang shin tu sngon mo'i 'od ma'i dbyug pa ste/_de ltar 
[\[340a.4\]]bcu ni khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur zhing rnam gnyis las kyi dbang po rnams kyi'o/_/de bzhin du lha min rnams kyi mtshan ma ni khyi gdong ma'i ba lang gi rwa dang phag gdong ma'i kham por zhes pa sa'i phor pa dang /_ce spyang gdong ma'i rgyud 
[\[340a.5\]]ldan dang stag gdong ma'i 'phang dang bya rog gdong ma'i sha'i gsal shing dang bya rgod gdong ma'i rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]nye ba'i yan lag ste/_mi'am ci mo dang mkha' lding gdong ma'i mda' dang 'ug gdong ma'i rma bya'i mjug ma ste/_mtshan ma brgyad po 'di ni kha la sogs pa sgo brgyad 
[\[340a.6\]]rnam par dag pas rigs brgyad po rnams la mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug gang la mthong ba de rnams ni de'i rigs can te mtshan ma des shes nas mchod par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/slar yang ste yang sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dmangs 
[\[340a.7\]]rigs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gsungs te/_'dir dmangs rigs kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis sgrol ma'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi ut+pa la'am thong gshol mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs ma ste gos dkar mo'i rigs las skyes pa'i rin chen paT+Ta'o/_/rje rigs 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]ma ste spyan ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i smyu gu dang rin chen phreng ba'o/_/gnyis skyes ma ste mA ma kA'i rigs las skyes pa'i chu na rgyu ba dung dang zangs snod do/_/de bzhin du snga ma dang phyi mar yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi ste/_g.yung mo rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i 
[\[340b.2\]]rigs las skyes pa'i Da ma ru dang rnga chen no/_/de bzhin du gtum mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i cod pan dang bgrang phreng ngo /_/de ltar rang gi dpral ba'am phrag pa'am dpyi dang lag pa'am rkang pa rnams la mtshan ma gang zhig mthong 
[\[340b.3\]]ba'am khyim du bris shing mchod pa byed pa de ni de'i rigs can du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o/_/des gang byin pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas de bza' bar bya zhing ji srid lan bdun du 'khor ba'i mthar thug pa de bsten par bya ste/_dam tshig gi rdzas des mkha' la spyod pa nyid 
[\[340b.4\]]du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o/_/da ni bshang ba la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas rnams las la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam par dag pa gsungs te/_'dir bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag dang bcas pa dang /_sha dang bcas pa ni grangs bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang 
[\[340b.5\]]rlung gi lha rnams kyi bzhir 'gyur ro/_/ma smos kyang khu ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes pa nam mkha'i khams so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang /_b+ha ga ni sgra dang dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi khams kyi lha mo 
[\[340b.6\]]rnams kyi dam tshig drug ste sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug ces so/_/de bzhin du rnag dang bad kan dang /_shig dang srin bu dang chu ser dang zhag dang ba spu rnams dang skra rnams zhes pa dam tshig brgyad ni grangs bzhin du tsaR+tsi kA dang khyab 'jug ma dang /_phag mo dang gzhon 
[\[340b.7\]]nu ma dang dbang mo dang tshangs ma dang drag mo dang dpal chen mo ste/_rnal 'byor ma 'byung po las skyes pa rnams kyi'o/_/de bzhin du rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang rus pa dang rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa zhes pa sems can thams cad kyi lus la gnas pa ste/_mchin pa 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]dang glo ba dang rtsa dang pags pa dang snying dang chil bu ste de ltar bcur 'gyur ro/_/rgyu ma la sogs pa tshil bu'i mthar thug pa ni grangs bzhin du rmugs byed ma dang rengs byed ma dang nga rgyal can ma dang shin tu stobs ma dang /_rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang 
[\[341a.2\]]khro gnyer can dang tsun dA dang 'od zer can dang drag spyan ma dang shin tu sngon mo ste/_khro bo'i lha mo 'di rnams kyi dam tshig bcu'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i dri ma dang sna'i dri ma dang mig gi dri ma dang lce'i dri ma dang /_bshang la ma gyi dri ma dang /_b+ha ga'i dri ma dang /_
[\[341a.3\]]rtags kyi dri ma dang /_mchan khung gi dri ma ste lus thams cad kyi dri ma rnams so/_/dam tshig brgyad ni lha min mo rnams kyi grangs bzhin du ste/_khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma dang ce spyang gdong ma dang /_stag gdong ma dang /_bya rog gdong 
[\[341a.4\]]ma dang /_bya rgod gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma dang /_'ug gdong ma ste 'di rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad do/_/de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams ni 'jigs ma la sogs pa ste/_gang zhig brgyad pa brgyad de drug cu rtsa bzhi po de rnams kyi dam tshig ni sen mo nyi shu dang so sum cu rtsa gnyis dang 
[\[341a.5\]]rtsa rgyu ba'i dbye bas thod pa dum bu bcu gnyis rnams te dam tshig drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/de bzhin du rigs brgya'i dbye bas dam tshig brgya ste rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid/_/rang bzhin gcig ste rigs brgya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/rnal 
[\[341a.6\]]'byor ma rnams kyi rigs sum cu rtsa drug dang rigs drug cu rtsa bzhi gcig nyid rigs brgyar rig par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o/_/da ni gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi rnam par dag pa gsungs te/_bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag dang sha zhes pa sna tshogs 
[\[341a.7\]]mtha' dag sems can rnams kyi lus la gnas pa rnams ni gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi'o/_/rna ba dang sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang b+ha ga zhes pa drug ni zhing gi dbye ba la 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnag dang bad kan dang shig dang srin bu dang /_chu ser dang 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]zhag dang ba spu dang skra ste brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams so/_/de bzhin du rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang rus pa dang rkang dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rtsa dang pags pa dang snying dang tshil bu ste bcu ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba rnams so/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i dri ma dang sna'i dri ma dang mig gi 
[\[341b.2\]]dri ma dang lce'i dri ma dang b+ha ga'i dri ma dang bshang lam gyi dri ma dang rtags kyi dri ma dang mchan khung gi dri ma ste yan lag brgyad kyi dri ma 'di brgyad ni dur khrod kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams so/_/de bzhin du phyi rol du 'jig rten gyi khams la gnas la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pas dam tshig 
[\[341b.3\]]rnams gsungs te/_'dir dus me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan ni gnas kyi dbye bas spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig bzhi'o/_/sa skyes dang zla skyes dang sngags pa dang pa sangs dang spen pa dang gdengs can zhes pa mjug [{]rings te[,]ring ste[}]/_'di rnams ni zhing gi 
[\[341b.4\]]dbye bas gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams so/_/de bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang sa las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa dang /_me las skyes pa dang rlung las skyes pa ste/_brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i 'byung ba brgyad po rnams ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams 
[\[341b.5\]]te/_'byung po las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig go/_/slar yang de nas ro drug po rnams dang dri dang kha dog dang sgra dang reg bya ste/_bcu ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba rnams te khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi'o/_/sa la sogs pa rnams dang kha dog la sogs pa bzhi po rnams 
[\[341b.6\]]dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag gis zad pa ni dur khrod kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams te/_lha min mo rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad do/_/gnas la sogs pa phyi nang gi dam tshig rnam par dag pa'i nges pa'o/_/da ni gnas zhes pa la sogs pas nye ba'i gnas la sogs 
[\[341b.7\]]pa'i gnas rnams gsungs te/_'dir thun mong gis byis pa rnams yul du 'khyam pa'i don du dzA laM d+ha ra la sogs pa rnams gnas la sogs par gsungs so/_/de nyid ni thams cad du khyab par byed par mi 'gyur te/_rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs sum cu rtsa 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]drug ni grong khyer gcig tu'ang gnas so/_/gang gis na 'dir sa gzhi thams cad du khyab par dam pa dang po'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas sa thams cad la khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/_bod la 
[\[342a.2\]]sogs pa dang rgya nag la sogs pa'i yul rnams na yang gnas la sogs pa yod do/_/de nyid ni bsdus pa'i rgyud gzhan du ma bstan to/_/yul thams cad dang grong thams cad du gnas la sogs pa gsungs pa ni gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste rnam pa 
[\[342a.3\]]bzhi'o/_/de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni zhing rnam pa drug go/_/tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa'i khyim ni tshan do ha rnam pa brgyad do/_/rmugs byed ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni 'dus pa rnam pa bcu'o/_/khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni dur khrod rnam pa 
[\[342a.4\]]brgyad do/_/mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni yum gyi khyim rnam pa gnyis te/_de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma zhes pa g.yung mo dang gtum mo'i khyim ste/_de ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i khyim 
[\[342a.5\]]ni gnas la sogs pa'i ming gis rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o/_/da ni gnas zhes pa la sogs pas nang du gnas la sogs pa'i ming gsungs te/_'dir dam tshig 'dus pa la gnas ni thams cad du bud med kyi pad+ma'o/_/
[\[342a.6\]]nye ba'i gnas kyi sgras skyes pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi skye mched drug ni zhing ngo /_/skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi mnyam gnas la sogs pa'i rlud brgyad ni tshan do ha'o/_/skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i 
[\[342a.7\]]tshan do ha'o/_/de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi lce dang lce chung dang lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis dang /_bshang lam gyi g.yas dang g.yon gyi rtsa gnyis dang /_gci ba dang khu ba'i rtsa gnyis te/_las kyi dbang po bcu po 'di rnams ni 'dus pa'o/_/skyes pa 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]rnams kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/_/sna gnyis dang rna ba gnyis dang mig gnyis dang /_kha dang bshang lam las dri ma 'byung ba ste/_de ltar bud med rnams kyi dur khrod brgyad do/_/skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do zhes pa ste mtha' dag go/_/de bzhin 
[\[342b.2\]]du gnyi ga'i lus la so sor gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dang mdun no/_/nye ba'i gnas ni rgyab dang g.yas kyi yan lag ste/_de ltar gnas rnam pa gnyis so/_/de bzhin du g.yon gyi dbang po'i tshogs ni zhing ngo /_/g.yas kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni nye ba'i 
[\[342b.3\]]zhing ngo /_/de bzhin du rus sbal dang rtsangs pa dang lha sbyin dang nor las rgyal ba ste bzhi ni tshan do ha'o/_/mnyam gnas dang gyen rgyu dang khyab byed dang klu'i tshogs ni nye ba'i tshan do ha'o/_/de bzhin du g.yon gyi las kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni 'dus pa'o/_/
[\[342b.4\]]g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/_/g.yon gyi rna ba la sogs pa'i bug pa dri ma 'byung ba ni dur khrod do/_/g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/_/de bzhin du lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs par gtogs pa'i rnam par dag pa gzhan gyis te/_mdun dang g.yon gyi yan 
[\[342b.5\]]lag ni gnas so/_/rgyab dang g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i gnas so/_/de bzhin du g.yon gyi dpung pa'i tshigs dang g.yon gyi brla dang dpyi'i tshigs ni zhing ngo /_/g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/g.yon gyi nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs dang byin pa dang brla'i tshigs ni tshan do ha'o/_/
[\[342b.6\]]g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i tshan do ha'o/_/de bzhin du g.yon gyi lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs gnyis ni 'dus pa'o/_/g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/_/de bzhin du g.yon gyi sor mo dang sen mo rnams ni dur khrod do/_/g.yas kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/_/yang na gnyi ga'i 
[\[342b.7\]]dpung ba'i tshigs gnyis ni zhing ngo /_/brla'i tshigs gnyis ni nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/de bzhin du tshan do ha la sogs pa yang ste/_lag pa dang rkang pa la gnas pa yang sor mo'i mtha'i mtshams su'o zhes pa dam tshig 'dus pa la gnas la sogs pa'i ming rnal 'byor pas 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]rig par bya'o/_/da ni dran pa zhes pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa/_'dir lha mo bzhi ni rim pa bzhin du ste/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni spyan ma dang /_
[\[343a.2\]]tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gos dkar mo'o zhes pa rgyab dang g.yas so/_/sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mA ma kI dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni sgrol ma'o zhes pa g.yon dang mdun te/_lus kyi dbye bas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas gnyis so/_/dus kyi 'khor lor 
[\[343a.3\]]rab tu grags zhes pa rgyud gzhan du rab tu ma grags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sbas so zhes pa'i don to/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi nang nas byang chub kyi yan lag gcig ni yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste/_rigs kyi gnas btang snyoms 
[\[343a.4\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/gzhan pa rnams kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug ces pa ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang /_brtson 'grus yang 
[\[343a.5\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gzugs rdo rje ma ste/_lus kyi dbye bas nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/de bzhin du dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dri rdo rje ma dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni ro rdo rje ma dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi 
[\[343a.6\]]yan lag ni chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste/_zhing rnam pa gnyis so/_/de bzhin du chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang zhes pa ste/_sdig pa ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir spong ba ni tsaR+tsi kA dang sdig pa skyes pa rnams spong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni khyab 'jug ma dang /_
[\[343a.7\]]mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams spong ba'i dge ba bskyed pa ni dbang phyug ma dang dge ba skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo bas spong ba ni dpal chen mo ste/_nye ba'i tshan do ha bzhi'o/_/gzhan pa chu gter lha mo bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par 'gyur te/_de la 'dun pa'i 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni tshangs ma dang /_brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni dbang mo dang /_sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni phag mo dang /_dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gzhon nu ma'o zhes pa tshan do ha'i dbye ba ste/_de ltar brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[343b.2\]]du khro mo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste/_'dir dad pa'i stobs ni shin tu sngon mo dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs ma dang /_dran pa'i stobs ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni nga rgyal ma dang /_shes rab kyi stobs ni tsun dA ste/_
[\[343b.3\]]nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/_/de bzhin du rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do zhes pa ste/_de bzhin du dad pa'i dbang po ni rengs byed ma dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni rmugs byed ma dang /_dran pa'i dbang po ni 'od zer can dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[343b.4\]]dbang po ni khro gnyer can dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ni drag spyan ma'o zhes pa 'dus pa ste/_de ltar bcu'o/_/yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur zhes pa la 'dir yang dag pa'i lta ba ni khyi gdong ma dang 
[\[343b.5\]]yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni bya rog gdong ma dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag ni stag gdong ma dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni 'ug gdong ma dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni ce spyang gdong ma dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang /_yang dag 
[\[343b.6\]]pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bya rgod gdong ma ste/_de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de rnams mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams yi steng gi gnas su 
[\[343b.7\]]rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya ste g.yung mo la sogs pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rnam par sbyangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur te/_mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang de bzhin zhes pa thams cad du nges pa'o/_/
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]da ni sangs rgyas pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'di rnams bsten pa'i slad du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/_'dir rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur ba ste mu 
[\[344a.2\]]stegs pa rnams kyi lha dang /_lha mo khyab 'jug dang /_drag po la sogs pa rnams dang /_tsaR+tsi kA la sogs pa rnam par sbyangs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la yang sgrub po'o/_/des na rnal 'byor pa de nyid thob pa ste dbang bskur ba ni ye shes sam/_'jig 
[\[344a.3\]]rten pa'i las rab 'byam bsgrub pa'i don du sangs rgyas par gyur kyang rung zhi ba pa'am/_gcer bu pa dad pa mchog tu gyur pa'am/_skal ldan nam gtsang gnas sam/_de bzhin du bram ze'am thod pa can nam skra 'bal zhes pa zad byed par gyur kyang rung gos dkar 
[\[344a.4\]]ba'am zhing skyong du gyur kyang rung ste dag pa'o/_/thub pa'am bsnyon pa'i gzugs can nam rig pa can nam sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa'am/_slob gnyer pa yang rung ste rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te mi yi dbang /_/
[\[344a.5\]]yid la gang 'dod pa'i spyod pa de ji srid grub par gyur gyi bar du sbas te bya zhing /_de nas nus pa las 'jig rten las 'das pa mngon du bya'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/_/bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 
[\[344a.6\]]su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las rab tu gnas pa dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste lnga pa'o//_//phyag gi phyag rgya lta stangs kyis/_/gang gis lha min dbang skrag mdzad/_/dus 
[\[344a.7\]]kyi 'khor lo der btud nas/_/phyag rgya la sogs mtshan nyid bshad/_/smra mkhas kyis ni bsdus rgyud kyis/_/ji ltar rgyud chen las byung ba/_/phyag rgya lta stangs yan lag brda/_/thams cad 'grel pas rgyas par bya/_'dir phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du rgan 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]bo mthe bo la sogs pa sor mo rnams kyi ming ste rgan po ni mthe bo dang /_de nas gnyis pa ni mdzub mo dang /_gsum pa ni gung mo dang bzhi pa ni ming med do/_/ming med de'i mthar mthe chung ni mtha' dag yon tan gter te nam mkha'i khams nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rnal 
[\[344b.2\]]'byor pa yis slob dpon gyi man ngag gis rig par bya'o/_/de ltar phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis zhes pa ni dri dang /_gzugs dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_sgra'i yon tan gyi dbang gis de rim pas so/_/
[\[344b.3\]]de bzhin du bcing ba brjod par gyur na rdo rje bcing ba zhes par 'gyur zhing nges pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas par gyur na rdo rje'i khu tshur bcing ba zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin du zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/da ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya gsungs te/_'dir lag pa gnyi 
[\[344b.4\]]gas rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas/_khu tshur gyis mthe bo bsdams pa dag brla g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i steng du rdo rje'i 'dug stangs la gnas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/_/da ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya gsungs te/_sngar skyil krung byas nas skyil krung de la lag 
[\[344b.5\]]pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo g.yas pa'i phyogs nas ji srid sa la reg pa'i bar dus la son par gyur pa ste/_de ltar sa la reg pa mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/slar yang rim pa de nyid kyis te 'o na kyang lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal ni phyag na 
[\[344b.6\]]rin chen gyi mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du skyil krung la lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa ni phyag na pad+ma ste/_snang ba mtha' yas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil 
[\[344b.7\]]gan rkyal du skyil krung gi steng du ste/_gzhan pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du 'jigs pa med pa rab tu sbyin pa ni phyag na ral gri zhes pa don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur g.yas min gyi khu tshur la 
[\[345a\]]
